ste// rkang lag skra yang ring ba ste// mchan khung sbom la zlum pa ste// gos dang rgyan sogs dmar la dga'// kha zas sha dang nya la sred// sha ta nI yi rigs sbom pa// legs par mtshon cing brtag bya ba// lus kyi dbyibs chung tshang ra chung// dkar la sha srab bzhin 'dod la// dkar 'dzin shrI pha la 'dra// lus ran bzhin lus g.yas su yo// b+ha ga chung la rub pa ste// sna tshogs ri mos mtshan la dga'// khro la 'thab cing brlang tshig smra// sngags dang rdzas dang thabs stsogs pas// dgon pa bar chad med pa'i gnas// snga dro phyed dang snur dman dang// dgongs ka'i dus su dgug par bya// nang lus b+ha ga pho brang dbyibs// spyi dang khyad par brtag par bya// gang du bde skyed rten gyi dbyibs// yo ba dang ni sla ba dang// rtsa ngan 'phel kha che ba dang// rtsub gang zlum mtho 'dzag pa dang// 'gyur dang mi legs dman po dag/ de bzhin spang bar shes par bya// rtsa med pa dang shes pa dang// rtsa ngan pa dang yo ba dang// kha ma pa dang thung ba dang// phra dang nub pa med pa yang// spang bar bya ba rab tu bshad// sra ba dang ni 'phang mtho dang// rtsa ldan drod che ska ba dang// mi 'gyur ba dang zlum pa dang// gting ring 'jam zhing cung zad dam// pad+ma'i snying po bzhin du zlum// shin tu chung la spu nyung ba// bzang po'i rigs dang mtshan du bshad// 'gugs dang bskrad dang gsang ba dang// rgyas pa'i ro

dang sbom pa dang// rang bzhin bzang dang nus pa che// bcos su med pa bzang por bshad// gong du gzhan gyis dbang byas dang// dka' thub can dang ngo tsha can// gtsang sme can dang rang bzhin dan// g.yangs pa yis ni 'grangs pa dang// gnad dang gnyid dang snyings snyigs kyang pa dag/ nus pa med pas spang bar bya// gal te bde bskyed chags 'dod na// chags pa'i glu dang gar dag dang// bza' btung blta dang chags pa'i gtam// ci legs pa yis spyad par bya// steng 'og 'khyud pa gnyis yin te// blta dang gzhib dang 'dzin pa gnyis// reg pa de bzhin shes par bya// thabs dang shes rab tshul gyis so// nu ma de bzhin mig gnyis dang// sna dang 'gram pa chu so dang// brla dang lte ba b+ha ga la// dgyes pa bskyed phyir 'o bya'o// mchu dang nu ma'i gong gnyis dang// mchan khung 'bur gnyis mkhur tshos la// bud med dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir// mi drag par ni sos gdab bo// mchu gnyis bar du mchu gnyis dag/ blta bzhin yun ring gzhib par bya// nu ma gnyis dang 'bur gnyis dang// brla dang nu ma mkhur tshos skyed pa ru// brtse dang chags pa bskyed pa'i phyir// sen thabs bcas pas reg par bya// gsang ba'i stod kyi gnas gsum du// sked pa'i gnas gsum bcu gnyis dang// mchan khung rtsib logs rgyu zhabs su// tha mal tshul gyis drud par bya// srin lag thabs kyis bskyod par bya// reg dang 'phro bas yid 'pham pa// de tshe rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rtse gnyis 'phrad pas bde ba che// gang la rang dbang med par ni// 'khor ba'i srid pa rang thim 'gyur// b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po la// rdo rje thabs chen bskyod pa yis// gsang ba'i thig le bcud kyi 'bru// rtse nas bzung bzlog sbyangs pa yis// dbang po yul dang rnam shes kun// bde ba chen po'i gzugs su skye// 'di tshe bar chad med pa yis// mthar thug gsang ba'i ye shes 'grub// dbang dang man ngag sngon song bas// yon tan bcu dang rab ldan zhing// yid 'ong rigs bzhi thig le ni// pad+ma nI dang hasti nI// shang ka nI dang tsa ta nI// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// nub phyogs 'og min bde ldan du// ma chags pad+ma gdan bting ba// nyi ma shar ba'i gzhal yas khang// nyung dkar tshad kyi bum pa ni// yon tan tshad med gter dang ldan// las dang ngo bo tshad dang bral// bdag nyid ngo bo can ldan pas// bcu drug bzhi chas bde bskul bas// gnyis ka'i gnas su yab yum dag/ phyag rgya dgu gnyis tshad mas gdab// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis kyi bcud// bskyod bskul bro gar thabs kyis gdags// nyi zla dus gcig 'dres shar ba// de nyid bzhi la slar bsdus na// dang po spyod yul thams cad

kun// bcu gsum phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal// rgyu ba yid dang dran rtog chad// thig le bde chen 'gro 'ong med/ sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ b+ha ga bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// zhe sdang can gyi gang zag la// gnyen po thabs kyis mi 'dul ba// thabs chen gsang ba bshad par bya// nongs par spyod dang log sred can// dam nyams log dang 'khu ba dang// bla ma mchod dang dkon mchog dgra// dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// yongs la gnod dang 'dus par 'ongs// bla ma grogs kyi yum phrog cing/ tshogs kyi yo byad rku 'phrog byed// gsang ba 'jigs pa'i las byed pa// dam tshig dam chos dmod pa dang// lha dang mi dang ngan 'gror bcas// thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing du gsungs// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir// chos kun ro gcig nyid gnas shing// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras gcad par bya// byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// thar pa chen por dgod par bya// drag shul thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// mnyam nyid zhi la dgod par bya// thabs dang ldan pa'i lcags kyu yis// 'khor ba'i phung po bkug nas ni// thugs rje'i lcid dang ldan par gnan// shes rab mtshon cha ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral te// chu shing sdong po kha phye ste// ma rig mun pa snang bar byas// de nyid ye shes 'od kyis sbyang// 'byung ba gsum gyi thabs kyis sbyangs/ raM yaM khaM/ ma bskyed nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// 'byung ba'i rkyen gyis mi 'jig ltar// skye med sems kyi rang bzhin la// mtshan ma'i rkyen gyis 'jig pa med// gsal ba nyi zla'i gdan steng du// a las hUM gi sbyor ba yis// tshon gang 'od kyi sems dpa' che// sbyor ba rlung gi cho ga yis// 'og min gnas su s+pha ra yaM// dbyings su bskul bas the tshom med// gnyis med thim pas 'dres 'gyur te// rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur rdo rje sems// gnyis su med par dbang bskur te// bdag dang gzhan don mthar phyin to// phung lnga 'dod pa'i yo byad lnga// dur khrod sna tshogs las grub pa// mchod pa'i sprin ni rab 'byams kyis// ma lus khyab par spro bar bya// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir// byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// dpag med log par 'khyams pa rnams// thabs kyis ma skyes sa la bkod// 'chi ba med pa'i chos skur thim// bde chen sa la sbyor bar rigs// bde lam 'di las gzhan med do// a yi rang bzhin thog mtha' med// ta la pa yi mngon mtshan pas// rtog pa 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis// ma lus mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// a las dbyug btags dkar ldan sgras// ma lus mnyam pa nyid du

sbyar// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yis// phyag rgya snying po ting 'dzin gyis// sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'i// go 'phang tshe 'dir 'grub par nges// chags pas sdang ba grol byed pa// mun 'gyur sman dang bdud rtsi ltar// dka' thub tshegs dang bral ba yi// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// gsang ba'i thabs la legs goms pas// nyi zla 'dres dang rtse zin par// thig le zhe sdang bde bar thim// gsang ba de dag gnas pa na// nyon mongs dran rtog ma lus pa// mun pa la ni snang ba bzhin// gsang ba thabs kyi snang bar 'gyur// 'dod chags sdang ba'i gang zag gis// thal ba'i rgyud la legs goms pas// 'dod chags ma la 'dod spyad pas// zhing khams bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa yi// bde chen thig le khyab par ro// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pas// thams cad lhan cig skyes par gsal// phra las shes rab pha rol phyin// skyes bu thabs dang nus pa yis// rigs nges gsum dang ldan pa la// thabs kyi sbyor ba de bzhin brtsams// chags pa spyad dang rlung gi thabs// dang po'i las can dga' bya'i phyir// mi yi bu mo la spyod pa// 'di dag thig le bzung phyir bsten// ting 'dzin ye shes lha mo la// brten pas sems kyi bde ba 'byung// rgyu 'bras zag pa khu ba med// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la// brten pa med cing 'dzin pa med// yid dang ting 'dzin ye shes kyi// gang yin lha mo la sbyar bas// bud shing me ltar rang tshig cing// zag pa med pa'i bde chen po// snang ba 'di las sa khams dang// dus khams zhing khams nam mkha'i khams// bde ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug par// gsang ba'i sa gsum ma lus pa// thabs kyis zin dang ma zin las// 'phel 'grib zag pa yod min dang// 'ching grol khyad par sna tshogs snang// thabs dang skyes bu'i khyad par las// ma lus bde mchog sgyu ma'i phyir// gang yang mi bya ba med de/ thams cad rgyal ba'i mdzad par gnas// pad+ma thabs dang 'dus pa las// dbang po rnam shes yul las sogs// tha dad grol bas rang log ste// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// lus dang sems dang ye shes kyi// brten pa gsum la mnyam sbyor bas// 'du shes kun las rab grol te// thams cad bde ba chen por smin// shes rab pad+ma'i me long la// rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs bltas pas// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan tshogs// mtha' dbus med par rang bzhin snang// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni// snang ba ma yin mi snang min// mtha' dbus zhen pa las 'das nas// thams cad bde chen mnyam pa nyid// shes rab gsal ba'i me long

la// skyes bu thabs kyis bde gnas shing// skyes bu thabs kyis bzla ba la// shes rab mig gis gang bltas pa// zhen btags snang ba'i mun pa rnams// thabs chen snang bas khyab par 'gyur// sbyor bas snang ba kun bsgral zhing// bsgral bas skye med dbyings su sbyor// gnyis med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// gang du nyams dang ldan pa yis// gang du bskul lam mi gsal na// rang gi tshad dang ldan par du// glu dang rtsed mo gar dag dang// phyi rol chags pas 'bar byas te// bde chen yid kyi yul la blta// 'grogs pa dag dang dmigs pa dang// goms las ye shes phyag rgya gsal// lhan cig bde chen rim skyes pas// gnyis med bde ba thabs kyi ro// bcu drug rgyun dang 'bab chu ltar// goms pa'i stobs kyis mthar phyin 'gyur// gsang ba'i thabs ldan gang zag ni// 'khor ba thabs kyi zhing gnas kyang// rtogs goms thabs kyis gang zin pa// mi ldog de nyid pha rol phyin// thabs chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// thabs chen gsang ba 'di gsungs so// skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul te// dman dang rigs chad yul ma yin// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ thabs chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang bzhin thabs kyis mngon byas pa'i// las kyi khyad par snang ba yi// rim pa 'di ni bshad par bya// thams cad rang byung byang chub sems// kun gyi gzhi rtsa stong pa nyid// ma skyes pa nyid skye ba ste// 'di la phyogs ris kun las 'das// kun nas cha shas spang bral ba'i// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin nyid// phrin las kun gyi ngo bor snang// thams cad thig le chen po'i ngang// phyogs med rang byung thig le la// mi mthun dri ma rdul med pa// ma bcos zhi ba chen por bshad// dngos med rang rig byang chub sems// rang byung rang snang ngo bo nyid// mtha' dbus med pa'i ngang tshul gyis// nam mkha'i khams ltar gnas pa'o// thabs cig tu ni gnas pa na// bya dang mi bya la sogs pa// gnyis med thig ler rang gnas pa// rig pas rang rgyud nyid du 'dus// ma skyes stong pa'i rang bzhin la// dngos dang dngos med 'jigs med 'jig pas na// thogs pa med par pha rol phyin// ma lus par ni 'jig par 'gyur// rang rig stong pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// mi shes thig le'i rang snang ni// dwangs ma rtsa bzhi 'od dang bcas// rang bzhin las dang nus par bcas// tha dad med pas nang du bshad// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// spyod yul bral ba'i gsang ba ste// b+ha ga bde ba chen po nyid// yi ge bzhi ltar rang gnas pa// thabs dang ldan

pas rtogs 'gyur gyi// dman pas rtogs par ga la 'gyur// gang du yul dang phrad pa'i tshe// dwangs ma dga' ba chags pa dang// rtsol ba re dogs chad pa'i sems// mi mthun pa nyid mthun 'gyur yang// thabs bral rnams la rgyas btab bo// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// dga' ba'i rol pa sna tshogs pa// rtse gcig bar ni 'gyur ba'i tshe// sna tshogs dran bsam zhi bar 'gyur// rol dang 'khyud dang zhal sbyor dang// stegs dang 'jo ba blta dang rtse// sna tshogs phyi nang sbyor ba yis// lus sems phyi nang rgyas par 'gyur// gang du phyi nang rol pa'i tshe// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// phyi nang dran bsam ma lus pa// zhen pa ldog cing dbang du 'du// re dogs chad pa'i dus nyid ni// gang la 'jug pa'i yid spangs pas// rang byung thig le bsam mi khyab// de nyid ma rig la sogs bcom// thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po ni// ji snyed phrin las ngo bo ste// so sor dbye ba mi gnas kyang// rin chen sems la rang bzhin rdzogs// gang phyir thabs dang sbyor ba yis// rdzas las bcud kyis bsgyur ba ltar// skal ldan dbang po yang rab la// gang phyir bsgrub pa de bzhin snang// gsang chen thabs kyi rol pa'i rgyud// chags pas chags pa grol ba ltar// gang 'dir thabs dang bral ba yis// nam mkha' la ni me tog bzhin// rgyud dang ngo bo nyid dag dang// mthar phyin thabs kyi rgyud dag gis// ma lus kun la khyab gnas pa// phrin las rol pa thabs kyi rgyud// rdo rje pad+ma nu ma sprad// rkan dang lce dang thabs sbyar bas// me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// pad+ma'i bde ba mngon du snang// thig le mngon du 'byung ba na// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// 'dren pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang// rtse dang sked pa rtsa ba dang// lte ba snying mgrin skra mtshams su// thig le 'ong ba'i tshul gyis ni// bya ba'i thabs ni gang la yang// phrin las bzhi ni kun 'chang ste// thabs dang ldan pas rnam dbye ba// ma nor don dang ldan pa yis// bdag dang lha dang sgyu ma dang// nam mkha' lta bur mthar phyin pas// bde chen rig pa rang gsal ba// phyogs dang bral bar rang bzhin snang// shes rab med pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid bde bar ldan pa'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo bsten pa dang// brda' dang gzhib pas bde ba bskyed// de nas stong zhing mi rtog pas// dbang po yul sems las gos chos// rang byung rang rig byang chub sems// dbyer med bde ba chen por bsgom// gang dang gang du phrad pa las// de ni de yis der snang ltar// thabs chen rig pa mnyam sbyor las// rang byung bde chen gsal bar 'byung// dgug dang bkug dang 'thab pa dang// 'dren dang 'dzin

dang bskyil ba dang// sbyang dang spel dang las brtsams pas// bar chad med pa'i bde ba 'byung// gong du thabs chen ldan pa yis// yid 'ong mtshan ldan bu mo la// blta dang snyan dang 'grogs la sogs// bde chen bar chad med par gnas// gsang chen thabs kyi me long 'di// kun la gnas kyang mi snang ste// long ba gzugs dang 'phrad pa bzhin// ji ltar bltas pas mthong ba med// thig le rim nas rim gnas pa// dang po nas brtsams mthar phyin bar// goms dang rkyen gyis gong nas gong// lam gyi khyad par mthar phyin 'gyur// las dang rim pa byin rlabs dang// ye shes rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs// dngos dang ting 'dzin bde thob pa// pad+ma gsum pas rim sbyor bas// yul dang rgyan dang yun la sogs// rim pa rang bzhin 'phel ba yis// mthar thug lam la gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas lha mo rol pa yis// skal ldan rigs la dbang bskur bas// bcu gsum mthar phyin lhun grub pas// rig pa'i me tog stong pa la// bya byed med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// yon tan sna tshogs gsal bar snang// phyogs bcu ma lus sangs rgyas sras// mthar phyin dbang gi sbyor ba ste// mthar thug bde ba'i nam mkha' la// nyi ma bye ba brdal ba ltar// ye shes nam mkha' mtha' dbus med// rang byung ye shes bde chen po// rang rig stong pa yul las 'das// rgyu rkyen rim pa kun dang ldan// dpag bsam shing dang nor bu la// zhing khams nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// nyi 'od chu rlabs char bzhin du// 'phel 'grib med pa'i tshul du gnas// gang la bde stong dbyer med pa// gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min// mtha' dbus rgyu 'bras re dogs sogs// spang thob med par rtag tu gnas// gsang ba'i yang gsang snying po ste// gsang ba mngon phyung thabs kyi rgyud// sgyu 'phrul thabs chen gsang ba'i lam// lus dang man ngag thabs kyi mchog/ bskal par sbyangs kyang mi rnyed la// bla ma'i man ngag thabs chen rgyud// da lta nyid du mngon par snang// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ phrin las bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// rdo rje dang ni dril bu'i tshad// de nas legs par bshad bya ba// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// rdo rje thabs chen ye shes te// dril bu shes rab pha rol phyin// tshad dang bral bar bshad pa yin// thabs chen bde ba'i rdo rje yis// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// bde ba ye shes tshad med pa// dpag med thig le bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba chen po bdag nyid can// gang du bde bas khyab pa'i gnas// dngos med shes rab

pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// nam mkha' lta bur rang bzhin gsal// chos nyid dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// bde ba chen po tshad las 'das// gang gis dpag par mi nus pa// bde chen dbyer med bsam las 'das// bdag gzhan bya bsam las 'das pa// yul dang dbang po sems la sogs// ji srid snang grags las 'das pa// de srid bde chen chos kyi sku// dngos dang dngos med gnyis las 'das// thabs dang shes rab bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba thabs kyi lam// gsang mchog thig le dbyings la rdzogs// 'gro 'ong dmigs rtog kun la 'das// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ thams cad 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// ma lus gcig pu gsal ba la// yul med bde bar rang bzhin gsal// shes rab dril bu pad+ma ste// chos dbyings b+ha ga gsang ba'i yum// gzhan yang thams cad 'dus pa ni// bde ba skyed pa'i zhing du bshad// gsang dbang tshad ni mdzub gang ste// brgya phrag bye ba 'dus pa'i rtsa// thig le phra rags khyab byed pa// lus can thabs la rang bzhin gnas// yul ni pad+ma sor bzhi ste// shes rab rang bzhin dri med de// bskal pa dpag med rdul snyed kyi// bag chags bsal nas bde ba bskyed// rdo rje thabs kyi thig le nyid// phyogs bcu dra ba'i rang bzhin te// thabs la brten pa'i nyams myong gis// thams cad bde chen rang bzhin gsang// gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rtsa thig le// bye brag brgya bcu kun 'dus pa// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtsa thig le// phyogs bcu kun nas byin gyis rlobs// gang phyir nyi zla 'gro 'ong gis// gsang ba'i nyams la gang gnas pa// lo zla tshad dang 'grangs bral bar// mi 'gyur bde chen 'grub par 'gyur// thig le ro yis khyab pa yis// mtha' dbus gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// rgya dbyibs tshad dang dral ba dai// rang bzhin rtogs nas goms par 'grub// lus dang rtsa dbyibs tshad ldan pas// thabs kyis rang snang mngon sum pa// thig le'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas// ma lus dag rtogs pad+ma can// thams cad bde chen mi rtog pa// thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang// shes rab la ni thabs sbyor zhing// gnyis med 'brel ba las byung ba'i// bde chen sems la sgom pa'o// rdo rje zla ba'i thig le ni// gong gi thabs la brten pa yis// rim nas rim par mngon byas pa// ma chags thabs kyi rol pa mdzad// gnyis med rol pa phyi rol yul// mngon mkhyen thad ka'i dmigs yul bral// shes rab nyi ma la brten pas// ma lus bde chen thig ler gsal// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// thams cad thabs chen lam gnas pas// mi 'grub pa dang tshegs chen

dang// dka' thub gdung ba las 'das shing// re dogs bral 'dod yon tan lngas// dka' thub med par tshe 'dis 'grub// gsang chen thabs kyis bsgyur ba ltar// snyigs mar bcas pa'i lus nyid ni// spangs pa med par bde chen 'grub// thig le chen pos gsang ba yi// phyi nang snod bcud 'jig rten kun// ma lus bde bar rang gsal bas// rtags zhes thabs kyis rang sar grol// bde ba la ni gang brten pas// rang lus thabs kyi rang bzhin las// me long bzhin dang 'phrad pa ltar// rang lus mngon du snang bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab rol ba las// rtse nas rtse ru sbyar ba la// 'gro 'ong med pa'i thig le yis// lus sems bde bas rgyas btab pas// thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// khams dang bral ba'i bde ba ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ste// ngo bo tshad med pa nyid de// rim pa dbang gi stobs las byung// shes rab rang byung dri med la// b+ha ga thabs la ma brten par// dus gsum rgyal ba mi 'byung ste// nam mkha' la ni me tog bzhin// pad+ma me tog rgyas pa la// rtag tu mchod dang bstod pa dang// blta dang bsnam dang gzhib dang bsten// rtag tu bdag dang mnyam sbyor bas// bde chen rang nyams rtag 'phel cing// nam mkha' lta bu'i bde chen 'grub// dang po cung zad bde ba ste// rtse gcig rig pa las byung ba// phyag rgya bzhi ldan rab sbyor bas// thabs kyi thig le smin pa'i tshe// re dogs 'jigs pa'i rnam rtog dag/ thams cad bde ba chen por 'bar// de bas yon tan kun ldan pa// rnam g.yengs 'du byed gcod byed cing// chags pas chags pa sel byed pa// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya// lus kyi nus pa brtan thob pa// ting 'dzin brtan pa las byung ba// rgas 'chi zag pa las byung ba'i// rig pa'i bu mo bsten par bya// lo zla bskal pa grangs med par// zag med bde ba rgyas bya zhing// mthar thug bde bsgrub bya ba'i phyir// ye shes sangs rgyas btsun mo bsten// 'di la dga' dang mi dga' med// 'jigs dang bag tsha cung zad med// bya ba med cing brten pa med// sha rus rkang dang khrag med cing// khu ba med cing gshang gci med// nam mkha'i 'ja' dang gzugs brnyan ltar// snang ba bde ba 'phel byed cing// rgya mtsho chu bo ji bzhin du// gnas pas bde chen nam mkha' ltar// 'byung 'jug rgyu rkyen cha las 'das// mtha' dbus med pa'i byang chub sems// dus kun bde chen dbyer med pas// rang byung ye shes yul bral ba// gnyis med ma yin gnyis pa min// bzhi bcu lnga sogs dus gsum chos// kun mkhyen ldan bral gnyis ka min// thog ma tha ma dbus med cing// spang len shes dang mi shes

bral// gnyis med rang rig byang chub sems// thams cad ma bcos thig le ste// gsang ba gsang chen dman yul min// thabs chen ldan pa 'ga' yi yul// bcud 'dus ye shes thig le che// 'phro 'du med pa'i rang bzhin las// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor snang// snang stong bsam pa'i yul brtags la// tha snyad mtshan ma ci yang rung// bde ba gnyis su mi phyed pa'i// ngo bo nyid kyi gsang mchog bde// gzhan gyis ma byas mi g.yo ba'i// rang rig bde chen sgyu 'phrul la// ngo mtshar rmad byung snang ba ste// ngo bo nyid kyi yul las 'das// don dam ma bcos ma bslad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// dman dang tha mal dka' thub can// gang dag rnal 'byor spyod yul min// rdo rje nyi ma gsang ba'i bcud// zla ba thig le thabs kyis bzung// phyogs cha khyab par gsal ba na// rang lus snyigs ma bde bar gsal// gdams te dang po 'og gi snod// thig le 'gro 'ong bcas pa rnams// mi 'gro rang la thim pa ltar// rtog pa lhan cig skyes par gsal// chags sdang zhen pa phrag dog rnams// dug gis de nyid sel ba ltar// thabs chen dbang gi man ngag gis// nyi 'od mun pa bzhin du sel// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba yi// gsang ba thabs lam snang ba ste// rdo rje'i tshig lam snang byed 'di// rtog ge dman la mi bstan te// dbang dang man ngag ldan pa la// byin rlabs nan tan chen por bya// nyi zla rgya mtsho phog pa sbyang// thig le 'gro 'ong med par bcings// rgya mtsho nam mkha'i mthongs la gtad// gling bzhi ri rab gcig tu bsdu// thabs la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// chags sdang lnga sogs mi dge chos// spyad pas mi ldog pha rol phyin// bde chen thabs su bshad pa yin// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dbang po yul 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ji snyed chos rnams mtha' yas pa// yid dang chos su 'dus pa'i don// 'di ni nges par bshad par bya// gang du phyi nang bcas pa yi// glo yul cir yang snang ba ste// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa nyid// chos su snang bar 'dus pa yin// de yi rjes su 'brang ba yis// dran rig gsal bar gang gyur pa// rang rig blo la mngon snang ba// de la yid ches brjod pa yin// gang du snang ba thams cad kun// sems las gzhan na med pa'i phyir// nyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du// rang las byung zhing nyid la gnas// rtogs pa'i bye brag thams cad kun// gnyis med ngang la rang bzhin 'dus// ma lus yid dang chos 'dus pas// de yang ma skyes rang bzhin nyid// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor

snang// rang byung ye shes gnas med la// phyogs dang rgya dbyibs las 'das pa// ma rig ma skyes de bzhin nyid// sgyu 'phrul shes rab gsal bar snang// gang du rtogs dang ma rtogs las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang// kun 'byung yid kyi dkyil 'khor te// chos kyi yid der 'dus pa yin// dngos po med las dngos por snang// dngos snang de bzhin yid kyi dbyings// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa// ma bcos rgyun gyi byang chub sems// yid kyi 'khor lo sgo phye bas// chos kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gsal// mkha' la 'byams shing sprin phung bzhin// ma skyes sems las rnam par snang// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang// sku dang gzhal yas 'du 'phro yang// ma skyes rang rig byang chub sems// dbye ba med par rang bzhin gnas// ji snyed tha snyad dmigs rtog kun// chu la chu bur rnam pa ltar// rang bzhin med la gnas pa yi// yid dang chos su yang dag 'du// nang gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs dbyibs su gnas// rtsa ba bzhi la yan lag brgyad// dwangs ma lnga dang snyigs mar bcas// rnam shes rgyu ba'i rkyen du bshad// sa bon drug ste 'od bzhir ldan// snying pos mtshams sbyar 'od du 'bar// thig le gcig la thim pa yis// zag pa med pa'i ye shes skye// chos nyid yon tan ye shes rtsa// rang rgyud kun la gnas pa ni// dman pa rnams kyi yul min pas// gab cing sbas par shes par bya// ting 'dzin gsum dang bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gang gis// sgo gsum khyab par ci spyad pa// zhen pa mtshan ma'i dbang gis na// 'khor ba'i mtha' mar ltung bar 'gyur// rang bzhin ngan dang ma sbyangs dang// dka' thub can dang dam med dang// zhen chags can dang phrag dog can// log sred can dang le lo can// log pa'i gang zag dbang sogs pa'i// dam pa min par shin tu spangs// 'di ni 'khor ba'i gzhol phyogs te// rang bzhin log pa'i mthu ldan pas// gsang ba'i don la log pa yis// bdag gzhan gnyis ka ltung bar 'gyur// gsang chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// thabs chen mngon phyung bstan pa ste// ma lus bde chen rang snang ba// mngon snang gzhan gyi spyod yul min// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// mnyam pa dbyer med theg pa 'di// gang ltar spyad pas pha rol phyin// gsang ba'i mchog tu 'di bshad do// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'dod chags la brten bde ba yis// spyod yul bde ba chen por snang// de nyid rang byung nyid ces bya// ma lus rol pa thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba 'di ni bshad pa yis// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun//

chags pa'i bde ba bskyed mdzad de// blta dang blta zhing 'dzum pa dang// la lar zhal sbyor 'dzin pa dang// la lar dam du 'khyud par byed// brla gnyis dam par 'khyud pa yis// gsang dbang pad+mar bcug bskyod pas// phyi nang sems dang sems byung rnams// rang byung bde bar zhen pa rnams// thig le rtsa slor byung ba la// byed pa sdom pa thabs mtshon pas// phyi nang yul sems ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gsal// rtsa yi sgra bzhin mthong med pas// ma skyes a yi rang bzhin la// thabs chen rang gis mtshon pa ni// thams cad ma hA su kha'i klong// gsang ba thabs kyi nyams ldan pas// phyi nang snod bcud gang yang rung// a la dbyug btags dkar ldan nyid// de nyid sgyu 'phrul dra bar bshad// thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin la// thabs dang shes rab mngon phyung bas// dbang po yul sems ldan pa la// bcu drug ye shes gsal ba skye// gnas dang gnas pa'i dbyibs can dang// rten dang brten pa'i thig le dag/ mkha' dbyings gsang bar brten pa las// rang byung ye shes thogs pa med// gsang ba thabs kyi thig le nyid// rang byung ye shes chags med pas// mkha' ltar kun la khyab gyur kyang// rang bzhin dman pas rtogs mi 'gyur// gang la gsang ba'i thabs ldan pas// mun pa la ni snang ba ltar// bcos bsgyur med par rang snang ba// skyes bu mchog gi don du bshad/ sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ thabs dang bral bas mi grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang du dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bla ma byin rlabs thabs ldan pas// grol ba'i tshul 'di bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid 'gyur zhing// ma lus thabs can snang ba ste// rang byung gsang ba'i me long nyid// dbang po yul sems me long la// gsang ba'i thabs kyis ma zin pa// thams cad ye shes rang snang ba// thabs ldan rnams la snang bar zad// rdo rje me long bstan pa'i mdzod// thabs chen lus la rang bzhin rdzogs// me long bzhi la srog shing gsum// bskyod pa rlung sems sbyor ba yis// gsal ba ye shes re dogs bral// myur du 'byung bar the tshom med// thabs ldan rkyen gyis gsal gyur na// las dang nyon mongs gsal ba dang// ji ltar me la shing bsnan ltar// lhag pa'i ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// thabs lam gsal ba'i mar me 'di// rang byung lhan cig skyes pa mthong// ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// goms pa'i stobs la gnas gyur na// ma lus ye shes chen po ste// lhun grub ye shes thogs pa med// thig le shum gyi 'od ldan

pas// gang gis byed pa'i thabs ldan pa// de yis der 'dzag bde ba'i sems// snying por thim pas ye shes skyed// gnas bzhi gar thabs ye shes las// sems mtha' 'gro 'ong la gnas pas// ma skyes sems la gnas 'gyur zhing// ma lus dag par byin gyis rlobs// phyogs bcu snod bcud thig le kun// gsang ba thabs la mnyam sbyor bas// sprul pa'i thig le bsam mi khyab// 'dzin dang dbab pa'i thabs las byung// gsang gsum thabs kyi spyod pa 'di// thabs ldan rnams la mngon sum ste// skal med man ngag bral ba la// bskal pa bye bar snang mi 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// rgyal ba bla ma mnyes byas shing// dbang dang man ngag la sbyangs pas// ci dgar spyad pas bde bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga ldan zhing// na so lang tsho dar la bab// pho mo chags pa brtan pa dang// gsang ba'i las 'dir myur du 'grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// 'dod chags rol pa'i stobs ldan pas// bskyod pa rlung gi thogs med cing// rdo rje rtsa la 'jug pa yis// gsang ba'i thig le 'gro 'ong med// rgyu ba'i rlung la rang chad nas// spyod yul bde ba chen por thim// 'dod chags ldan pa'i gang zag la// skabs dang rim pa'i bye brag gis// btsun mo gsum du bstan pa ste// snang ba'i zhen pa ldog par byed// gang la snang ba'i zhen pa dag/ ma lus bde chen rang rig ste// bsam brjod zhen pa kun las 'das// thogs med ldan pa'i gang zag la// thogs med 'od gsal byang chub sems// dbang yul thig le rtsar phrad pas// gzung ba med cing gtong ba med// rang byung rig pa bder gnas pas// thams cad ma skyes ngo bo nyid// rdo rje nyi zla'i thig le la// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas// spyod yul mtshan ma ji snyed pa// lhan cig skyes pa 'char bar 'gyur// gang du thabs dang ldan pa la// phyi nang spyod yul bcas pa kun// bde chen gsang ba mngon sum ste// 'khrul dang log pa'i spyod yul min// b+ha ga gsum la mnyam sbyar bas// rig par byed pa chen po skye// rig pa rtog rtogs kyis kyang gis zil mnan pas// mkha' ltar bde ba chen po 'grub// bsam pa'i longs spyod kun ldan pa'i// bde chen rang rig snying po la// ma lus bde chen gsal ba la// spang len dgag sgrub kun dang bral// thig le las ni nyams bskyed zhing// de nyid bde chen mi rtog pa// rang byung ye shes nam mkha' nyid// rtogs goms gsal bas lhun gyis grub// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med cing// bya byed mtshan ma'i yul las 'das// bde ba chen po 'pho 'gyur med// rgyu rkyen zag pa 'du 'phro med// thig le chen po kun khyab pas// rang bzhin 'phro 'du kun

dang bral// ma skyes rang bzhin dbyer med la// gcig dang du ma'i cha shas med// gsal ba'i yid kyi thig le la// rang drag gsal bas gnas pa'i tshe// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes gsal bar skye// rang byung ye shes dbyer med pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing// brjod cing bstan par mi nus pa// byin rlabs nyams kyis gsal bar mthong// gsang chen thabs kyi nyams myong bas// rgyu ba phyi nang rang bzhin 'chad// re dogs 'du shes stong par thim// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i ngo bor smin// gsang ba'i thabs kyis gang sbyar ba// g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas pa dag/ ma lus bde chen rang bzhin te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// gsang ba'i snod bcud thig le yis// thabs dang nyams la brtan goms na// bde chen sku gsung thugs su gsal// yon tan rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin la// bla ma'i stobs kyis rang rig pa// bde chen thig le mnyam sbyor bas// zag pa med pa'i bde chen gsal// skyob pa thabs kyi bder gnas shing// gar thabs rlung la dbang bsgyur bas// ma lus lhan cig skyes pa ste// rgas dang rgud dang dman pa dang// ma ning la sogs bcad pa yis// thabs dang man ngag la gnas pas// ji ltar bsgrubs kyang tshe 'dis 'grub// rang lus thabs kyi mchog nyid de// so so ngo bor rnam par bstan// gzhan du dman pa'i rnal 'byor pas// nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po gsal 'gyur zhing// dbang bskur man ngag la gnas pas// dka' thub gdung ba spangs pa yin// bar chad med par 'grub 'gyur te// gsang sngags thabs kyi rgyal po 'di// sku gsung thugs la rtag gnas shing// 'dod lnga bde la gnas pa yi// sgyu 'phrul dra bar thabs kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// lus gnas thabs kyis ma rtogs pa// bsam pa'i sgyu 'phrul la brten cing// cho ga thabs chen ldan pas 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab ldan// dbang la brten nas goms pa yis// thams cad bde chen rgyas btab pas// bdud dang zhen pa kun las 'das// kun 'byung ba yi sgyu 'phrul che// mnyam la mnyam par mi gnas pa'i// ma skyes bde chen thig le 'di// sna tshogs snang zhing nyid la rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ skal ldan grol ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// chags pa'i thabs chen las byung ba// gsang ba'i sgyu 'phrul dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi bshad pa yin// dus gsum gdul bya'i khyad par rnams// 'dod dang 'khrig pa la mos pas// rdul snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kun// lha

mor snang nas rol bar 'gyur// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rdul snyed pa// zhing khams bye ba rdul snyed du// zhing dang longs spyod dga' bar bcas// thabs kyis rol pa mdzad pa yin// gang du thabs dang shes rab kyi// thig le dga' bder bcas pa yi// zhing khams phyi nang snod bcud bcas// bde chen lhan cig skyes par gsal// ma lus ji snyed snang ba kun// dri med thig le las 'byung zhing// tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gsang ba'i thig ler rang bzhin 'jug/ rgyal ba rdul snyed btsun mor bcas// lha dang lha mo 'khor lor bcas// bde ba rim gyis gang ba yis// dga' dang blta dang 'khyud pa dang// 'o dang 'khor dang 'bud 'jo dang// zhal sbyor brtse dang mnye ba dang// 'jib dang b+ha ga gar 'dzin ston// rol pa'i gar ni sna tshogs ston// gsung ni 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis// phra zhing dal ba'i glu blangs te// 'jam zhing chags pa'i tshig dag gis// gzhan yang yid 'pham rmongs par byed// bde ba chen po rang 'bar bas// nam mkha' mtha' ltar mi gnas pa'i// rang byung thig le mi g.yo ba// tha ma zhen pa kun las 'das// re dang dogs pa kun zhi ba'i// rang byung ye shes gnas pa yi// bde tshogs rgyu 'bras kun dang bral// gsang chen bde ba'i ngo bo nyid// gsang chen rig par rang gsal ba// stong dang bde bar mi phyed pa'i// mkha' ltar rdul bral mi gnas pa// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gnas// rdo rje thig le mi phyed gzugs// rang byung bde bar kun snang nas// 'jug dang mi 'jug yul las 'das// dus gsum 'jug pa yongs kyis med// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// bskal pa mi 'gyur thog ma la// skal ldan mngon rdzogs rgyal po yis// rdul snyed rdo rje 'dzin pa la// 'dod 'dzin zhen pa grol ba'i thabs// man ngag dbang gi thabs kyis bstan// thog mtha' med pa'i bde ba che// rang byung thig le bsam mi khyab// chags bral chags chen 'dul ba'i phyir// thabs chen grol ba sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// rdo rje 'chang ba'i 'khor tshogs la// 'das pa'i rgyal ba kun gyis bshad// sgyu 'phrul rol pa chen po 'di// ma lus 'dus pa'i thabs yin te// gsang ba nyams las mngon snang gis// rtog ge dman pa'i spyod yul min// gang du thabs kyi snang ba 'di// snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// 'dod chags bde bar rgyas byed pa// gsang ba'i thabs chen rgyud 'di bshad/ de dag thabs kyis gsal bar byed// de dag gang la thabs mtshon pa// mi 'dul log par 'jug par 'gyur// bde chen rol pa'i rang bzhin 'di// thabs chen dbang gi rang bzhin la// ting 'dzin rgyud pa'i thabs kyis

gsal// gzhan du sus kyang rtogs mi 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med rdul bral du// theg dman dka' thub rtog ge yi// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs pa// gsang ba'i thabs kyis mngon du 'char// ye shes dag dang ting 'dzin rgyud// las kyis gang la gsal byas pa// dngos po ji snyed ma lus pa// bde ba chen po nyid du 'gyur// 'di la khrus dang gtsang sbra med// cho ga sngags dang phyag rgya med// 'jigs dang ngo tsha zhen pa med// rang byung bde ba nyid du gsal// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thabs chen po// ma lus bcud 'dus thig le la// ye shes rdzogs pa'i ro ldan pa// gsang sngags thabs kyis mngon sum gsungs// thog ma med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// thabs dang shes rab rol pa yis// bde ba chen po las byung ba'i// zhing khams rgyal ba nyid du snang// gsang ba'i ye shes bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus thig le gcig 'dus pa// thabs dang ldan pa'i snod bcud pas// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal// ma lus rol pa bde mchog ste// rgyal ba rnal 'byor chen po rnams// bde ba chen po ro gcig pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa nyid// rang byung sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// nyi zla thabs kyis gang mtshon pa// zhing khams lus su bcas pa dag/ zag med bde bar snang ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// gang yin thabs kyi sa bon rnams// rdul snyed grangs las 'das pa rnams// rdo rje ye shes hU~M tshogs kyis// 'dres dang 'dzag pa'i thig le can// phyag rgya lnga dang bcas pa yis// thams cad rang rig gzugs su snang// bcud gsum las skyes bde ba la// rig pa bzhin du nyams gsal ba// phyi nang thig ler brtan 'gyur na// mi shigs thig le 'pho 'gyur med// mi 'gyur 'gro 'ong gnas dmigs bral// rten gyi thig le gnas gsum du// byed pa sdom pa thabs dang bral// snod bcud bde bar snang byed pa// mun snang gser 'gyur lta bur bshad// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// bye brag brgyad cu la sogs pa// zhing khams rdul snyed ma lus pa// thabs mchog rol pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs// gsang ba'i gsang snying don 'di gsungs// ye shes mngon snang thabs kyi lung// ma lus bde ba rgyas byed pa// skal ldan rnams kyi blo la snang// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po 'di// byang chub rdo rje bcas pa la// thabs ldan gsang chen 'di gsungs te// gzhan pa dag la ma gtogs so// dpal ldan thabs kyi rgyal po 'di// slob dpon dam par mi 'dzin cing// dam dang man ngag med pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde chen 'di// bskal par mtshon kyang mi mthong ngo// rig pa thabs kyi brtul zhugs 'di// gang gis spangs te mi spyod do// ji ltar nam

mkha'i mtha' 'tshol ltar// byang chub 'bras bu cung zad med// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// bde ba chen po mngon phyung ba'i// gsang ba'i thig le thabs kyi rgyud// 'gro ba zhen cing chags pa dang// thabs kyis mngon par grol byed pa// lhag pa'i lta ba gsal byed cing// spyod pa rmad byung mthu yis ni// ma lus byin rlabs bde 'byung zhing// ye shes lnga yi 'khor lo bskor// ma lus bde chen snang ba la// mi mthun tha dad yod ma yin// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba thabs kyi grol ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// da ltar phyogs bcu rdul snyed kyi// zhing khams phyi nang snod bcud bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bshad// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung gsang ba bla na med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba chos kyi dbyings// gang du dmigs pa med pa ni// bde ba chen pos khyab pa ste// dbang dang man ngag la brten pa'i// dgongs pa thabs kyi khyad par gyis// gsang ba'i gsang ba mngon du 'char// kun tu sgyu 'phrul zab mo 'di// dbyer med dra ba don chen po// thog mtha' med pa'i don chen po// rang bzhin thabs kyi stobs las snang// thig le snod bcud bcas pa yi// ma lus thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid// rang la gnas pa'i bde ba ste// sA lu'i khrod dang mar me bzhin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor bshad// rnam dag bla na med pa yi// sa dang rnam thar ji snyed par// ma lus pa yi thabs las byung// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin mchog/ sgyu 'phrul thal chen rang bzhin las// dra ba shes rab gsal bar 'gyur// gnyis med thig le las byung ba// gsang chen thig le las kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma lus thig le bde chen po// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang byung thabs kyi ngo bor gnas// gnyis med thabs las byung ba yi// byang chub thig le bcud las byung// zla ba nyi ma rtsegs pa las// dra ba bcas pa'i ye shes nyid// rang snying thig le bcas pa yi// 'bab 'dzegs gang las dbang bsgyur ba'i// ye shes rang byung thogs pa med// gsang ba'i thabs dang log rtog nyid// nyi zla phrad pa'i bzung bzlog gis// bar chad med pa'i lam las byung// gsang ba'i sa dang sems nyid rdzogs// log rtog 'gro 'ong thig ler bcas// gsang ba'i gnas nas gnas spyod pa// rtse nas rtse ru thogs pa med// bcu gsum sa la the tshom med// phyogs bcu rnal 'byor pho mo dag/ bde ba chen po dbugs phyung bas// rlung dang thig le sems su bcas// ma

rtogs skyes la dbang thob pas// rdzogs pa'i thig le gang bskul bas// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar las byung// gsang ba'i byang chub thig le ni// zag pa med pa'i thabs kyis mtshon// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul mthar phyin pa// mthong ba'i don nyid ye shes rdzogs// phyag rgya mtshon pa'i ngo bo las// bde ba chen por rgyas btang bas// gang yang mtshon pa las 'das pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// da ltar phyogs bcur mtha' yas pa// rang byung thig le rang snang bde// me long dang ni gzugs brnyan ltar// gsang ba'i thabs la brten pa mthong// gsang chen thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul pas// ma bcos dra ba mtshon par snang// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa ni// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min// gsang gsung thabs la brten pa yis// skye ba 'di yis rnam par grol// dwangs ma'i thig le bcud 'dus pa// thabs kyi snying por goms pas na// rang byung rig pa bde chen po// 'gro 'ong re dogs med pas gsal// bdag nyid ma lus kun snang ba// zhen pa rang gi ngo bor ldog/ zhen pa ma bcos rang snang bas// thams cad lhan cig skyes par gsal// pad+ma rdo rje la brten pa'i// thabs kyi lam la brten pa yis// rig pa phyi nang bcas pa'i sems// ma lus bde chen ngo bor grol// thams cad bde ba chen po la// zhen pas brtags pa rang snang ba// dngos med dngos min gnyis ka min// thabs dang shes rab sbyor med pa'o// gang du rig pa dbyer med na// bde chen stong pa'i thig le la// mkha' ltar dngos dang dngos med spangs// 'di nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'o// sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer med pa'i// thig le gsang ba'i bdag nyid ni// thams cad bde chen dbyer med de// thams cad khyab pa'i tshul du snang// rang byung thig le bdag nyid ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyis// shes pa gang la goms pa yis// da lta nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan goms shing// thabs chen thig le gsal brtan na// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i yid// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// gsang mchog thabs kyi rol pa yi// bde chen mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid// skal ngan dman pa'i yul min te// rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa'i yul// nyi zla gnas pa'i thig le nyid// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bcud yin te// man ngag thabs dang 'brel pa yis// sdug bsngal med par rtogs shing 'grub// rang lus thabs kyi rgyal po la// chags pa thabs ldan gang zag gis// 'dod lnga rol pas bder spyad na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// bde chen rol pa'i thabs med na// tha mal zhen pa'i snang ba la// khyad par bye brag ci bsten kyang// lhun

grub rdo rje 'chang dang bral// rdo rje pad+ma ldan 'gyur zhing// byin rlabs thabs kyis gang spyod na// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin du// 'khor ba bde ba chen por 'gyur// zab cing rgya che mtshungs med pa'i// gsang ba'i rgyud kyi phyi ma 'di// dug gis dug nad sel ba ltar// thabs chen mchog tu shes par bya// skal med dman dang dbang med pa'i// log par gyur pa'i gang zag gis// bskal pa bye bar ci bsten kyang// log pa'i lam du ltung bar 'gyur// rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo ni// sku dang gsung thugs gang gnas pa// bcud dang bde chen thabs mtshon pa// man ngag ldan pas shes par bya// rang byung bde ba chen po'i rten// 'khor lo gdugs dang srog shing gsum// dwangs ma thig le ye shes bcas// lnga ltar gsal zhing gcig tu thim// bde bas bde ba gsal byed pa// dka' thub 'jig rten chos dang bral// gang zag chags dang bral ba'i yig/ bde chen rol pa'i thabs 'jug cing// man ngag thabs kyis bde spyad na// thams cad bde chen bzhin du sbyor// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung mchog ste// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di// sgra dang tshad ma kun spangs nas// rol pa'i thabs chen ldan pas gsungs// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// mngon pas mthong bas gong min te// las dang yon tan mtha' bral zhing// dwangs ma ye shes 'khor lo bskor// 'dod pa lnga yis brgyan par gnas// nyi zla gsang ba'i pad+mar ldan// dga' zhing ldan pas gang 'jug na// thig le gong 'og 'bab pa la// dga' ba brgyad dang mtshungs par gnas// phra rags bcu drug shes par bya// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas// kun tu khyab cing bar ma chad// thun mong thun mong ma yin pas// sprul pa'i phreng ba rgyun ma bcad// gsang ba rang byung snying po la// rang bzhin thabs kyi khyad par gyis// bcings gyur rnam par grol ba'i thabs// ma lus 'dir ni shes par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// lha dang lha mor gnas spyad pa'i// skyes bu thabs kyi rang bzhin te// bud med shes rab shes par bya// gsang ba'i thig le 'og min gnas// las dang yon tan cher ldan zhing// ro dang nyams dang ye shes nyid// snying po thig le kun nas zlum// dga' bzhi thig le kun dang bral// nyi zla pad+ma'i rang bzhin kyang// gnas te sku gsung thugs nyid du// rang bzhin thabs dang 'brel bar bshad// tha mal zhen pa kun sdud cing// bde chen ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil// gsang ba'i thabs dang mnyam sbyor bas// gsang ba'i nyi zla pad+mor bcas// thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur te// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang// las dang

yon tan dus gcig rdzogs// gsang mchog pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde chen rol pa 'di gsungs te// de las gzhan dang 'brel pa yis// bskal pa bye bar shes mi 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ da ltar rnal 'byor thabs kyis grol ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig pa ste// gsang ba brtul zhugs rol pa 'di// kun gyi phyi ma rig pa mchog/ ma lus kun las mchog 'gyur zhing// thabs mchog bde chen phyag rgya mchog/ ma lus thabs kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdag gzhan bde chen phyag rgya sems// rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma lus rol pa thugs nyid 'di// skal ngan dman dang rigs chad dang// byis pa rgan po ma ning dang// dka' thub lha ngan rnam par spang// thabs chen yid bzhin nor bu 'di// zab dang 'phel 'grib mi gnas dang// thabs chen skal ldan spyod yul de// gzhan la mi gnas spyod yul min// bskal pa bye bar mi 'byang pa'i// las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal dang// sgrib pa bag chags thams cad kun// thabs chen gsang bas mngon du sel// dka' thub gdung bas lus gzir cing// lus sems sdug bsngal dbang bsgyur ba'i// sangs rgyas sras su gyur pas kyang// phyogs tsam reg par nus ma yin// kun gyis spangs pa'i chags sdang lnga// 'dod lnga dran rtog phra rags bcas// thabs kyis de dag zil mnan nas// rnal 'byor bde ba'i pha rol phyin// tshad ma gzhan dang bral ba yi// rang rig bde chen byang chub sems// ngo bo rtog dpyod las 'das pa// 'gro 'ong mi yul bsam las 'das// thams cad byang chub snying po mchog/ gang phyir bde ba ye shes ni// cho ga thabs las shes par 'gyur// thabs bral thabs las rnam par 'jog/ rang bzhin thabs kyi pha rol phyin// thabs chen bde bas gang rtogs pa// bde bas dka' thub zil gyis gnon// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ni// rtogs shing goms par grol 'gyur te// gzhan gyis nam yang 'grub ma yin// rang bzhin rtogs goms byin rlabs kyis// dper na nyi 'od rin chen bzhin// las dang bsod nams rkyen dag las// chu dang me long gzugs brnyan ltar// dngos po ji ltar gsal ba ltar// thabs dang man ngag stobs kyis 'grub// sgyu 'phrul chen po thig le nyid// thabs dang shes rab gsal 'gyur bas// bde ba gsal la mi rtog pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs su snang// rang nyid phyag rgya stobs chen gyis// mi mthun gnyen po bral ba las// thabs chen gsang ba mthar phyin pas// man ngag ldan pas 'grub 'gyur

te// rang rig yon tan mngon snang bzhin// bye brag brgyad cu la sogs pa// bstan pa'i khyad par ci snyed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis snang ba ste// gsang ba 'dis ni rtogs par 'gyur// gang med de nyid mi 'byung phyir// dper na lus dang yan lag bzhin// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan par bcas// rang byung bstan pa rgya mtshor 'dus// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas par// thabs dang dka' bas gang btsal bas// zab mo'i thabs rgyud mi mthong ste// zab mo rgyal ba'i dgongs par bshad// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa// thabs chen bstan pa gang gsungs pa// thams cad yan lag snang ba ste// kun gyi snying po 'di gsungs pa'o// zhing khams phyi nang bsam yas par// gleng gzhi gleng bslang rtog pa dang// cho ga'i dkyil 'khor grangs med par// thams cad 'dir gnas pa nyid do// 'das dang ma byon da ltar ba'o// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// lam mchog gsang ba 'di yin te// 'byung gnas 'byung nyid de phyir ro// khyad par thabs chen sgyu 'phrul 'di// gsang ba'i gsang mchog dam pa 'di// gzhan dang dbang po dman pa dang// ma dag pa la ma gnang ngo// rnal 'byor gsang bar zhugs rnams kyis// gsang chen rol pa'i thal rgyud las// dbang dang man ngag stobs kyis brtag/ tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// dka' thub gdung ba kun bral zhing// longs spyod lnga ldan cho ga yis// 'dus pa med pa'i spyod pa yis// 'jigs pa med par rnam par grol// nam mkha' lta bur gang rtogs pas// rgyal po'i spyod pa la brten na// bar chad med par gsal goms pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// gzhan yang gsang chen thig le ni// gsang ba'i yid 'phrog thabs kyi rgyud// ma lus thabs kyis rol spyad na// skad cig tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur// ma lus 'ching ba yul gyi dug/ rgyal ba'i dgongs pas dbang bsgyur nas// phyi nang yul sems snod bcud bcas// thabs chen bde bar mngon du gsal// bye ba brgya phrag mang po'i tshogs// lha rnams dang ni klu rnams dang// 'gro ba skal ldan thams cad kyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// ci 'dod par ni spyod bzhin du// dag pa dang ni bde ba dang// yid bde ba dang sems bde bas// ma lus gsang ba nyid du blta// rnal 'byor pho mor 'brel ba yis// ma lus tshogs la longs spyod cing// blta dang bgad dang 'khyud pa dang// dbang po thug dang zhal la sogs// phrad dang spyad pa la sogs pas// dga' zhing nyams dang thig le bzhi// lus sems dga' bar grol bar 'gyur// byin rlabs thabs kyi nyams ldan pas// nyams dang re dogs med pa yis// glu dang gar dang rol

pa'i thabs// sna tshogs thabs ni ston par mdzad// ma dag pa dang mi 'tshams shing// dag pa la 'tshams re dogs med// thabs spyod bye brag mtha' yas pa// ma bcos thabs kyi spyod par gnas// gsang chen rnal 'byor spyod pa 'di// dga' dang spyangs pa'i rang bzhin las// gzhan dang byis pa tha mal dang// sgro skur ya gar gnas la sogs// byin na bar chad 'byung 'gyur te// dmyal ba yi dwags byol song sogs// bskal pa rdul snyed gnas 'gyur te// bde bas phongs pa nyid du 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// spyangs dang bsags pa gang yin pa// skal ldan 'ga' yi spyod yul te// bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu snying po nyid// gsang ba chen po thal ba'i rgyud// ma lus dag pa'i 'jig rten du// skad cig byin rlabs snang mdzad pa// gsang chen rmad byung theg par bshad// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba theg chen bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rtog pa kun las rab 'das pa// brtag pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon snang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis// phyi nang yul sems dbang por bcas// ma bcos rang rig dbyings su 'dus// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yang// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mi gnas tshul gyis gnas 'gyur te// de la gnas pa gang yang med// 'byung ba lnga dang phung po lnga// khams dang skye mched la sogs pa// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pa'i// gnyis su med par rang bzhin gnas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul snyed pa// zhing dang longs spyod mdzad pa dang// ma lus gnyis med snang ba ste// dbyer med rig pa rang snang ngo// phyi dang nang dang yul sems dang// ji snyed spyod yul 'gyur ba kun// nam mkha' la ni gza' skar ltar// chos kyi dbyings las don 'byung ste// bya byed med par ngang gis snang// phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi// kun gzhi thabs kyis gsal byas pas// ma lus rang snang 'jig rten pas// spang dang spang bar bya ba med// dbang po yul dus rnam shes tshogs// ma lus gnyis med rang snang ba// skyes bu thabs kyi spyod yul te// skal ldan dag gis shes par bya// thugs kyi bde ba chos kyi dbyings// rang rig bsam pa'i yul las 'das// de nyid ji ltar gsal ba ltar// thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'dzin// gang dag gang la dbang ba ni// 'di ni dbang po mchog tu gsungs// brten pa'i shes rab bcas pa yi// dmigs par bya ba'i yul nyid do// ji snyed chos rnams bsam yas pa// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// rten gyi bya ba thams cad

kyang// dbang po yul du 'dus par bshad// ji snyed chos rnams rdul snyed pa// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis// nang dang phyi ru bstan pa kun// rang rig ye shes mchog tu gsungs// thabs mkhas bye brag cir bstan pa// thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin// e ma gar mkhan 'khor lo bde// ma skyes stong pa'i rang bzhin las// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bde ba'i mchog/ gsang dbang pad+mar 'brel ba na// bde ba mchog tu 'byung 'gyur te// skad cig tsam gyi bde ba yis// bag chags thams cad zil gyis gnon// rang byung las kyi sgyu 'phrul las// gsang ba'i thabs dang ldan pa yis// bde chen gsang bar gyur pa na// spyod yul pad+ma lta bur 'gyur// rdo rje dbang yul 'dus pa las// phyi nang yul sems bcas pa'i chos// nyi zla thabs kyi 'gro 'ong la// ma lus 'dir ni 'dus pa nyid// gsang ba thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul las// ji snyed chos kun rang bzhin 'char// thams cad thig le bde chen la// yul dbang phyi nang spro bsdu med// rang byung thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul ni// dkyil 'khor kun gyi thabs bcud de// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// 'bras bu rang bzhin gsal bar 'char// thabs la stong pas rgyas btab cing// stong pa la ni bde bas btab// ro gcig bde ba chen po rgyas// phyi nang yul sems kun tu btab// ma lus bde chen thig le ste// dngos po nam yang yod ma yin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// gnyis med bde ba rol pa'i mchog/ gsang ba dbang gi cho ga las// bde chen lam la bar chad med// dbang po mchog gi yul du gyur// de bas gzhan gyi spyod yul min// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// rang rig bde chen gnyis med 'di// man ngag thabs kyis mtshon pa las// tshig dang yi ge'i spyod yul min// ma lus gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// gsang ba thabs kyis gang mtshon na// bag chags bsal ba'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gsal// thabs chen rol pa mngon bstan pa'i// gsang ba kun 'dus thabs kyi rgyud// skal ngan dman la sbas pa ste// thabs chen ldan pas shes par bya// skye med sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// thabs chen rol pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// 'gro ba chags pa can don du// sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul bar mdzad// sna tshogs bcud ldan thig le yis// 'khor lo yul dang dbang po chos// thabs chen las byung bde ba yis// rig pa'i 'khor lo khengs pa yis// phyi nang yul sems chos rnams kun// ngo bor bde chen mya ngan 'das// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// dbang po yul sems ldan pa la// lus dang sems las byung ba kun// rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang tshwa chu ltar// rang bzhin bde ba chen

por thim// brtags pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pa// ngo bo nyid ni cir snang yang// rang bzhin ngang la dbyer med de// thams cad ma bcos ngang du zhi// ma byas rang byung rang snang bas// yul dang dbang por bcas pa kun// ngo bo gcig tu gsal bar gnas// ma lus ye shes brda' las 'das// ma lus ye shes rang snang zhing// sgyu 'phrul thabs kyi me long la// dra ba gzugs brnyan rang bzhin 'char// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje dril bu tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang dag don la 'gal byed cing// thams cad log pa'i dbang song ba'i// spyod pa de yi 'bras bu bshad// rang bzhin dbyer med don gcig las// log pa'i rtog la zhen dbang gis// dbyer med mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las// bdag gzhan bde sdug sna tshogs snang// log rtog rgyu 'bras zhen brtags pa// dngos med log rtog brtags dbang gis// bag chags zhen goms dbang gis na// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin brtags par gyur// thams cad gsang ba'i rang bzhin las// rig pa'i khyad par cir snang ba// rang rig ye shes de bzhin nyid// dngos med dngos snang de bzhin nyid// ma mthong tha dad dbang dang ldan// rang bzhin don las spangs don ci// dgag bsgrub don la nges brtson nas// gnyen po'i thabs kyis gang sbyangs pa// rang rig rang la bcings pa yin// dka' thub sdom pas gzir ba yis// las dang bya ba la brten pas// gnyis ka rnal 'byor la brten pas// 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa yin// gsang ba thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// gang la brten nas rtogs goms pas// dka' thub rtsol ba kun spangs nas// tshe gcig 'bras bu rang las 'byung// slob dpon thabs la mkhas pa dang// cho ga'i rim pa dang ldan pas// gang ltar brtsam pa de bzhin du// nges par 'byung bar the tshom med// log pa'i dbang du zhugs pa dang// gang du sbyangs min rang bzhin ngan// le lo g.yengs pas bslus pa dang// 'khor ba na ni yun ring gnas// byang chub sems ni ma skyes shing// dad dang dam tshig ring spangs shing// bla ma dag la rgyab kyis phyogs// dbang dang man ngag mi ldan par// gsang sngags rang bzos 'jal bar byed// log pa'i spyod pa'i dbang song ba// 'di lta bu yi sdig can ni// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing// zhe sdang la sogs nyon mongs ldan// bag chags ngan pas rang bzhin bcings// log rtog zhen po'i mthur ldan pas// gang ltar bgrod pas log pa'i lam// log pa la ni gzhol bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// dam pa rnams kyi yul yin

te// dman pa rtog ge la sogs pa'i// yul du nam yang 'gyur ma yin// gang du 'ching ba'i las rnams kyang// thabs dang ldan pas grol bar 'gyur// gang du thabs dang mi ldan pas// thams cad 'ching ba'i mdud par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen 'di// thabs dang man ngag mi ldan par// dregs dang nga rgyal dbang song bas// thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung// gang du thabs dang mi ldan pas// 'dod lnga chags pas rol spyod na// thar pa'i bde ba spangs nas ni// 'khor ba las ni thar mi 'gyur// gang du dngos po'i rang bzhin la// bde sdug zhen par mi gnas kyang// las dang nyon mongs zhen pa la// thams cad log pa'i stobs su snang// gang du gang med de bzhin nyid// de la de snang ngo bo nyid// gang la de yi rang bzhin ni// gang ma yin te de bzhin nyid// 'gro 'ong gnas pa las grol ba'i// mtshan nyid zhen pa las 'das pa// ngo bo log pa'i rkyen gyis bsgyur// tha mar log pa'i grong khyer brgyud// dngos 'dzin log pa'i dug nad kyis// dngos bral dngos por rang btags pa// mthong ba log pa'i stobs ldan pas// 'khor ba'i grong khyer thar pa med// chags dang chags bral ltung ba'i gnas// zhan dang spang dang 'geg dang sbyang// bsgyur sogs mtshan ma'i dbang song bas// nam mkha' la ni 'phyos pa bzhin// sdug bsngal rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur// theg pa mchog la mi chags shing// 'dod lnga chags pa spangs pa dang// bu mo mtshan ldan spangs pa ni// thabs bral 'khor ba'i rtsa ba yin// thabs dang bral ba rang bzhin gnas// tshangs pa bde ba'i skar khung nas// thig le 'bar nas rgyu ba ni// thabs kyi bsam pa'i lam gang bcad// 'bar ba brgyad po thim par bya// shar ba rdo rje hU~M gi bdag/ rtsa ba lo mas gang bsdus pa// yid ni smin mtshams gyen la gtad// gsang ba'i gter la longs spyod bya// gsang ba'i yid ni 'pho 'gyur na// bya ba la sogs rang dor nas// rnam shes sa la thim 'gyur te// sa yang chu la thim par 'gyur// chu ni me la thim gyur pas// de nyid rlung la thim par 'gyur// rlung ni snying po'i thig ler te// de las me long gzugs bzhin du// ma skyes stong pa'i grong du 'pho// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rgyu ba med cing zag pa med// sha khrag gshang gci khu ba med// nam mkha' lta bur gnas pa nyid// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas chen la// rgyal ba kun gyi gzhal yas khang// til 'bru lta bu'i pho brang ste// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i rtse mo ste// bam dbyibs gnyis med phrad pa las// nyi zla phrad pa'i thig le las// rim par skye ba'i ye shes ro// gnas nas gnas su 'pho ba yin// bcu drug skye bar the tshom

med// thig le zung 'jug bde ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin phyir// bag chags mtha' yas kun sel te// 'bras bu lhun grub rang la 'char// rang byung thig le rten dang bcas// lus can kun la khyab pa ste// zag pa yod med kun dang bral// thig le chen po g.yo ba med// thabs dang shes rab thams cad ni// sbyor ba'am rang gi stobs las byung// nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa ni// rang gi stobs kyis bzung ba ni// gnas dang gnas min khyab pa'i bar// gsal brtan nges las ye shes skye// gsang ba'i thabs kyis nges skye na// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// bcu drug rim par 'phel bar 'gyur// rang gi nyams las shes par bya// phyi nang bde ba'i thig le la// ma lus chos kun rang gnas pas// rnal 'byor rig pa'i thabs tshul gyis// gzhan du ma yengs tshul gyis blta// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// 'gro 'ong 'phel 'grib med pa ni// dus gsum bral ba'i thig le ste// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur 'jig med// lus sems yid byed med pa yi// bde ba rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen zag pa'i yul las 'das// thig le 'gro 'ong rgyun dang bral// nga rgyal phrag dog ldan pa dang// yo byad yod dang med pas kyang// thabs 'dis grol 'gyur the tshom med// gsang ba'i thabs la gang gnas pa// rigs dang na tshod gang yang rung// phyi nang yul sems chos thams cad// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor ldog/ dbang dang man ngag byin rlabs kyis// sgra dang bral ba'i bstan pa nyid// snying gi dkyil nas byung 'gyur te// bde chen thig le 'phel 'grib med// rang rig sems kyi bde ba la// rgyu 'bras dang ni zag pa dang// 'byung 'jug yengs dang ma yengs med// bde chen khyab pa rang bzhin gnas// gsang ba yid gnyis med pa yis// thabs kyi bye brag bskul gyur na// ye shes nam mkha' mtha' thug med// thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur// gsang chen rol pa'i spyod pa las// tha mal pa dang dman pa med// dka' thub gtsang sbra zhum pa med// lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya med// dkyil 'khor sbyin bsreg 'phro 'du med// de bas sgyu 'phrul thabs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnyis med bde chen dbyer med pa// thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid// nyi zla thabs dang shes rab kyi// ro gnyis 'dus pa'i stobs las skyes// de la mi rtog rtogs pa'i bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ dwangs ma'i bde ba la brten nas// rten med bde ba nges par skye// ma skyes nam mkha' lta bu ni// rtogs dang goms pa'i stobs kyis 'grub// ma skyes bde chen ma rtogs par// mtshon pa'i thabs la bder gnas na// dngos po

zhen pa'i 'du shes kyis// ngan 'gro'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur// bud med rigs la gang brtags pa// lam dang nus pa'i khyad par gyis// 'ching grol khyad par de bzhin te// zag pa yod med don gyis brtags// gsang ba'i bud med bsten par bya// lus can yid can ye shes can// gang du thabs dang goms pa dang// mthar phyin lhun gyis grub par sbyor// tshogs bsags las rgyud dag pa dang// thabs lam mchog la jon sbyangs dang// dam pa mchog gi spyod yul te// gzhan dang bskal pa bye bas min// gang dang bral ba'i bya ba thams cad ni// srid pa'i rgya mtshor sdug bsngal zhen pa ni// tha ma dman dang log pa'i dbang song bas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thabs dang bral ba yin// 'khor ba'i dug 'joms thabs mchog rnams spangs nas// zhen chags mtshan ma dka' thub lam spyod pa// long ba bde bor g.yang sa snyogs pa ltar// sgo gsum thabs chen bral ba ltung ba'i rgyu// gang du dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs can// gsang ba'i spyod pa dga' zhing rigs ma bsten// lus dang sems kyi 'khor lo bde ba'i khu bas 'gengs// 'jig rten zil gnon 'khor ba'i mun pa sel// ye shes sgron mes bde chen gsal bar byed// thabs chen ldan pas pad+ma la bzhugs nas// lus nyid bde bas sems kyi don bstan nas// rang rig byang chub sems ni bde chen 'khor lo can// sdug bsngal mtshan ma med par myur du 'byung// bskal pa brgya phrag du mar rab brtan pa'i// mun nag 'jigs su rung ba'i khang pa dag/ thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor bas brtsams pa yis// the tshom med par myur du sel bar byed// thog ma med pa'i bag chags thun mong dag/ thabs dang theg pa gzhan gyis gsal dka' ba// dbang dang man ngag thabs kyi mar me yis// skal ldan snying gi mun pa myur du sel// rang sems bde chen rten byed sems kyi rin po che// 'dod lnga longs spyod dga' dang bde bas gus brten na// 'bras bu lhun grub ya mtshan rmad byung ba// gzhan la rag ma lus par rang las 'byung bar 'gyur// thabs chen thabs las byung ba'i sku gsung thugs// bde chen zag med nam mkha' lta bu nyid// slob dpon mthu las 'dod pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// dman dang log pa'i thabs kyis 'grub pa med// gsang chen rol pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni// dus gsum rgyal bas byin gyis rlabs pa ste// dman pa mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dpag med du ma yis// de yis ba spu'i bu gar char mi nus// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ thams cad yid dang chos su 'dus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang du thabs ni med pa

yi// brtags pa'i sgyu 'phrul du ma las// bsdus pa'i thabs ni bshad par bya// rtog pa'i bye brag thams cad ni// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa ste// sku gsung thugs su bsdus pa nyid// rang rig chos kyi dbyings su thim// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rdul snyed pa// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ngo bo ste// de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ de nyid ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// phyag rgya dang ni sngags dag dang// bzlas pa dang ni mchod pa dang// dkyil 'khor sbyin bsreg la sogs pa// dang po'i las can la bshad de// rgyud kyi phyi mo 'dir mi 'dod// spros pa can la bshad pa yin// gsang ba las kyang gsang gyur pa// rang lus dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang// lha yi dkyil 'khor grangs med dang// mchod dang bzlas pa sbyin bsreg dag/ thabs kyi cho ga mkhas pa yis// rang gi lus la bskyed par bya// rang lus bde ba chen po'i dbyings// mkhas pas thabs la gnas pa yis// khrus dang dka' thub mi bya ste// longs spyod kun gyis tshim par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcud dag dang// mi mo mtshan ldan bcu drug ma// mtshan ldan lus rgyas yid 'ong ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// bdag gi lus sems mchod par bya// gtsang sme'i rtog pa mi bya zhing// bslang mo'i bya ba smyung gnas min// lus sems bde bas brgyan byas nas// bde bas bde ba myur du 'grub// tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor rin po che// bye phrag thig le mang po rnams// kun las 'dus par gyur pa ni// dngas snyigs thig ler 'dus pas na// bcud kyi thig ler gsal ba la// ro lnga'i khyad par kun rdzogs pas// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bor gnas// tshangs pa bde ba chen po yis// sems kyi bum pa rgyas pa yis// lus kyi bde ba rgyas byas nas// rang la dgongs pa lhun gyis grub// 'dul bar bya bas kun kyang spyad// gsang spyod bde ba'i thig le la// yon tan ma lus lhun rdzogs shing// zhen pa ma lus rang log nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo gsal// bde ba rang gi gsal ba la// mtshan ma thams cad kun zhi nas// sgyu 'phrul dra bar gnas pa ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad do// rang lus thabs kyi bder gnas pa// rim pa dbang gis byin brlabs pa'i// thabs kyi ye shes mngon thob pa// bcu gsum sa rdzogs yon tan thob// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor la// rgyu dang 'bras bu kun rdzogs pas// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// ma lus bdag nyid las byung ba// dpag bsam shing dang rin chen bzhin// dang por mtshon pa'i dbang thob pas// zhen med bde ba chen po skye// rig pa ma skyes bde ba'i sems// thabs la mkhas par 'byung bar 'gyur// zhen cing 'dzin pa grol bar

'gyur// bde ba chen por rab gnas pa// thabs dang ldan pa'i rim nas rim// bde ba chen por mthar thug med// ji ltar tshes nas bcu drug ltar// rang gi yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur// ting 'dzin nyams kyi drod ldan la// rig pa'i lha mo rol dbang gis// dang po nas ni sa brgyad bar// sa yi rim pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas phyogs bcu dag pa'i zhing// rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhal yas su// sa bcu'i dbang phyug rtsal rdzogs la// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun 'dus la// ye shes lha mor rol dbang gis// zhen pa tha ma rang dag nas// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa la// nyi ma rdul med shar ba ltar// sems dang sems las byung ba kun// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes shar// rig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// dang po rnam par smin pa ste// de nas ting 'dzin yid kyi lus// de nas sprul pa'i lus su ste// tha ma ye shes lus mthar phyin// dang po lha yi dbang po ste// gnyis pa rigs bzhi sems dpa'i tshul// gsum pa rgyal ba lngar gnas pa// mthar thug kun bzang rdo rje 'chang// ye shes rigs dang dkyil 'khor dang// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor kun 'dus shing// cho ga'i mtshan ma phyag rgya sogs// ma lus rtog pa 'dus pa ste// rtogs pa'i rgyal po bla na med// thabs mchog ma lus 'dir 'dus pa// dman pa'i grong khyer bcom pa yis// rang byung ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur// ji snyed theg pa'i bye brag dang// sngags dang phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dang// sbyin bsreg 'khor lo lha dang bcas// ji snyed rnam par ma bshad pa// 'di nyid mtshon pa'i thabs yin te// gzhan ni dgongs pa yod ma yin// de bas thabs mchog 'di nyid ni// rtog pa bsdus par bshad pa yin// phyogs bcu mtha' yas ma lus pa'i// rdul snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// thabs chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// 'bras bu kun kyang 'dir bsdus pa'o// gang phyir dngos po 'dir mthong bas// blta ba thams cad 'dir 'dus pa'o// rnal 'byor thabs chen rtogs pa la// gtsang sme blang dor mi gnas pas// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyad// spyod pa cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o// dkyil 'khor dpag med mtha' yas pa// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'dus pa'o// bden gnyis dbyer med byang chub sems// mkha' ltar gnas pa'i don rtogs nas// dbang mchog nyid du 'di gsungs te// dbang gi cho ga 'dir 'dus pa'o// sgo gsum mnyam par rtogs pa las// thams cad bde ba chen po nyid// ma lus skyon bral dam pa la// bsrung bya ma lus 'dir 'dus pa'o// dngos grub kun gyi snying po mchog/ bde chen

mchog las gzhan med de// sku gsung thugs sogs dngos grub mchog/ grub pa kun gyi snying po mchog/ zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag dang// las kyi bye brag mtha' yas pa// byang sems bde ba la gnas pas// ma lus 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i lam mchog sems lnga ste// thabs mchog steng 'od las byung ba// g.yo ldang 'jug gnas mthar phyin pas// mi ldog thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mdor na bsdus dang lam dag dang// bsgrub dang las tshogs mtha' yas pa'i// rtogs pa mtha' las bsdus pa ste// zab mo phyi ma mchog gi yul// snga ma dag tu ma gsungs pa// dbang dang dam tshig dman pa dang// mtshan ma dag la mos dga' ba'i// blo dang rig pa'i spyod yul min// gsang ba zab mo'i thugs kyi rgyud// rol pa spyod cing dga' bder gnas// rigs chad dka' thub ldan pa spangs// dga' bde ldan pas gang spyad pa// ma lus yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// gsang sngags byin rlabs thabs kyis 'grub// bya ba ma lus mdor bsdus pa// bya ba med par yang dag 'grub// gsang ba thal rgyud chen po 'di// yon tan che ba kun gyi gnas// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rtog pa bsdus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba chen po rab nges pa// snying po las kyang snying po mchog/ sgyu 'phrul thal rgyud chen po 'di// phyogs bzhi dus bzhi ma lus pa'i// nam mkha'i mthar thug rgyal ba rnams// gsang ba gang la zhugs pa na// 'gro ba chags pa can don du// 'dul ba'i gang zag la dgongs nas// thal chen bde ba gsang ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba snyigs ma la dgongs nas// gsang ba 'di ni bstan par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo'i tshogs// bde ba chen po nyams ldan pas// dgyes pa'i brtse ba'i rol pa yis// thabs chen lam la gnas par mdzad// mkha' 'gro ma mo phra men ma// rgyal po 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// kun kyang thig le yid g.yos nas// blta dang chags pas 'khyud byas dang// brtse dang gzhib dang zhal sbyor dang// dkar 'dzin 'gying ba'i tshul gyis ston// sems dpa' lus 'dar mig dngas nas// chags pa'i garni sna tshogs byed// dga' ba'i tshul gyis tshig bshad brjod// kye kye rgyal ba thams cad gzigs// rgyal ba thams cad dgongs pa yi// thig le chen po thabs kyi mchog/ 'gro ba lam mchog bder ston pa// sgyu 'phrul dra ba lam gyi phugs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// bde chen rig pa bsam mi khyab// dngos nyid bde gsal thog mtha' med// nyon mongs kun las rab grol ba'i// 'khor ba bder gnas thabs kyi mchog/ 'dod chags chen po bde ba

che// 'dod chags chags bral chags pa 'joms// tha mal mtshan ma rnams 'jig cing// dga' zhing bde bar ldan pa yis// gdung zhing dka' thub sdug bsngal med// thun mong zhen pa log pa des// gang ltar bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// rig pa brgyud par grags pa 'di// thabs ldan rig pa 'dzin pa can// sa mthar pa tra ru tra lus// 'dod lnga thabs kyis don rtogs nas// chags can thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir// snying gi dkyil 'khor sgo phyes nas// mchog dga' bde ba lhan cig skyes// 'khor ba pad+ma'i sdong po ltar// ma spangs thabs su sbyar bas na// thal bas khengs pa'i 'jig rten du// thal ba'i dbang por lung bstan thob// sgyu 'phrul thabs kyi gsang rgyud 'di// dbang phyug rgyal po'i gter 'dzin cing// dgongs dang dbang phyug dam tshig ldan// chags thung thugs brtse 'gro ba skyob// gzi brjid che la nogs thub pa// 'di la gsang ba bstan pa gtad// 'gro ba skal ldan dad pa can// lus dang srog la mi blta zhing// brtul zhugs shes rab bstan par ldan// slob dpon bzung dang grogs dag la// srog dang mig ltar blta bya zhing// lus dang 'tsho ba longs spyod dang// bu dang chung ma rta la sogs// bdag gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin du// bla ma dus gsum blta bya ste// 'gal dang nyams par 'gyur ba'i las// rdul cha tsam yang mi bya'o// dbang phyug rgyal pos gnyer gtad pa'i// gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud chen 'di// rgyal sras rigs nges bder spyod cing// 'khor ba'i tha ba kun spangs shing// bde ba chen po 'phel byed pa// 'dzin pa 'dzin par byed pa la// gsang ba dam par nges par gtad// yid bzhin nor bu 'chang ba ltar// bsam pa yongs su rdzogs byed pa// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di// rig 'dzin rgyal sras kun la gtad// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud las/ sgyu 'phrul chen po bstan par gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//// sgyu 'phrul thal ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// [¿]rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma mi tra dang/ dz+nya na ku mA ras 'phan yul du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ gu+u h+ya gar+b+ha ta twa bi ni sh+tsa ya ma hA kro d+ha ba la yo gI shwa ra sid+d+ha mA yA dzA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho nyid nges pa'i khro bo chen po stobs kyi rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud/ dpal 'jam dpal rnon po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bshad pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po/ zhe sdang chen po// gti mug chen po de'i gzhal yas khang na/ dbyer med pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la sogs

pa du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de ltar til gyi gang bu bzhin gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'di skad gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i don chen gang bsgrub pa// kro d+ha nye ba'i lha bsam ste// rnal 'byor srog dang rtsol ba la// zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrub par bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang/ byang sems de dag thams cad kyis/ gsungs pa'i don yang dag par zhu ba'i phyir gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das legs chen po// rnal 'byor lam la legs brten tshe// ji ltar khro bos phyogs dgang srung// srog rtsol bden gnyis ji ltar bskyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// yid 'ong bde ba'i phyogs dag tu// las dang dgos pa ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor bar chad bzlog pa'i phyir// srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa' che// rang gi gnas la dga' ba'i phyir// bka' sdod gnod mdzes bdun du bskyed// gnod mdzes khro bo'i hU~M gi sgras// las rnams bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid 'khyil ba khro bo che// rang las phyung ba gnas su bzhag/ sprul pa chen po'i byin rlabs ni// zhal nas 'gugs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal// las dag myur bar bya ba'i phyir// las las las byung hU~M gi sgras// gang dag 'gugs pa'i las byas nas// gsum gyi mthar ni gnas byed pa'o// chos sku bde ba'i longs spyod dang// sprul pa'i byin rlabs skur sprul pa// gnas pas gnas ni dga' bar byed// de la bgegs 'gugs pa'i khro bo hU~M gi sngags ni/ o~M suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho// b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dod las gnod pa bkug ma thag/ rim par gnas su bsdu bar bya// de la bsdu ba'i snying po ni// sang ha ra Na hU~M/ de nas bsdus pa'i chos kun las// hU~M gi sgras bskyed hU~M las ni// hU~M las bskyed pa'i khro bo che// rnam rgyal gshin rje rta mgrin dang// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dbyug sngon can// mi g.yo mgon po 'dod pa'i rgyal// khams gsum rnam rgyal karmA kuN+Da li// gnod mdzes rgyal pos steng 'og phyogs mtshams bsrungs// gnod sbyin sngags kyi rgyal po la// mi g.yo mi 'gyur brtan par byos// zhes bsgo'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin 'dul mdzad bdud rtsi khro bo che// phur pa blangs nas byin brlabs sder mo'i tshig/ rta mgrin rim bzhin 'dod pa'i rgyal po gdab// 'dod pa'i rgyal po a mr-i kuN+Da li// gnod mdzes rgyal pos steng 'og rang byin brlab// de la byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni// o g+ha g+ha g+hAta ya g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+tAn phaT phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badzra kI la ya/

badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pA ya ti kA ya wA ka tsit+ta nan/ hU~M phaT phaT/ gzhan du bgegs bskrad pa ni/ las thams cad pa'i sngags 'di'o// A+oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dip+ta badzra tsakra hU~M phaT/ de nas gzhan du bgegs bskrad pa ni/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i las kyi sngags 'di'o// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+to t+ka Ta b+hai ra nA ya/ a si mu sa la/ par+shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li// kha kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAM/ bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas gnod bral rnal 'byor pas// gang du rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor zhes bya'i rim pa ni// rgyud 'dir rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// de rgyu srog dang rtsol ba ste// gnyid dang bya ba spangs nas bsgom// srog gi rgyu ni rnam bzhi ste// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// lte ba gsang gnas snying ga mgrin// gnas bzhi dag na gang gnas par// dpyid dang dbyar dang ston dang dgun// nam zla dus bzhi 'khor ba'i rgyun// sa dang rlung dang chu dang me// rlung dang rim bzhin 'byung byed pa// 'jug pa bag la zha bar byed// gyen dang mthur dang 'byung bar byed// gyen du g.yas g.yon gnyis ka nas// dkyil 'khor drag rim rgyu ba ni// khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag dang// drug brgya nyin mtshan 'byung byed pa// 'jug pa bag la zha bar bya// thun brgyad thun phran nyi shu bzhi// snga dro dang po phyi ma gnyis// srod kyi dang po tha ma gnyis// tho rangs dang po tha ma gnyis// sa chu me rlung rim bzhin du// dus kyi lha mo re re 'byung// lha mo de dag brgya la yang// srog gi rgyu ba nyis stong dang// brgya phrag bdun du 'byung bar byed// lha mo re rer lha mo gsum// lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag la yang// lha mo bzhi bzhir 'byung 'gyur te// lha mo bcu phrag dgu dang drug/ dbugs ni nyis brgya bcu phrag gnyis// rtsa lnga dag ste rgyu ba'i grangs// thun gcig thun gnyis thun phrag gang// dbyig gu lha mo'i nus pa gang// nus pas dbugs bgrang grangs bzung nas// ngal ba med pa dbugs la brten// yang na dbugs kyi rgyu ba la// ngal ba med par dbugs bgrangs pa// bgrang phreng dag kyang mi dgos te// g.yas par me 'byung dmar zhing 'tsher// g.yon par rlung 'byung gnag la dwangs// gnyis kar ngal rgyu chu rlung dkar// gnyis kar thub rngubs sa rlung ser// lha mo bdag mo dang ldan pa'i// ye shes bzhi nyid 'byung bar byed// gcig min du mar ma grub phyir// g.yas dang g.yon du gnyis kar yang// g.yas dang g.yon du brtag par bya'o// skya rengs dang po shar ba

nas// dros kyi bar ni dus dang po// dros kyi mtshams nas phyed kyi bar// gnyis ka yin te sa dang chu// nyi ma phyed nas myur smad mtshams// phyi dro dang por shes par bya// myur smad mtshams nas chal chil mtshams// nyin dus bzhi par shes par bya// chal chil srod mtshams dus dang po// srod nas phyed bar dus gnyis par// phyed nas thor chung dus dang po// tho rangs skya rengs dus gnyis par// dbugs kyi grangs kyis dus phyes nas// gzhan du gzhan dag rim pa bzhin// dbyar dang ston dang dgun dag dang// dus dang dus phran gang byung ba// de dag dang po gtsor 'byung ngo// grangs dang dus tshad snga ma bzhin// mi 'phro rlung nyid 'byung rngub rang dbang thob// sems 'dul de gsal de tshe shes rab bskyed// gzhan nas ma yin 'byung ba nyid dag dang// rtsol ba dbyer med rang don ci bzhin spyad// yun ring tshe na zhi gnas brtan bya zhing// dbyer med cha mnyam 'dod pa'i go 'phang thob// nus pa drag po bskyed pa'i thabs yin no// thams cad thig le ma bcos 'byung 'jug med// ces gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis// rang gi don rdzogs rig nas bstod pa/ e ma ho/ legs so legs so yang dag legs// thams cad bdag po khyod re mtshar// snang stong nam mkha'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// gzung 'dzin brtan pa'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen 'bar ba'i me la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas chos kyi chu la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod bskyed pa'i rlung la phyag 'tshal lo// rlung lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ khro bo stobs kyi rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ lo ts+tsha ba slob dpon bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ g+hu h+ya gar+b+ha ta twa bi ni sh+tsa ya ma hA kro d+ha ba la rA dza tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i khro bo chen po stobs kyi rgyud rgyal/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas kun tu bzang mo'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i klong na/ phyogs bcu dus gsum kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po nges par 'brel to// nyid kyi skyes bu chen po rdo rje sems dpa' bka' nod do// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'dul ba'i dus la babs pa gsang bdag nyid kyis zhus pa/ rgya che rab zab dpag dka' ba// rang bzhin che la nges don can// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul 'di// gsang ba bzhis chod don
