mdzad pa// rtog tshogs log par zhen pa

rnams// rmad dang rtsa ba gang gis spyad// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa rnams// yang dag lam du ji ltar gzud// shin tu gsang ba'i man ngag don// snod ldan kun la ji ltar sbyin// zhes ched du brjod do// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos dgongs pa gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang srog shing gsum// sum cu gnyis dang bcu drug dang// brgyad dang drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// A li kA li'i sgra dbyangs ldan// rgya mtsho gting nas sgrol ma g.yos// me lce srid pa gsum la khyab// nam mkha'i ba bzhos bde ba che// 'phags pa 'gro drug mchod sbyin phul// bde ba ye shes rol mo yis// dus gsum dgyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba'o// yid chos kun bzang yab yum dang// nyon mongs dbang gis bskyed pa ni// rtsa ba phung po'i rlung lnga dang// yan lag skye mched rlung lnga yis// phung sogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sku// tshig la khyab byed rlung gnas pa// gzugs kyi phung po rnam snang sku// nam mkha' la bskyod dbyings phyug yum// snang lnga kha dog mthing ga'i bdag/ mched snang rnam shes nyer thob thim// mthar phyin ye shes chos kyi dbyings// srog 'dzin rlung ni snying gar gnas// rnam shes phung po mi bskyod pa// sa la spyod pas sangs rgyas spyan// de zhes rgyu ba bum pa'i bdag/ dkar ba'i sa ni chu la thim// me long ye shes ngang du gnas// thur sel rlung ni gsang bar gnas// tshor ba'i phung po rin 'byung sku// chu la spyod pas mA ma kI// ser po chu nyid me la thim// mnyam nyid ye shes srog tu gnas// gyen du rgyu ba lkog mar gnas// 'du shes phung po snang mtha' yas// me la spyod pas gos dkar mo// rna ba g.yas nas rgyu byed pa// me nyid rlung la rnam 'du zhing// so sor kun rtogs ye shes nyid// mi mnyam rlung ni lte bar gnas// 'du byed phung po don yod grub// rlung la spyod pas dam tshig sgrol// rna ba g.yon nas nges 'byung ba// rlung nyid rnam par shes la thim// ljang ser bya ba grub pa'i ngang// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma lnga// rdo rje phung po'i yan lag kun// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// rgyu ba'i gnas ni spyan yin te// rnam par rgyu ba rna ba la// yang dag rgyu ba sna dang ni/ rab tu rgyu ba lce la gnas// nges par rgyu ba lus nyid de// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// sa snying la sogs sems dpa' brgyad// rnam shes dbang po phyi nang phye// yul brgyad 'dzin pa rnam bzung la// phyi nang sems ma brgyad du shar// gzugs sogs yul la rnam par spyod// lus kyi rnam shes

reg bya bzhi// spyod pa'i dus nas dga' ba bzhi// gdul bya 'dul phyir khro bzhir shar// spyad cha zhen pa rtag chad bzhi// grol ba'i dus na khro mor shes// thabs kyi 'dzin la yum la spyod// shes rab yum la thabs gnas phyir// dra bar 'brel dang nyon mongs 'dul// de phyir thub drug sprul pa spro// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// 'gro ba'i rgyud la yongs gab pa// lam rkyen rgyud du ston pas sbas// skyon yod ma yin snod ngan gsang// rang bzhin bde gshegs gdul bya yis// 'khrul pa'i snang ba bsal ba'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab ma ning rgyud// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i ched du spros pa rnams// 'di nas 'phros nas 'dir 'du bas// sde snod kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// de phyir rgyud lung man ngag mtshan// rab 'bring tha ma 'gror 'jug pa// rgyal ba kun gyi nges pa'i don// ta na ga Na spyod pa rlabs po che// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang// phrin las sgrub mchod ting nge 'dzin// dbang bcu dbang ldan che ba po// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// log sel dad pa'i mchog lus can// 'dul ba'i dus dag gsang sngags med// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa zab mo thugs su chud par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas 'di brjod do// e ma ho// e baM ma ya dgyes pa che// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed sprul pa spro// spros med bsdu med spros pa nyid// thugs drug ye shes ngang du 'ub// ces brjod pas/ de dag 'dul par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bsdus te gtad pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum bde gshegs bdag/ gti mug chen po'i rang bzhin can// 'dod chags chen po'i bdag po ste// zhe sdang chen po'i ngo bo nyid// dag pa rnam dag sku gsung bdag/ gsal bar bde ba dgyes pa ho// zhes brjod do// de nas ngag tu 'di brjod do// log lta yongs su gtad de bskrad pa ni// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tA na phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ phaT phaT hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ ces snod ma yin rnams bskrad cing mi ldang bar byas te/ bud med kyi tshogs gang yin pa la yongs su gtad cing chos kyi mig can la spro bar gyur to// stobs kyi dbang phyug bsgrub pa/ dka'

ba spyod pa man ngag gi snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das ye shes dbugs 'byin gyi rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis go ba nyid kyi thos pa'i dus na/ dus gsum sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku// sna tshogs snang ba gcig pu nyid// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba'i 'od// rang rig dkyil 'khor 'od gsal zhing// brjid mdangs gzi chen rab tu che// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ dpal ldan dgyes pa ye shes sku// ngo bo nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// gcig ni kun tu snang ba de// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// so sor rang rig 'dus pa'i dpal// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang sku// yon tan phrin las phyogs dus kun// ma lus mi lus lus med gnas// 'og min rang byung chos kyi dbyings// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// dus gsum bdag po rdo rje 'chang// rnam par thar pa'i dbu mnga' zhing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya 'bar// brtul zhugs mnyam nyid skyil mo krung// ye shes sku ni zang thal zhal// gti mug gdung dang zhe sdang gdung// shin tu gdug pa 'dul ba'i gdung// ser sna'i gdung dang 'dod chags gdung// phrag dog gdung dang shin tu spro// sprin phung 'khrigs pa'i dam tshig can// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// yang dag bsgrub pa gcig pu nyid// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// dam tshig las dang chos dang ni// sku nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// dga' dang mchog dga' dga' ba dang// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin can// sgyu ma chen po chos kyi sku// gsang ba shes rab bde chen po// bstan par bzhed nas dkyil 'khor spro// stong pa ye shes rab snang ba// tshogs pa'i dus na rnam par dag/ de nas nyid kyi bde 'byin mas// glu yi rnam par bskul mdzad do// mi 'da' stong nyid gar gyi bdag/ g.yar dam snying po dngos grub mdzod// dam tshig chen po ngo bo nyid// ye shes can du grub par mdzod// ho/ e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan can// rig pa'i rnam pa stong nyid thugs// ye shes rol pa rnam par rol// rol pa'i ngang nas dam tshig 'byin// pad+ma rgyas par gar mdzad de// rig pa nyid du mjal bar byed// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor

las// rgyud 'byung ba'i gzhi rnam par bkod pa ste/ rtog pa dang po'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba bka' bgros pa zhes bya ba'i/ sprul pa rnam par phyung ste 'dul bar dgongs nas/ thugs rjes spro ba 'di gsungs so// rig pa nyid las skyes pa'i phyir// sku gsum yon tan phrin las thugs// rig pa shes pa rnam drug che// chos nyid ngang du ye shes gnas// mi skye'i chos can skye tshul ston// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor mdzad// dug lnga ye shes lnga yis 'joms// ci yang mi gsung mnyam par gnas// 'khor ba phyung nas skam sar 'don// dbyings la ye shes rol rtsed mdzad// nam mkha' lta bur sna tshogs ston// bdud rtsi dam pa'i chu bo 'bebs// ma rig sel ba'i sgron me mdzad// 'khor ba'i nang nas byung tshul ston// rdo rje'i gdan la rdo rje 'jog/ bye ba phrag khrig gdul bya la/ de dang mthun par sbrul pa 'gyed// dpa' bor mos la dpa' bo dang// dpa' mor mos la dpa' mo dang// mthun byas mthun pas don mdzad pa// pad+ma 'dam skyes skyon ma gos// 'ja' tshon 'dra ste dngos med gsal// zhes gsungs so// de nas gdul bya gdul dka' ba dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam pa gsang ba ba kod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// mthun byas sku yi don mdzad pa// rigs drug dam tshig las sbyang phyir// ye shes ngang las dam tshig chen pos bskul// bde gshegs thams cad rnam par bka' bgros mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rdo rje zhe sdang chen po la bskul ba// rjes su chags pa rnam mang pad+mo rnam dag pa// mchod pa gsal bar rjes su mchod byas nas// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod/ bde mchog dam tshig nyid/ mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor shin tu skal bzang mchog mnyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med par rol cig/ ho e ma ho/ bde mchog bde drongs rnam par sprul// dzaHhUM baM hoHhUM gnang bar mdzod// a la la ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'khor gti mug chen po la bskul ba/ e ma ho// mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyun ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba rab gsal mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po'i brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma rnam sprul ho// kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrub pa ston// e ma ho// bde mchog bde drongs rnam par sprul// hUM rnam par snang mdzad a la

la ho// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu khro gtum gdug pa chen po la bskul ba/ rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus pa// lus pa med par thugs rje'i thugs kyis 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma yi// bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rnam sprul rnam par sprul// ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rin chen ser sna chen po la bskul ba// rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi sems can la// ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma la// sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas rnam sprul rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnams kyis pad+ma 'dod chags chen po la bskul ba/ rnam pa mang po 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can la// ma lus lus pa med pas 'dul mkhas pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma yi// bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rnam par sprul// te na te te hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phrag dog rgya gram chen po la bskul ba// rnam pa mang pos srog gi rgyud kyis sems can la// ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma yi// bde mchog sgyu mas rnam sprul rnam par sprul// hUM bi shwa bi sh+ya hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro drug sbyong ba'i rgyal po rnams sku rnam par sprul cing phyung ba// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// mngon par zhen cing ltung bar gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam sprul gyis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir na sprul pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i 'dul bas 'grub// ces dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gog shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu 'gyed// stong pa ma

yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams las// sems can don du yang rtog pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas rtag par bya// zhes rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung na// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur// shin tu gdug cing khros pa yis// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar gyur// shin tu gdug cing khro ba la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang// 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgya gsal// thar pa nag po dregs ldan dang// tshangs chen 'jug sel lha chen dang// gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa rnams// bsgral nas thal ba rdul du bshig/ rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bsil shing// thal bar gyur pa 'tsho bar byas// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mkha' klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// zhes he ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par blta la gnas par gyur// lta ba shin tu ngan pa yis// 'o dod 'bod pa chen por gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir// chags pa'i pad+mo rdo rje chos// he ru kar gnas nyes skyon bral// khams gsum nyes sbyangs spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma gar dbang phyag rgyar gsal// 'dod chags thams cad dag pa na// pad+mar sbyor ba'i 'dod chags kyis// 'dul bar gsal bas don la sbyor// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis// nam mkha'i mtha' klas rtog pa rnams// sems can khams rnams sbyang ba'i phyir// chags pa'i don gyis rnam par sbyang// zhes pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon phyung ba// bdag nyid

chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gdug cing brkam par gyur// brdungs shing brkam pas yi dwags ltung// de nas 'phos nas dbul por skyes// de yi skyon gyis gsod par byed// shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i don chen nyi ma byung// nam mkha'i snying po'i rin chen gyi// re ba kun yang yongs rdzogs mdzad// khro gtum zhi bas mi 'dul phyir// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyar gsal// 'jig rten gsum sogs rtog pa kun// sbyangs nas yon tan rgyas shing 'phel// rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur// shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal du rnam par snang// shin tu khro shing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du// dregs pa po ni mnan nas su// de tshe yum rnams rang gis spyad// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub kyis// rta mchog rnam par 'phrul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don yang byed// rta mchog dpal gyi rgyal po yis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' don bsgrubs// zhes dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las// rigs drug gi 'gro ba la sprul pa rol pa'i lo rgyus bkod pa'i rtog pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las 'dus pa las 'di dag phyung ngo// A+oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ d+harma d+h+wa tu badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM tsit+ta pra be s+pha ra Na phaT/ e A ka sha maN+Da la/ yaM karma rak+Sha haM/ baM mA ma ki ri/ su ru me suM laM tiSh+Tha maN+Da la/ raM dz+nyA n+y-i maN+Da la/ rag ta mAM sa keM raM b+h+rUM tsakra maN+Da la/ b+h+rUM badzra maN+Da la/ b+h+rUM rat+na maN+Da la/ b+h+rUM pad+ma maN+Da la/ b+h+ruM badzra bi shwa maN+Da la/ b+h+rUM e maN+Da la/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM AHhUM/ A+oM he hrIHtrAM A/ sngags rnams sor bzhag/ oM ma hA su kha

badzra sa twa a dzaHhUM baM hoH/ su ra ta s+t+waM dza badzra dr-iSh+ti swa ye ka maT+Ta/ hUM badzra ki li ki li hUM/ baM badzri ni rma ra ra ta hoH/ badzra kA le shwa ri tri/ A+oM AHma d+hu badzre g+huM g+huM/ A+oM badzra me g+ha ga g+hu lu g+hu lu b+h+rUM/ A+oM ha sha ra sta badzre ni i i/ oM khaM badzra shi shi ri hUM hUM/ A+oM b+hu khaM oM badzra sar shaM/ A+oM badzra ra tA raM/ A+oM badzra d+harmA baM/ A+oM badzra karma thaM/ haM sarba badzra tshe badzra ta tre/ traM badzra pA daM/ d+haM be sha badzra/ A+oM he ru ka badzra sa ma yA hi/ sarba duSh+ta sa ma ya mu dra pra b+hany+dza ka hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra gu h+ya sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo gI sha ri hrI hUM hUM/ badzra tsaM re shwa ri kha DaM gi ma hi/ badzra ka pa lA ma ku De ru lu ru lu hi na/ hUM badzra na da la ni dza dz+hi/ A+oM badzra sa twa ke dzi hUM badzra pra ha ra Na ma d+ha/ aM badzra shu lI gra b+hi d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM badzra yo she tsin+d+ha ma Na/ hUM badzra me la da she ma Da/ he badzra ra ti paM/ pa ma hA ra ta badzri ho/ oM badzra lo tsa na yaM/ raM ma hA shwi badzra hi/ oM sid+h+ya b+hu sid+h+ya b+ha ba si d+h+ya/ ma hA badzra rat+na ba ba Da Da raM/ badzra satwa dzaH badzra rat+na hUM/ badzra d+harma baM/ badzra karma hoH/ oM pri ti badzra ni ma Da sa/ oM badzra pri ti hri// oM badzra tsi hra ma ni ho// oM badzra ma hA ma ho huM/ oM swa b+hA wa shad+d+ha pad+ma na te ba sha hrIH oM sarba ta ka gA ra pad+ma dz+dza hUM/ badzra pad+mi/ hi pad+mi pad+mi baM/ ho pad+ma Ni ra dza/ hUM pad+ma tsaM de shwa ri hUM phaT/ he ma hA bi shA pad+ma mu te sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ hrIHpad+mi pad+mi hUM aM/ ho pad+mi bi shwa ki ma kra ma hUM dza/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM/ oM bi shwa badzre d+harmA badzrI/ oM bi shwa badzra satwa ha/ oM he ra ti badzra bi lA si ni dra Da/ he ra ti badzra gi te te te te/ he ra ti badzra hA se ha ha baM/ he ra ti badzra nr-i t+ye pi ba be ba d+ha/ oM shAn+ti grI ba hUM/ a badzra puSh+pe/ a badzra d+hU pe/ a badzra A lo ke/ a badzra gan+d+he/ A+oM ha ya grI ba spuSh+ti hUM/ gIrti hrIH/ lA s+ye hUM/ mA le traM/ nr-i t+ye A/ A+oM hu lu grI ba ba shaM hUM/ ru pa hUM/ he ra ti hUM/ dzi bi hUM/ tsi pi ti hUM/ aM e ma ra hu lu hUM/ A+oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH A+oM badzra pA sha hUM/ A+oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ A+oM g+haN+De hoH// A+oM pa na seM/ se nu ru su ta// ti phu sa ra mu// ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi bu/ sarba si ti bu sa ma yo ta mu// ma hA su kha si ti bu// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pas/ stong gsum thams cad skus gang/ rab tu gang/ kun tu gang ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di phyung ngo// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu AH/ zhes gsungs pas zhi ba'i tshogs thams cad dgyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po 'di phyung ngo// oM hrIHha ha hU~M hUM phaT/ ces gsungs pas gsung gi tshogs thams cad dgyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes gsungs pas khro bo'i tshogs thams cad dgyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi snying po 'di phyung ngo// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHthA/ zhes gsungs pas yon tan gyis rab tu gang ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ grih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ ces gsungs pas phrin las yongs su grub bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma la s+t+waM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsha ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ oM na ma te hUM/ na ma me hUM/ na mo na maHhUM/ oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na oM AHhUM swA hA/ ma sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ga ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta u gta b+hi Shiny+tsa me/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta hUM/ e A ra li hrIM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra DAk+ki ni sa ma ya haM dr-i sh+ya ho// oM badzra DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ oM bud+d+ha DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM ta gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ oM rat+na DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ oM b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ tshar gnyis 'dug do sha ya do sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba DAk+ki ni e A ra li hrI// oM pad+ma DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu// oM karma DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ oM sarba DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ oM sh+ma sha na DAk+ki ni i daM ba liM gr-ih+Nat+tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ zhes gsungs pas thams cad mnyes par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las gsung gi 'khor lo'i rtog pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas 'di tshe bsgrub bya'i phyir/ sku gsum pa la goms par bya// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// bsgrub med yum gyi b+ha ga la// brjod med sems kyi ngang du gsal// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad kun la khyab par bya// rtsol med ma bsgrubs ji ltar las// kun snang nam mkha'i ngang nyid 'byung// med pa'i rgyu las mngon gsal ba// sems kyi rang bzhin ye shes gsal// dam pa'i yi ge oM las ni// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar shar// 'byung lnga'i dam pa rin chen dbyings// stong gsal g.yo zhing sdud pa'i chu// sra mkhregs sreg byed 'bar ba'i me// b+h+rUM/ cir yang 'gyur ba'i yig 'bru bsam// bzhugs gnas 'bar ba chos kyi dbyings// ye shes drug gi gzhal yas khang// rang gnas mdzes pa'i dbyings dang ldan// hUM 'bar sgeg pa'i nyams can zhal// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bu 'khrol// thabs

dang shes rab mda' gzhu 'dzin// mthing ga mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs// bde mchog dkar mo dza las skyes// thabs dang shes rab mda' gzhu 'dzin// hUM skyes gser mdog e ma bde// 'khyug 'gying rdo rje rin chen bsnams// baM snang mdzad dmar po rdo rje thod// thabs kyi kha TAM rab tu 'khrol// ho skyes ljang gu slob ma mo// 'khyud cing bdud rtsir rab tu gsol// shar phyogs rim bzhin byang du 'khor// oM sangs rgyas byang chub dkar mo che// dus gcig tshangs mgo mda' gzhu 'phen// b+h+rUM/ chos kyi 'khor lo dkar ser ma// dmar skya rnam rgyal ha las byung// tri shul rdo rje gsum lnga 'dzin// khaM/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu zhal// dpag bsam lcug ma rlung gis bskyod// shar lho nub byang rim skyes so// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'khor lo che// dkar 'bar snang mdzad dge slong can// chos kyi 'khor lo glegs bam dang// 'khar gsil lhung bzed mtshan dper ldan// k+ShaM/ sngo sang sangs rgyas byang chub ma// rdo rje lce yi rnam par bsgom// raM/ dpa' mo gser mdog cha lang 'khrol// traM/ kun bzang dmar mo rin chen 'dzin// daM/ mi bzad ljang gu dung 'dzin ma// dbus kyi 'khor lo shar nas 'khod// k+ShaM/ sprin chen dmar mo sprin chen 'bebs// daM/ nam mkha'i spyan ma pad+ma dkar// haM/ sangs rgyas dbyangs ma ser mo zhags// tsha skyes dbang mo pad+ma ljang// dkyil 'khor re'u mig phyogs bzhir rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs mdzad kun du 'khril// hi skyes he ru mthing ga'i sku// g.yas pa zhi la g.yon pa chags// rmongs byed zhal ni rgyab na 'byung// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bu 'khrol// g.yang gzhi 'jigs byed pags pa brdeg/ mda' gzhu thod pa snying khrag bkang// gar gyi nyams dgu 'gying ba'i zhal// hrIH/ dkar mo mda' 'dzin ko'u rI ma// hi skyes tso'u rI dmar mo zhal// lcags kyu kha T+wAM chos 'khor brgyad// dziH/ be ta ba dan kham phor dkar// dziH/ pra mo dmar mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje kham phor 'khor lo 'degs// dzi/ puk+ka sna tshogs lcug ma 'dzin// hUM/ tsaN+Da nag mo rdo rje 'phen// ba dan tri shul rab tu khros// ta/ g+hasma nag mo ral gri me// hUM/ sme sha sngon mo thod khrag gsol// rdo rje kha TAM thod pa zhags// 'gying mdzes khro bas phyogs su 'khod// ha/ dkar mo mtshon cha mda' gzhu dkar// baM/ ser mo kha T+wAM dril bu 'khrol// yaM/ dmar ser 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bskor// raM/ sna tshogs ljang gu ba dan 'dzin// 'di dag 'khyud tshul mdun nas 'khod// he ru ka yi zla gam rdzogs// traM/ nyi ma ser po mda' gri g.yas// gzhu pad nyi ma rdo rjes mtshan// AM/ dbang bskur dkar mo dbu rgyan 'dzin// hrIH/ gser ldan ser mo rin chen sgrom// hoH/ rgyal mtshan dmar mo

rin chen rgyal// haM/ mchod chen ljang gu rin chen snod// gtso la 'khor zhing phyogs bzhir gnas// dza/ mda' 'dzin dmar ser mda' gzhu can// hUM/ sngon mo kha T+wAM ral gri 'dzin// wa/ dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje ljang ser mchod sdong can// rdo rje nyi ma rin chen rdzogs// hrIH/ gar dbang dmar po pad+ma 'dzin// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnam par mdzes// yang na rdo rje dril mtshan pa// nyi shu gcig dang lnga bcu gnyis// dzaH/ rnam gzigs dkar po pad+ma 'byed// hUM/ sgrol ma dmar skya ut+pal sku// waM/ sa 'dzin dkar mo 'khor lo 'dzin// hoH/ khro gnyer rdo rje ut+pal ljang// hUM/ gtum po pad+ma rdo rje mthing// he/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'khor lo sngo/ AH/ pad+ma chu srin rgyal mtshan dkar// ho/ pad+ma ljang gu pad+ma bsgrub// phyed phyed phyi nang re'u mig rdzogs// pad+ma gar dbang chu skyes rdzogs// AH/ ljang ser rta mchog rta gdong ljang// ba dan gsum pa sna tshogs thugs// ral gri mda' ni bzhi par 'chang// sna tshogs pad+ma mdung rtse gsum// be con gzhu ni bzhi par 'dzin// 'gying brjid gar gyi skur ldan dgyes// dzi/ sna tshogs pad+ma dkar ljang g.yas// ha/ sngo ljang rdo rje sna tshogs g.yas// las bzhi rta mchog rim par sbyar// rgya gram rta yi 'khor lor rdzogs// hUM skyes dkar po rta zhal 'gugs// a skyes sngon mo gling bu 'bud// taM/ ser mo rdo rje pi wang 'dren// baM/ rnga chen dmar mo rnga rings brdungs// dz+haM/ rdza lnga ljang gu rdo rje mtshon// zlum zhing 'khyil nas grwa la rdzogs// dz+ha skyes ser po rta zhal zhags// a/ dmar ser rdo rje me tog snod// spos snod dkar mo a skyes ma// AH/ dmar skya mar me ba dan 'dzin// a/ g+han+d+he ljang gu dung chos 'dzin// mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor thig le rdzogs// baM skyes dmar mo rta zhal lcags// hUM skyes dkar mo la sogs gzugs// mA le phreng ba traM skyes sngo// gIrti dmar mo glu len hrIH a skyes nIrti ljang gu gar// dbang mchog rgyal po grwa la rdzogs// hUM skyes byung ba ljang gu dril// ru skyes dkar mo me long gzugs// hi skyes ser mo dri snod ma// dzi skyes dmar mo dri bsung snod// tsi skyes ljang gu zhal zas so// dkyil 'khor e yi 'khor lo rdzogs// dkar mo rta gdong lcags kyu shar// dzaHlas byung bas 'gugs byed byams// phag gdong nag mo zhags thog lho// hUM las skyes pa snying rje bdag/ seng dmar thabs shes lcags sgrog nub// baM las byung ba dga' ba dmar// ljang gu thal byed spyang dril byang// hoHlas skyes pa btang snyoms las// rig pa las skyes ye dag phyir// rdzogs chen rnal 'byor dus gcig rdzogs// kun tu dmigs la rig par ldan// gti mug can la gti mug ste// zhe sdang can la zhe yang sdang// gdug pa khro

gtum 'dod pa bzhin// ser sna can la ser snas bsdams// 'dod chags can la 'dod chags sbyor// phrag dog la yang phrag dog go/ 'dul phyir rigs su bsdus pa dang// bye brag rnams la bye brag ston// rgyal ba rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bsam yas 'dod pa kun ster phyir// rig pa'i sprul pa rgya chen mchod// gdung ba'i glu dang mdzes pa'i gar// rol mo las kyi karmas dbul// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ lha rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste rtog pa bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su mnyes par byed pa kun tu rnam par sprul pa'i rol pa chen po rol mo'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rig pa rig pa nyid la gnas// de phyir rig pa rig pa'i sprul pa ste// dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa'i sku// spyan drangs gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs kyang// thugs rje'i ngang chen chos sku dag pa las// ye shes sgyu mar rol cing gshegs su gsol// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' stobs bcu'i shugs mnga' ba// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu rdzogs// dpal chen longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rngams pa'i zhal nas 'brug sgrog cing// seng ge'i nga ros kyang ni bskyod du med// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'gro la brtse slad gshegs su gsol// mkha' 'gro kun dang thabs cig gshegs su gsol// sgyu ma gar gyi rol pas 'dren// rig pa nyid la ye shes 'jug/ mthu ldan nus pa rtog pa sel// mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad la// mAM sa chu dang zil pa dang// grub pa bzhi yis rab brgyan pa// ting 'dzin mthu dang ngo bos grub// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spros// rdo rje can la gur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// ga bur rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang// spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rdo rje 'chang la dbul du rung// smin dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor du// yag sha 'bar ba'i mgo thod bzhag/ rang byung bi mu ma ra shu// go ku da dang ha na'i rgyan// hUM b+h+rAM AM dzriM khaM zhes pa// dbus shar lho nub byang du gnas// ye shes 'od lnga kha dog 'bar// dag shur spel bas kha dog dril// hrIHlas byung ba ye shes me// stong nyid rdo rje khong seng can// khams gsum tshe 'dzin rgya mtshor 'khyil// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs sbyin pas bstim// lus ngag mthu ldan nus pa che// bgegs rnams 'joms pas mtshams kyi mchog/ shangs kyi 'od zer rlung sgrom nas// 'khyil zhing spro ba gsal byed

dbyangs// keng zhes rus sbal kha 'dra ba// kha ni bum pa 'bab pa ste// ga ni bse yi kha dang mtshungs// g+ha ni bum pa lta bu ste// nga ni kang ka nyid dang 'dra// tsa ni tsa sha nyid dang mtshungs// tsha ni gdugs kyi sba ba 'dra// dza ni rnga mo'i mgo bo bzhin// dz+ha ni rnga chen gzugs lta bu// Ta ni sked nyag lta bu ste// Tha ni pu shud 'gro ba 'dra// Da ni thi ba'i kha nyid ste// DA ni mkha' 'gro nyid du go/ Na ni sbyin bdag dang 'dra ba// ta ni sdang dang 'dra ba ste// pha wang kha 'dra yi ge tha// da ni mche ba can dang mtshungs// d+ha nyid gzhu yi ngo bo nyid// na ni ma he'i kha 'dra ba// ri skegs 'gros ni pa zhes bya// pha ni khrung khrung mgo dang mtshungs// 'dam bya ba ste skye ga b+ha// ma ni spre'u'i tshul pa'i gzugs// phug ron ngur pa ya dang ra// khu byug bya rog la dang wa// sha Sha ri bong zhi ba'i spyan// sa ha spyang ku 'phrog ma dang// k+Sha ni srin bu'i kha lta bu// de rnams kha dang 'gros kyis dbyibs// mtshon pas phrin las rnam bzhi bsdus// a ni khyim bya'i mgo bo'i gzugs// A nyid de dang cung zad 'dra// i ni glang chen sna lta bu// I ni dbang phyug chen po 'dra// u ni rnga mo'i mgo bo bzhin// U ni sha ba'i kha 'dra ba// r-i ni ri bong mgo bo 'dra// yi ge r-I ni seng mgo bzhin// yi ge l-i ni glang chen la// l-I ni dbang ldan zhal dang mtshungs// e ni ma he'i kha 'dra ba// ai ni rma bya'i kha dang mtshungs// o ni byi la'i kha dang mtshungs// au ni khyim bya'i kha bzhin no// aM ni chu srin mgo bo 'dra// tsheg drag aHni rta mgo bzhin// spyir na bsam yas dbyibs gsungs pa// rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam bzhir 'dus// thabs dang shes rab 'thab pa yis// ring thung gar dang lcong du 'byung// de nyid sgra yi 'byung gnas su// ha ba lngar ka sor rga rta// sha ra pa dang gar ra pa// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// bang ge de'u dang cang ka de'u// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje he ru nyi ma dang// pad+ma gar dang rta mchog dpal// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren pa dang// mkhun cing gdungs pa'i sgra 'byin cing// rdo rje srin po'i ngur sgra 'don// rdo rje drag po gad mo che// 'khur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin cing// 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yis// ru lu ru lu'i sgra phyung nas// glu drug blangs pas don drug rdzogs// yon tan rnam bcu re rer ldan// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu yis// 'gro drug rigs dang bye brag la// dkyil 'khor 'dul zhing don mdzad pa// sgra yi bye brag ji snyed pa// rol mo'i sgra las 'byung ba ni// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs dang// rigs pa'i sgra ni ngang gis 'byung// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dung rta mad ra rma ra tad ra/ ru lu ru lu/ pra pir+ya ta ki hU dzaH/ ki ni du ni hUM druM/ ta ki hUM dzaH/ hu lu hu lu/ a la la ho/

shud+d+ha sid+d+ha ra ri sha ya/ sarba na ta g+he na ge/ ta ta ge ge/ ta ta g+he g+he/ ta geM geM/ ta g+he ta g+he/ g+he g+he ta ta ge ta g+he he na/ don ha ki hUM dza/ g+he ta g+he/ don ta ki hUM dza/ dran a la la ho/ ru ta ma ta/ thal mo brdab pa'i rtag pa'o// ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he ta g+he na/ ta g+he na ta g+he na/ g+hen g+hen/ rgyun gyi rda'o// aM aM aM/ haM haM haM/ baM baM baM/ d+haM d+haM d+haM/ dam tshig gsung ba lnga'o// de kong de kong de kong te badzra/ badzra phye phyar kong/ koM koM koM/ hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ d+h+ye koM koM gong gong/ de goM goM goM dpal he ru ka'i rda'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma b+han+d+ha ding/ pad+ma b+han+d+ha tring// pad+ma pad+ma tring/ dpal pad+ma thal mo brdab pa'i rda'o// traM traM traM traM/ ba ba ba ba/ ba ba ba ba/ Ta Ta Ta/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ tra tra tra tra tran+ta te/ Da du ra tra rud tra tra/ rgyal po'i rda'o/ ta ki hUM dza ta ki hUM dza/ snyems pa'i 'gros so// traM traM traM traM tra tra tra/ myur zhing rab tu myur ba'o// ba ta ba ta tu tun ta Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta ba ta ba ru 'un ta Ta ba ta/ ta Ta be ta ba he don/ dpal rnam par rol pa'o// ba ta ba ta ba ta phaT tra Ta/ shin tu myur ba'i rda'i phyag rgya shes pa ste// sil snyan gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sil snyan don la brag cha'i sgra// rang bzhin med par gsan zhugs pa// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing// ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang// ye shes ngang du mi gnyis gcig pas na// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang gsal chos nyid du// mi gnyis don phyir mchog gi dngos grub rnams// bdag la stsol cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// glu yi phyag rgya 'di dag gis// glu yi phyag rgya gar bya'o// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing// byams dang snying rje dgra zun mi mnga' yang// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la mi 'da' bas// mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo// khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang rin chen bdun// ma rmongs rmongs pa kun grol rgyal ba'i gnas// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' rab mdzod cig dam tshig dam pa grub// sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma spyod// sgyu ma chen po rigs kyi yum// sgyu mas sgyu ma dga' mdzad ma// tsan+dan dkar dmar nyi zla'i skad// pad+ma rdo rje thabs las byung// dga' dang mchog tu dga' dang bral// skyes pa lhan cig dga' ba'i ro// rang bzhin dngos po rnam gnyis kyis// myur du dngos grub skyed byed de// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgom par bya// rang rdzas thig le phyir phyung nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod// he ni bde chen las byung ba// ru ni rin chen chags dang bral// ka

ni rab tu rmongs pa spangs// he ru ka sogs dgyes mchod rol// skye ba bdun pa dag pa'i zhing// zhing bcu bsgral ba bstan pa'i dgra// ngan song gsum ni snying rje'i gnas// ting 'dzin brtan thob rnal 'byor pas// thugs rje'i dam tshigs snying rjes bzung// longs spyod phung po tshogs la rol// dag pa 'od gsal chos skur sbyor// 'og min b+ha ga ling+gar btab// bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur ba// gsang ba'i dam tshig mi bcag phyir// dngos grub snying rje mchod pas rol// gzugs med dang ni gzugs snang ba// gzugs kyi mtha' ni rnam par rig/ sgra med sgra ni brag cha'i sgra// rig stong sgra ni chos nyid gsung// dri med dri bral stong pa'i dri// rang bzhin sbyor ba sna yi yul// myong ba med pa myong ba'i ro// med par myong ba bdud rtsi'i chu// reg med reg na bde 'jam zhing// reg pa bzhi bsdus lus kyi gnas// chos med chos te chos kyi mchog/ yod med 'khor 'das bsdus pa'i chos// kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la// yum gyi b+ha ga chos kyi dbyings// dam tshig dri med yon tan drug/ thugs dam bzhin du longs spyod rol// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ mchod pa'i sprin rnam par bkod pa'i phyag rgya'i le'u ste rtog pa lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di gsupungs so// skal bzang bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// mchod rten dben gnas skyed mos tshal// gtsug lag kun dga' ra ba ru// sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo bsgrub// dgon pa mchod rten gtsug lag khang// der ni rnam par snang mdzad bsgom// rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma'i tshal// rdo rje nyi ma rab tu bsgom// pad+ma'i tshal lam chu 'dab tu// pad+ma 'dzin pa rab tu bsgrub// sna tshogs mkhar ram mchu bo'i 'gram// rgyal khams gzhan du rta mchog bsgrub// dur khrod lha rten ma mo'i gnas// he ru ka ni rab tu shis// nyams dga' yid 'ong bsam gtan 'phel// pad+ma 'khor lo rnam pa'i dbyibs// skyon rnams bral zhing yon tan ldan// tshom bu rgyas pa bsgrub par shis// shis pa'i 'khor rdzas dus 'dzom na// phun sum tshogs pa rab tu gces// mtho dman gseg ma gyo mog dang// tshwa sgo shing dum ro lnga bral// blang brtag bzung dang sbyar ba dang// bskrad bsrung sbyor bas cho ga rdzogs// nyis 'gyur dkyil 'khor tshad yin te// mdzes shing 'tshams pa rab tu shis// sems dpa'i skyil krung la gnas nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gar byas te// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdag

nyid stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po bgegs rnams 'joms// pad+ma'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// lag pa pad+ma bskor ba dang// sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par byed// rdo rje nyi ma g.yon brkyang bas// rgyas btab rmongs byas thal bar byas// khams gsum pa yang 'tsho bar byed// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// he ru ka ni rdo rje'i 'gros// gdug pa thams cad spa yang bkong// rdo rje sems dpa' sgeg pa ste// dpa' la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje'i bdag/ rgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro bo'i nyams// rta mchog dregs pa 'jigs par byed// shAkya thub pa mi sdug pas// ngo mtshar la ni a la la// rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas so// 'khrul 'khor 'phang ba mda' dang ni// ma 'phangs ral gri'i phyag rgya dang// lag pas 'phangs pa mdung thung sogs// 'phangs nas slar bzung zhags pa dang// rkang pa gyad kyi stobs 'gyed pas// rkang pa gshibs pas sa gnon cing// rkang pa bsgyaid pas sa mnan la// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnan pa dang/ brkyang bskum tshul gyis gnas gsum mnan// dbyibs kyi phyag rgya shes par bya// mi lhod pa la sran gzugs dang// mnyes zhing yan lag bstan pa dang// rgya cher sa bzhi rnam par dag/ lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can// rkang pa mnan cing rmig pa mnan// mda' gzhu 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yis// khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dag/ rnam par btul nas dga' bar spyod// nyung dkar gu gul rdzas dag dang// rgyal chen mnga' gsol phyogs skyong mnan// khro bcu bkod de dam sri mnan// chos rgyal mnga' gsol sgo byang gdags// bgegs dang lan chags sbyin pa dgye// sa yi ri mo bya ba dang// dur khrod thal ba'i ri mo bya// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dris byugs te// me tog dri ni lha grangs mthun// mchod sogs lha yi lhag par gnas// sgrub pa'i bum pa lha grangs mnyam// gang ba'i bum pa dag dang ni// thams cad las kyi bum pa dang// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o// sbyangs nas bsangs te gzhal yas khang// bskyed drang bstim mchod bstod pa dang// bsnyen pa nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang// bsgrub pa bsgrub pa chen po bzhi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub par bya// gtso dang 'khor gyi bsnyen pa bskyar// sbyin bsreg bya zhing las sgrib bshags// skal ldan bu mchog la sogs pa// rtags gdab dam tshig bsre bsnan bya// sems bskyed sdom pa bzung ba dang// bdun po rnam dag spro ba

bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing// rdo rje'i khu tshur gnas gsum gtug/ spyi bos bdun dmigs snying mchod dbul// maN+Dal pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// rnam lnga ba ko tsam byugs te// u dum wa ra las byas pa// sdig spangs bcu gnyis me tog thod// dor te pra brtags srung skud gdags// dag pa'i sngags kyi khyod chus bkru// rigs lngar ku+u sha rmi lam brtags// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag dang// rdzas dang mchod pa'i rim pa yis// ngan pa'i ltas la bsregs sbyangs shing// sar ba'i rgyu las kha bsgyur te// lnga'am nyi shu'i kha dog can// rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bsgril nas ni// mtshan ldan mdzes ma lhar gsal nas// dzaHdzaHzhes ni gtad par bya// nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams// khyed kyi 'gro don mdzad dus lags// thig gi sgra 'dis bskul nas kyang// de rnams 'dir ni gshegs su gsol// gsang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dang// dkyil 'khor thig gdab shes rab can// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs nas// shar lho nub byang phyogs rnams su// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor dgu// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// 'dus pa'i bdag po 'khor lo can// rdo rje can gyi zla gam dgu// pad+ma dbang gi chu skyes brgyad// rdo rje nyi ma rin chen dbyibs// sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram can// rta yi rgyal po yang dag gnas// ji srid 'dod pa ci 'byor ba// ji ltar dus dang ci bde ba'i// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas pa dpal// phrin las karma'i rigs yin phyir// rta mchog phyag rgya cir yang gsal// mtshams bzhi las bzhi dkyil 'khor du// las bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal po la// lha mo bcu drug 'khor lo che// rta babs brgyad ldan twa ra na// mdzes pa'i rgyan bzhi 'debs pa'i tshul// phyogs mtshams steng 'og mnyam gnas pas// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// ma mo brgyad dang lha chen brgyad// zhing skyong shing dang klu chen brgyad// shAkya thub mdzad mthar phyin cing// mchod rten brgyad ni bsgom tshul mdzad// ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar// byams pa'i chu chen brgyad 'bab cing// snying rje'i brag brgyad mdzes par brtsegs// dga' ba'i sprin brgyad kun tu 'thibs// btang snyoms rlung brgyad rab tu 'bud// phyogs skyong bcu ni rab tu gnas// rab 'bring tha ma'i tshon phye la// sngags kyis byin rlabs pra brtags te// rigs kyi mdog la gnas 'gyur tshon// tshom bu dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rigs bsdus chen por bri ba dang// gdul bya 'dul phyir re re bzhengs// rab gnas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang// 'byor pa'i longs spyod gang yin pa// rgyan dang

mtshon cha rig pas sbyar// slob dpon zhugs nas slob ma 'jug/ gangs la babs pa'i rigs kyi lha// spyan dbye gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ltos// rigs dang sbyar nas dbang yang rdzogs// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor spros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// lus kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// rdo rje mchu dang rdo rje bcas// mtshon can po dag bsgrub pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste// pad+ma'i snod kyi nang du gzhug/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu+u ba dang// mtshal chen po yi bsgrub pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas// tsan+dan dmar po sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// ra sa ya na kun slong bas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag mthe bo'i rtse mo yis// zhim pa'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob// b+ha ga pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// skal ldan gsol btab dam tshig sbyin// de nas khrus byas dris lus byug/ ci 'byor ba yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos dag bgos nas ni// kha dri zhim pa'i me tog phreng// sna tshogs skal pa bzang po can// slob ma dal gyis dal gyis su// gos dag bkab pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing// bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor bde chen dbang 'dod pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rim dang cig char 'jug pa yis// de nyid yang dag bsgom pa ni// rig pa rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dngos med rtog pa'i bag chags dag/ sgyu ma me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// sgyu mas sgyu ma stong pas na// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// chos kyi sku 'dir shes par gyis// ji ltar nam mkha' dwangs pa la// rang bzhin med ltar rang sems zhog/ 'od gsal chos sku rtog med la// bslad pas dri mas gos 'gyur phyir// ma bslad bu gcig rang sar zhog/ brjid pa chen po'i khri steng na// skal ldan chen po bzhag nas ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang// rol mo rnams kyis rnam brgyan nas// bdud rtsi rnam rgyal bum pa'i chu// rigs kyi cod pan mdzes par bcing// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung// dbang bskur ba yi rdo rje che// mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ro// sku

dbang mda' gzhu gtad pa dang// shes rab dril bu gsung gi dbang// thugs kyi dbang du me long brtan// yon tan yangs pa mig thur dbang// phrin las brtul zhugs chen po'i dbang// gdams ngag 'debs pa tshig gi dbang// gsang ba'i mtshan rtags ming gi dbang// nyan dang 'chad dang bsgrub pa dang// phrin las dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur// 'khor lo rkang par bzhag byas nas// lag pa g.yas par dung sbyin te// g.yon par lce ni sbyin par bya// 'jig rten kun la thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sna tshogs 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud rnams la// 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang/ bla med rnal 'byor chen po la// ma hA a nu a ti la// blo dang mthun sbyar 'khor lo bskor// 'gro drug sems can dbyungs phyung zhig/ dri ldan ye shes mnyes bya'i phyir// gang la yongs su btang dka' ba// gang yin de ni mchog tu bshad// gang dang gang la yid 'ong mchog/ de dang de ni bla mar dbul// yang na shin tu khyad par can// bla ma'i sems la dgos pa gang// de dbul yang na zho sha dbul// dngos po chung la mnyes pa mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yon dbul ba'o// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa gang// phul nas yon gyis bslu ba yin// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog yin no// rdo rje rigs la bdag nyid dbul// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal sbyor ba'i// 'bul ba yon gyi mchog yin no// mu tig bzang po nor bu dang// shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang// de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal rigs longs spyod gter rnams dang// gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang// de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin tu brgyan pa'i rta dag dang// glang po shin tu brgyan pa yang// shing rta rin chen gang ba dang// rta dag rta mchog yon yin no// bla ma mnyes par gang byas pa// de ni chung yang mchog yin te// che ste rin chen ri rab tsam// chung ste khab skud yan chad la// bla ma mnyes pa gang 'bul ba// dkyil 'khor dgu yi yon yin no// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam par sbyor ba las/ dbang bskur phyag rgya'i le'u ste rtog pa bdun pa'o//// de nas thabs yod par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// bla med gsang zhugs skal bzang po// ji ltar rgyud 'phel grub 'dzin pa// rtsa ba sku gsung thugs rnams bsrung// dus

bzhir rigs drug skur bsgom zhing// gsang sngags phreng ba ngag la 'chang// rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom byed pa// sbyor lam kun las nyams pa med// zhing dang sngags dang las skyes ma// mtshan bzang gang yin bde ba skye// dam tshig gsang ba kun tu bsrung// zhing bcu'i tshogs la gnas spor cing// 'gal ba dag la mtshon cha'i char// phab nas bde bar gshegs la 'bul// yum drug dam tshig la gnas phyir// dam tshig dam pa sngags kyi sgra// na mo sh+tu sarba b+hud+d+he b+h+yaH// zhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na// las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// rab byung rnams kyi grub pa kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lan gcig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir// dam tshig chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// gang dag byas par ma gyur cig/ spel ba dag kyang ma gyur cig/ dam pa rgya chen de dag med// oM ru ru sbu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad bya byed pa// stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin de ni byed du 'jug/ d+hu pa b+ha ga ta ma hA de bi hi ri mi ri ni shre ya/ chos kyi dam pa phyag rgya 'di// 'dod pa bde ba kun sbyin pa'o// A+oM tA re tu tA re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub nas// bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos// traM ba ba ta ta Ta Ta Ta/ re ba thams cad kun rdzogs pa// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// shrI badzra pad+ma ba ta ba mu kha yo gI shwa ri hi hi hi hi hi/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ 'di rnams dam tshig mchog yin te// chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// zhe sdang chen pos zhe sdang ba// gti mug chen pos gti mug che// nga rgyal nga rgyal dag la gnas// 'dod chags can la 'dod chags sbyor// de bzhin phrag dog phrag dog nyid// khong khro rab tu gtum gdug can// drag po 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// rigs kyi dam tshig chen po ni// rigs drug 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul// dam tshig rnam pa cir snang yang// chos nyid ngang las ma yengs par// rtsa ba yan lag mi 'da' bar// grub pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// slob dpon la ni rtag tu gus// mched la gdung zhing gsang ba thub// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// rig pa nyid de skyes pa'o// zhes gsungs pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ thams cad yod pa dam tshig gi le'u ste rtog pa brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// 'gro ba'i 'khor lo

mchod pa ni// yongs grub 'dod yon lha skur gsal// gzhan yang 'dod yon lha mor bcas// rigs drug lha tshogs rnam par mchod// 'dug pa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ni// dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga spyi// lte ba lkog ma gsang ba ru// rnal 'byor 'khor lo drug bsgom ste// lag pa gzar bu rnam gnyis kyis// lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod nas ni// ye shes mes ni bag chags bsreg/ thal ba bshang lam las phyung ba// nang gi sbyin sreg mchod pa'o// phrin las 'khor lo bsgom pa ni// dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan// lus ngag spyod pa rnam dag pa// 'od gsal chos sku bsgom par bya// phrin las sgrib dag mchod pa'o// nyams chags skong ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni// rigs drug lha yi thugs ka ru// rta mchog 'khor lo nyid bsgoms nas// de la dbang lnga bskur byas na// nyams pa dag par byed pa ste// dam tshig nyams pa dbang bskur mchod pa'o// rtog pa 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa ni// rnam rtog shas che'i rnal 'byor pas// khrus kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ste// rigs drug mdun du 'khor lo drug/ bum pa drug ni rdzas dang ldan// lha bsgoms sngags ni grangs rdzogs nas// bkrus pas 'dag pa'i mchod pa'o// le lo gzhom pa'i 'khor lo ni// le lo shas che'i rnal 'byor pas// rgyun chad med pa thun bzhi ru// lha yi 'khor lo spro bsdu bsgom// ldang ba sprul pa'i sku yin ste// rmi lam longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// gnyid log chos skur bsgom par bya// le lo 'joms pa'i mchod pa'o// yid skyo gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// yid ni skyo ba'i rnal 'byor pas// rgyun du lha yi rnal 'byor goms// dang po'i las kyi rnal 'byor pas// grangs dus mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa skyol// yid skyo bseng ba'i mchod pa'o// mi brtan pa yi 'khor lo ni// mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mtshan ma brtan par bsgom par bya// brtan pa thob pa'i mchod pa'o// brtan pa yang dag sbyor ba'i 'khor lo ni// mtshan thob mngon shes skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mchog gi dngos grub yang dag ye shes bsgom// yang dag dbang bar bsgom pa'i mchod pa'o// 'di ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa// rab ni sku lnga lhun grub thob// 'bring ni rig 'dzin rnam bzhi'i lus// tha ma lha mi'i mtshan rdzogs pa// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di gsungs so// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor pas// gdong rgyan gon te bsgrub pa ni// gsang sngags brjod na 'grub pa ste// oM TAM ki hUM dza/ lhar gsal nyin re de brjod na// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub ni// bde mchog ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// ts+tshir

bzlas bsgrub bya'i snying gcod 'gyur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor gyis// tsi gis bsgrub bya'i snying bcad nas// oM ts+tshi daM ts+tshi daM hUM phaT/ bzlas na bsgrub bya gang yin pa// ma shi'i bar du 'gugs par byed// khrag 'thung chen po sme sha ni// bsgoms te 'di nyid ngag tu brjod/ oM shuSh+ki mu/ bzlas na mkha' 'gro thams cad 'grub// byin rlabs mngon sum lam mkhas pa// rnal 'byor can gyi sgrub pa pos// oM DAk+ki ni hUM dza/ bzlas na nyes pa kun las grol// rigs drug bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dge ba'i brtul zhugs byas nas ni// swo bsdams lce rtse rkan gtad nas// oM AHhUM zhes brjod na// rdo rje'i bzlas pa de yis ni// rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs// thig le stong pa yi ge gsum// kun dang mthun pa de nyid thob// bzhengs bzhugs spyod lam thams cad du// hUM las byung ba'i he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// stong nyid rdo rje thabs kyi mda'// sku yi kha T+wAM shes rab gzhu// rang gi phyag tu rnam par 'dzin// ko'u ri la sogs ma mo brgyad// zla gam dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bru brgyad bsnyen pa ngag tu brjod// sngags 'dis yongs rdzogs chu bur ba// A+oM badzra shr-I he ru ka ma d+ha sarba duSh+tan// skur gsal rnal 'byor de nyid la// bka' nyan go bsgos bcings pa na// bgegs kyi sbyor ba kun dang bral// kaM las rdo rje go khrab ste// haM zhes rdo rje rgyun thag bsdams// A+oM las rin chen hUM rin chen// thag gnyis mdzub gu la bcing ngo// rat+na mA le a b+hi ShIny+tsa/ rin chen phreng bas bcing ba dang/ pa Ta laM/ dar dpyangs dkar po g.yas su 'phur// a b+hi Shiny+tsa laM/ dar dpyangs dmar po g.yon du 'phur ba'o// dur khrod thod pa'i khang pa ru// hUM yig rdo rje yongs gyur pas// oM shrI he ru ka hUM zhes pa/ brjod 'gying nag po rdo rje 'phyar// dung dmar ba dan kha T+wAM bcas// A+oM badzra he ru ka k+Sha pa ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ gsang sngags 'di la gnas gyur na// da lta nyid du sangs rgyas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ las sna tshogs par las kyi phreng ba'i le'u ste rtog pa dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// oM mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam nyid dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' la yang kun tu yod pa min// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba'i rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub

mchog rnams nges par stsol/ rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung// smon lam 'grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang// tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa shin tu mnyes gyur kyang// khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yang mi 'gyur// e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog mnyes pas// khams gsum kun la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shin tu gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshogs rnams la yon tan bsngags pa 'di gsungs so// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jig su rungs pa dang// rgod dang gshe dang rngams pa'i nga ro dang// snying rje rngam dang ngo mtshar chen po dang// sku yi dngos po shin tu 'gyur ba'i gar// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu mdzad// theg mchog glang chen ko ba brjid dang ldan// thabs mkhas zhing chen pags pa mdzes pa'i rgyan// 'jo sgeg stag gi pags pa chos nyid rgyan// rak+ta thal chen zhag gi mi srin dbang du sdud// bdud dang sren po tshar gcod rU tra sgrol// dpa' rtags mtshon cha thabs kyi ye shes me// bdud kyi bdud 'joms bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ drag po drag chen drag rgyal he ru ka/ mtshan dpes rgyan ldan 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// sku yi gar mdzad gsang sgor 'gro ba 'jug/ tug chom 'brug sgra stang khams bgegs sa sgrogs// gad rgyangs gad mos gsang ba'i bshugs glu len// rtag chad mu stegs 'gog pa nyan thos bu// dman pa'i theg pa log lta 'byung po 'dul// seng ge'i nga ros gcan gzan gdug pa 'dul// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis skal ldan rnal 'byor skyong// chos 'chad log lta tshar gcod bdud dregs 'dul// ngan song stongs mdzad thar pa'i lam la 'god// thugs rjes 'dren pa snying rje'i rgyun thag can// smon 'jug sems lnga bskyed cing nyon mongs 'dul// zhi des byams pa'i gsang ba kun la sgrogs// 'dul sprul ma nges nges pa'i skur ston cing// ngo mtshar gzugs snang khang stong nam mkha'i 'ja'// sems can don mdzad 'dul sgo nyon mongs zhi// rig pa'i rgyal po bla med he ru ka/ rig 'dzin rnal 'byor dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// rnam dag sku lnga 'jigs pas nam mkha' 'dra// sha dang khrag med stong pa ye shes

sku// gdos bcas dug 'joms dpa' bo 'jigs pa bral// sku gsung lhun grub brdal ba thig le che// snang stong dbyer med shes rab thabs ldan sku// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa rdzogs par rol// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las// yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u ste rtog pa bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sras sangs rgyas byang chub skal ldan ma dang/ zhal bzang ma dang/ kun bzang ma dang// mi bzang ma dang/ sprin chen ma dang/ nam mkha' spyan ma dang/ sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang/ dbang mo dang/ bde mchog ma dang/ e ma bde ba dang/ sgrol ma dang/ zla ba mo dang/ sangs rgyas byang chub ma dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo ma dang/ kun bzang ma dang/ kau ri ma dang/ tsau ri dang/ phra mo ha dang/ be tA li dang/ puk+ka si dang/ g+hasma ri dang/ tsan+d+ha li dang/ sma sha ni dang/ mda' 'dzin ma dang/ kha T+wAM 'dzin ma dang/ 'khor lo 'dzin ma dang/ sna tshogs ba dan 'dzin ma dang/ dbang skur ma dang/ gter ldan ma dang/ rgyal mtshan mchog dang/ mchod rten ma dang/ mda' gzhu 'dzin ma dang/ ral gri 'dzin ma dang/ nyi ma 'dzin ma dang/ sbyin sreg ma dang/ rnam gzigs ma dang/ sgrol ma ri mi dang// sa 'dzin ma dang/ khro gnyer ma dang/ gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ pad+ma'i na bza' ma dang/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma rgya gram ma dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje ma dang/ gling bu+u ma dang/ bi wang ma dang/ rnga chen ma dang/ rdza rnga ma dang/ me tog ma dang/ bdug pa ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ dri chab ma dang/ la s+yA+e ma dang/ mA le ma dang/ gIrti ma dang/ nIrti ma dang/ gzugs rdo rje ma dang/ sgra rdo rje ma dang/ dri rdo rje ma dang/ ro rdo rje ma dang/ lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang/ zhags pa 'dzin ma dang/ lcags sgrog 'dzin ma dang/ dril bu 'dzin ma dang/ gzhan yang dpa' bo thams cad dang// dpa' mo thams cad dang// rig 'dzin thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su gyur pa thams cad dang/ gsang ba'i rigs su gyur pa thams cad kyis// mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pas mchod do// rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ nyid la nyid snang ngo// nyid la nyid spyod do// nyid la nyid gnas so// nyid la nyid sdud do// nyid la nyid spel lo// nyid la nyid sgrogs so// yongs su spro'o// shin tu spro'o// yongs su shin tu spro'o// spro ba de nyid dbyer med par gyur te/ gzhi 'dus pa'i rgyud bstan to// lam spros pa'i rgyud du ston to// 'bras bu yongs su 'dus pa'i rgyud du ston to// mang du bskyed pa'i rgyud du bstan to// nyung du sdud pa'i rgyud du bstan to// yongs su 'dus pa rtsa bar bstan to// yongs su

bkod pa bshad par bstan to// lkog tu gyur par ston pa kha skong bstan to// mdud pa dgrol bar dka' ba gcod par bstan to// des de bzhin du gsungs so// de nas de bzhin du mkhyen to// de rnams de bzhin du yi rang bar gyur to// mngon par 'dud par gyur to// de nyid de bzhin du gyur to// de nyid de bzhin sdud do// de nyid de bzhin bsdus nas de bzhin du gsungs so// yongs su gsungs so// rnam par gsungs so// de nyid gsungs pa bzhin 'dzin/ yongs su 'dzin to// rnam par 'dzin to// rgyud kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ yongs su bkod pa'i rtog pa la rjes su yi rang zhing bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u ste rtog pa bcu gcig pa'o//// sdud pa'i rgyud dam pa gsang chen gyi rtog pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku 'dus pa chen po'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta g+hu h+ya gsang ba dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes kyis bal yul du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dzA la sam+pa ra nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba'ang min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to// DA ni nam mkhar 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du btags pa ste// nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub

pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par brtags// kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o// shaM zhes bya ba bde bar bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang// byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang// de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo 'chang// nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang// de dag gi yang rigs yin no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang// rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog go/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba// de nyid bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems// lha la dmigs par byed pa dang// rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig mnyam sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs rnyan lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang// dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no// de

bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang// dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dang po'o//// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// de bas bde ba nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po// 'di la khrus dbang sdom mi dgos// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang// bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub// de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing// kun za de bzhin thams cad sbyong// spyod pa ji ltar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa'am// 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung// dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung// gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung// dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung// rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad 'grub par byed pas na// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis// nyes pa dag tu yongs mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de// phyag rgya'i cho ga dag gi ni// bsgrub na kun tu thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor ba// cha lugs ji bzhin sbyor ba yis// thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag/ bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'di bsgrub pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// shin tu byin gyis brlabs nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing// rnam pa kun tu mchod byed na// de yis

sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang// bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang// thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing// sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing// sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par// de yi bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas// dpal ni gzhir 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyis longs spyod kyis// ji ltar bde bar bsten byed cing// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dang// bdag nyid kun tu myong byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang// lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tu des ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu sbyor ba'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o//// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// so so rjes su rab 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'

dpal sbyor bas// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ rnal 'byor bde ba mos pa kun// so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun// so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dbang phyug kun// so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ mthu nyid kyis ni thamams cad du// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang// shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig spyod pas rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar// thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo yi// rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang// thams cad lha mo 'dus pas ni// ma lus skal pa bzang po kun// bde bas so so rjes su 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo bde ba chen mo kun// thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang de kun nas byung ba yis// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha ma kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing// rtag tu myong bar byed pa na// shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ra sa ya na bde ba des// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang// lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyod na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro

'ong lding// lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// de las rgya cher mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dbang phyug kun gyi bde myos pa// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o//// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// skal pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba// 'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang// dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par rab spyod do// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin drug dang// gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// skal pa bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// skal pa bzang po'i longs spyod kun// rang gi spyod par de spyod do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang// 'jig rten dbang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs nas de spyod na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan// phrogs las grub dang dran las dga'// ngo 'thon stobs gyis phrogs nas kyang// de ni dad la sbyin par byed// ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid// 'jig rten

dbang phyug kun dang bcas// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang// de ni dad la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na// longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yi mi sbyin ci yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang// phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na// las mchog dang ni rab 'byam dang// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za// sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ 'khor los sgyur ba rab grub pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lar spyod pa mthun par 'gro// la lar dga' ldan lha dag las// dam pa shin tu 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// sa lar bdud las rab tu rgyal// la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar pha rol mu stegs rnams// chos dang mthun par tshar gcad do// la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog/ grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pas dgyes shing rol// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus bar ni phyag rgyas 'debs// lha dang byang chub dga' ba rnams// brtan par sems can dag la smin// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// sems can kun gyi don byed cing// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o//// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs

rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang// bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul bas// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul na// myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re'am yang na zla re'am// yang na de bzhin lo re ni// ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o// khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang// de bzhin srog dang rtsol las 'byung// rang gi lha yi cha lugs su// bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod ba yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der// mchod pa byas nas des bsgrub bo// de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyi// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gdams ngag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste// rtag tu ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o//// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs dang snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtog pa med

pa'i chos rnams la// sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par mi rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya// brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te// de las theg pa chen po yi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus// dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang// tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pas// khams gsum kun la stag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab
