dang ldan pa// mjug tu me mtshams 'dab ma can// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma par 'gyur te// me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig/ lho las dbu ma yang yin te// byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste// me mtshams pa yi mgo gnon bya// dbus las tha ma gang yin pa// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// shar las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams can gyis gnon pa yi// dbus las dbu ma pa yang 'dod// byang las gnyis pa gang yin pa// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung ste// thig le nga ro ldan par bya'o// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung ste// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// i yig me mtshams ldan pa ste// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// lho las gnyis pa gang yin pa// thig le e thig sbyor bar bya// dbu las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams 'dab ma ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas shing// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// byang las dang po de bzhin du// byang las tha ma dang 'byor pa// sgra yig e dang sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal don yon shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// byang nas dang po bzung nas su// thig le me mtshams yang dag ldan// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pa dang ldan pa la// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// byang las dbu ma yang yin te// dbus las tha ma dang ldan la// yi ge lhan cig 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le nga ro ldan par bya// dbus

las dbu ma de bzhin du// sgra yig i ni sbyar byas te// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma pa dang ldan// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang// i yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dang po sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang// de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma// kun tu bzang mo gsum pa ste// bzhi pa zad med snon ma'o// dpa' mo sangs rgyas sku ldan ma// de bzhin gzungs ma zhal mdzes ma// sprin chen ma ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan ma'o// gling bu la sogs bsdus pa dang// sgo srung ma sogs yang bsdus te// me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni// dang po'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod// ces bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// o yig thig le dang ldan pa// yi ge e yis ldan pa yi// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang// me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// shar las dang po de bzhin du// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las tha ma pa yang bzung// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// tsheg drag gis ni mnyam par ldan// de ni bcu par yongs grags te// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur nas su// byang las dbu ma de bzhin te// sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa de bzhin// nub las dang po pa dang ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa la yang// dbu ma'i mtha' yang de yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// yi ge u dang mnyam ldan pa'i// dbus las tha ma pa 'gyur nas// me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa// byang las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// 'dren pa a yig dang lhan cig/ dbus las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// lho las dbu ma de bzhin du// shar las dang po pa yang yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig ldan par bya// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub kyi dang po a med par// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su// thig le u yig dang ldan te// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me

mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur te// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa// sgra yig u dang ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste// dbang ldan 'dab ma'i gdan can ni// lnga par yongs su grags pa ste// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma can dang 'dra// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa// sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa yang// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa ni// me mtshams gdan dang ldan pa ste// tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa// dang po yongs su grags pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// thig le yi ge u sbyor te// mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya// dbus las dbus ma yang bzung ste// lho las dbu ma de bzhin la// me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan// lho las dang po bzung nas su// thig le dang ni mnyam por ldan// nub nas dbu ma bzung nas su// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan bya// dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// shar las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub las dang po bzung nas su// dbus nas dbu ma ldan pa ste// thig le a yig ldan pa bya// bcu par yongs su grags pa ste// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha mar bzung nas su// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang// yi ge a dang ldan par bya// dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su// lho las gsum par 'gyur byas te// me mtshams gdan ni sbyor byas nas// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// yi ge a yig ldan pa yi// dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig e dang sbyor ba yi// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig u yis sbyor bar bya// nub kyi dang po bzung nas su// dbyangs yig e dang sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u yis brgyan byas te// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa yang// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig u yis brgyan pa ste// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa ni// gnyis

brtsegs yi ge u dang ldan// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// byang las tha ma ldan byas te/ tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa la// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya// byang las tha ma bzung nas su// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi// nub kyi tha mar 'gyur bar bya// lho yi dbu mar de bzhin du// lho las bzhi pa gang yin 'byor// tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa// 'dus pa gsungs pa yin pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho yi dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi// byang gi dang po yang yin te// shar las dang po bzung ba la// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// lho las dbu ma de bzhin du// tsheg dragayi ger ldan pa'o// zhes rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor byas te// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba la// me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// de 'og me mtshams pa yin te// nub kyi tha ma de bzhin du// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma yang yin te// nub las dang po bzung nas su// a yig med par gyur pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yis sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol can nyid la// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// shar las gsum pa gang yin pa// e yig me mtshams pa dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// thig le i yig ldan par bya// byang nas dbu ma phul nas su// de nas dbus nas tha ma ste// nub kyi dang po rtag tu ni// a yig med par brjod par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// shar las dang po gang yin pa// sgra yig e

yis brgyan pa ste// dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// lho las dang po gang yin pa// gnyis pa ru ni sbyor byas la// thig le i yig ldan par bya// de yang drug par 'gyur ba ste// byang las dbu ma de bzhin du// dbu ma'i tha ma yang yin te// nub las dang po rtag tu ni// a yig med par 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le e yig ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te// yi ge a dang ldan par bya// dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa nyid la// sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma bzung nas su// nub las dang po yang bzung ste// a yig med par byas pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma ru grags pa'o// gau rI tsau rI pra mo ha// bai tA lI zhes bya ba bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dag yin// puk+ka sI dang tsaN+Da lI// g+hasma khrag 'thung 'dra ba bzhi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig e dang ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams 'dab ma stan ldan pa'-i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po de bzhin du// thig le yang dag ldan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// thig le nga ro yang dag ldan// dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang// yi ge a dang ldan pa yi// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas par 'gyur// me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid// byang las dang po yang yin te// dbus las dbu ma pa yang bzung// e yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i// lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag o yig sbyor bas so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan pa'i// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba'o// o yig dang ni ldan pa yi// bden bral 'dab mar gnas de bzhin// lho las dang po de bzhin du// yi ge i yig ldan pa yi// byang las tha ma yang yin te// dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// me mtshams 'dab

mar gnas pa la// zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal// dbus las tha ma yang de bzhin// sgra yig a dang sbyor ba yi// rlung mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas nyid la// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa ste// sgra yig o dang sbyor bar bya// bzhi par yongs su grags pa yin// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid dang// me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi// sgra yig e dang sbyor nas su// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa yang// sgra yig i dang sbyor byas te// tsheg drag lhan cig 'dod pa'o// de dag [(]'di'i bar ma dpe la dogs pa yod[)]mda' rnon 'dzin ma la sogs pa grwa'i lha mo la sogs bzhi rnams kya'o// me tog ma sogs 'dus pa dang// sgo srung ma sogs 'dus pa ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor la/ sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// o yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma bzung byas te// bden bral phyi rol pa la sogs// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa la// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// rtsegs mar de bzhin lci bar 'dod// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang// byang nas dbu ma yang yin te// dbus las tha ma dang sbyor ba// brgyad par yongs su grags pa yin// byang nas tha mar de bzhin du// o yig me mtshams dang ldan pa// byang nas dang po yang yin te// dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor te// dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa yang// me mtshams 'dab ma bzung nas su// rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la// me mtshams pa stan ldan byas te// tsheg drag i yis sbyor bas so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan par// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa yang// me mtshams pa yi gnon pa yi// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// byang las dang po bzung nas su// sgra yig a dang ldan pa yis// byang nas gnyis pa gang yin pa// shar las gsum pa gang yin dang// byang nas dang po yang yin te// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// byang nas dbu ma pa la yang// dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te// yi ge i dang gcig par 'dod// lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su// tsheg drag lci ba kho na'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma pa

bzung ba// me mtshams pa stan ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas su// byang nas dbu ma pa la yang// dbus las tha ma dang sbyor la// sgra yig i dang ldan par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang// byang nas dbu ma pa la yang// dbus las tha ma pa sbyor la// sgra yi i dang ldan par bya// de ni lan gnyis brjod byas te// dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba la// thig le nga ro ldan byas la// de ni drug por yongs grags so// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag o yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung nas ni// byang las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i// dbus kyi tha ma bzung ba dang// nub las tha ma bzung ba la// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// me yi 'dab mar gnas pa la// sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya// lho las dbu ma bzung nas su// thig le nga ro ldan par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rnam par gzigs ma dang// sgrol ma dang sa 'dzin ma dang khro gnyer ma zhes pa'i pad+ma'i gtso mo'i lha mo bzhi gsungs pa'o// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang// byang nas dbu ma gang yin pa// dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te// de ni rtag par lci bar 'gyur// lho las dang po bzung nas su// thig le dang ni brgyan// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang// yi ge u dang mnyam ldan la// thig le nga ro yang dag ldan// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// a med nub kyi dang po'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang// sgra yig e dang ldan pa yi// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol pa la yang// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang// byang nas dbu ma pa la yang// dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te// de ni rtag tu lci bar 'gyur// de bzhin dbus las tha ma yang// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung

la// sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can gyi stan// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbu ma'i gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub kyi dang po 'gyur bar bya// de la a yig med ces pa// bdag gis thams cad du ni bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// me mtshams pa yi stan dang ldan// tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni// spras pa dag gi yi ge ste// dang po par ni yongs su grags// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang// byang nas dbu ma yang yin la// dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te/ sgra yig i dang sbyor ba yi// mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang// thig le u yig gis brgyan te// tha mar yi ge a la yang// thig le dang ni ldan par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag o yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las dang po bzung ba dang// byang las dbu ma pa la yang// dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te// sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya// dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las dbu ma nyid la yang// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma dang sbyar te// sgra yig e dang ldan pa ni// rtag par lci bar gyur pa yin// shar las dang po bzung nas ni// me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// dbus las tha ma bzung ba la// sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya// shar las dang po bzung nas su// me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan// dbus las tha ma pa yang yin// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ tsheg drag lci ba can ldan no// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas pad+ma'i na bza' dang/ snang 'gro ma byung// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma dang/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma zhes bya ba pad+ma rigs kyi lha mo bzhi gsungs so// gling bu ma tshogs 'dus pa dang/ sgo srung ma tshogs 'dus pa ste// me tog ma tshogs 'dus pa yang// pad+mas mtshan ma 'dzin par zad// dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs te/ dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la sngags byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// o yig thig le dang ldan par// sgra yig i dang ldan pa'o// bden bral phyi rol pa la yang// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// tsheg drag u

yig sbyor bar bya// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig i yis brgyan pa ste// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la// tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi// dbus las tha ma pa dang ldan// de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa// dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa// yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur bya/ de bzhin dbu las dbu ma yang// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin dang// byang las dang po sbyor ba yis// byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya// de bzhin nub kyi dang po yang// lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// thig le a yig ldan pa yi// nor chen rdo rje nyi ma yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma bzung nas su// me mtshams 'dab ma'i stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// bden bral phyi rol gnas pa dang// byang las dang po gang yin dang// dbus las dbu ma sbyor ba dang// tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin// byang las dang po sbyor ba yi// byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la// thig le u yig sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// byang las bzhi pa gang yin dang// me mtshams 'og tu ldan pa yi// dbus las tha ma 'byung bar bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// thig le dang ni mnyam ldan no// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du// me mtshams pa yi gdan sbyor ba'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// shar las dang po bzung ba dang// me

mtshams pa yi mgor sbyor ba'i// dbus las tha ma 'gyur bar bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// tsheg drag e yig sbyor ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ma dang/ mdzod gter ma dang/ rgyal mtshan mchog ma dang/ mchod chen mo zhes bya ba lha mo bzhi gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan pa// i yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i// dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// byang las dang po yang yin te// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin dang// e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// nub nas tha ma bzung nas su// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbus las tha ma bzung nas su// nub kyi dang po de bzhin te// rtag par a med 'gyur ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan par// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// i yig me mtshams pa ldan pa'i// dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i// byang las dang po yang yin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa// tsheg drag yi ge i dang sbyar// de ni 'gyur bar the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan dang// thig le e yig ldan pa yi// lho las dang po 'gyur bar bya// yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i// de nas byang gi dang po ste// dbus las tha ma de bzhin du// i yig dang ni sbyor ba yi// nub kyi tha ma 'gyur bar bya// tsheg drag o yig dang ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol par gyur pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan pa// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// dbus las tha ma de bzhin du// yi ge e dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te// de bzhin dbus nas tha ma dang// yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol 'gyur bar bya// thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i// me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mda' gzhu 'dzin ma dang/ rdo rje kha TAM ma dang/ rdo rje nyi ma mo dang/ rdo rje bsreg bya za ba mo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo bzhi gsungs so// gling bu+u ma sogs 'dus pa dang// sgo srung ma sogs 'du ba ste// me tog ma sogs 'dus nas kyang// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod// ces bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems

dpas gsungs so// rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las// sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// o yig thig le dang ldan pa// de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang// yi ge i dang mnyam ldan pa'i// byang gi tha mar 'gyur bar bya// yi ge u yig dang ldan pa'i// bden bral phyi rol pa yin te// dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang// thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te// rta mchog rgyal po'i gsang sngags te// thams cad dus su bzla bar bya// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa ni// 'joms pa las grub dran las dga'// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan par// de bzhin dbus las dbu ma pa// sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya// dbang ldan phyi rol de bzhin te// dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma yang yin te// byang las bzhi pa gang yin dang// me mtshams pa yi mnyam gnon pa'i// dbus las tha ma 'gyur ldan bya// lho las dbu ma yang yin te// tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni// sna tshogs pad+mo zhes su grags// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// o yig thig le dang ldan par// i yig dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i// dbus las dbu ma yang yin te// dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas// dbus las dbu ma ldan par bya// dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te// me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i// lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya// bden bral phyi rol bzung ba dang// dbus las dbu ma ldan pa yi// byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya// tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa yang yin// rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor la// sna tshogs rdo rje zhes grags so// gang dang gang gi dbus la ni// rta mchog 'di ni gzhag byas na// de nyid de yi dkyil 'khor yin// yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs med shin tu dga' ba dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te// rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o//// de la ji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na/ skyon med rtag pa gtan du ni// 'dod chags thams cad rjes chags phyir// de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che zhes so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhe na/ gtan du dga' ba

kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ byang chub sems mchog cho ga'o// de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje snying po yin zhe na// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yin// rdo rje dbang chen thugs yar 'dren pas kyang kar bsgyur// rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// dam pa dang po'i skyes bu'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe na// bsam med rgya chen zab pa ni// dngos grub thams cad zad med bde// kun gyi dri ma med pa ni// byang chub sems bdag brtan pa yin// de nas de'i yongs su las kyi khyad par ni// sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste// ting 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa sems dpa' ste// rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni// nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs pa// zla ba 'dra bar yang dag blo// rdo rje zhes su rnam par bshad// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin zhe na/ ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis// gang gi bskyed pa yod pa ni// bsgoms na thams cad bdag nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs phyir yang// rang byin brlabs 'di sgrub mchog ste// de nyid nyin re grub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob bo// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pa yang// ci phyir sems can don du 'gyur// de phyir kun tu bzang po yi// ci bzhin byang sems spyod rjes 'gro// de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yin zhe na/ sems de kho na bdud yin te// sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs// rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni// bdag ni bdud nyid nye bar 'gro/ de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das// mngon par byang chub pa dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na// rang sems so sor rig pa ni// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de nyid de las de sangs rgyas// rang byin brlabs mchog 'grub phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po mthar byed dang/ phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na// dbyer med so sor rtogs pa ni// sdang ba thams cad nges par gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni// byang chub sems bdag brtan pa yin// brtan pa thams cad 'grub don du// rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gi// phyag la phyag mtshan de byin te// des de phyag na rdo rje yin// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba yin zhe na/ ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// 'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni// skye ba dag

ni rigs yin no// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/ dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// kun grub zad med bde ba yin// bde ba chen po zhes 'dod do// gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste// phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir// mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po// dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir// dgyes pa dam pa nyi ma ste// sbyin pa la sogs mchog sgrub phyir// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// rdo rje rta mchog las nyid phyir// sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste// rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po// ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum nyid yin zhe na/ 'jig rten gsum dag mtha' yas phyir// 'dul phyir srid gsum mchog gsum bdag/ thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum// 'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir// mi g.yo thams cad kho na bdag/ sems 'du byed phyir g.yo ba ste// kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir// mkha' 'gro ma dag lha mor gsungs// thams cad mdzad pas skal ba bzang// rnam par rtog pa skal ngan par// brda yis mtshan mar gsungs pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ gtan du srid pa yang dag 'grub// dbang phyug chen po 'grub don du// dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du// bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs// 'dod chags chen po'i phyir bcom ldan// dam pa zad med shin tu dga'// gsang nyid phyir na snying po'i dbyangs// hU~M yig dam pa zad med pa'o// de la ji ltar nye ba'i snying po de nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa dang/ dam tshig dag ni spangs pa dang// de nyid gsang ba mi shes na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min// 'dod pa bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// de kho na ni 'dod chags yang// rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ni// 'dod chags de dang mi 'bral 'gyur// ling ga 'greng bar rang 'byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs byas nas// ling ga mchod rten byin brlabs te// rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'gyur// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te// rdo rje sems dpa' gnod med skye// ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te// khrag 'thung zhes bdag sngon skye'o// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga pad+mar

byin brlabs te// dag pa'i chos bdag sngon skye'o// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga rin chen byin brlabs te// rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskyed// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste// brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su// ling ga sna tshogs byin brlabs te// rta mchog dag ni sngon skye'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas te// der ni kha~M yig bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'od// sku gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la hU~M yig bsgom par bya// shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan pa'i spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la hrI yig bsgom par bya// khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la b+ha yig bsgom par bya// pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la tra~M yig bsgom par bya// nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod// sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// de la hU~M yig bsgom par bya// hU~M mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan par spro bar bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang// snying po yongs su grags pa yin// snying pos rjes su 'grub pa ni// nye ba'i snying por yongs grags so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang/ rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na/ kun 'grub zad med bde ba ni// bde ba chen po zhes su grags// de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste// don yod dam tshig 'da' dka' yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas su kha~M 'khor lo// de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin// 'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor skyed mchog yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams brtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis byas pa yang de bzhin no// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bya na// mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya// shar dang nub dang byang sogs phyogs// thig skud bzhi pa re'u mig brgyad// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin// pad+ma pad+ma'i tshul yin te// rin chen tshul ni rin chen gyi// sna tshogs kyi

ni zlum por gsungs// ci ltar 'dod pa ci bde bas// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa// re'u mig brgyad par 'dod pa'o// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni 'dod// re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas// gtso bo dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin// zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na// ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor dag/ gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni// gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor bas// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag pa yin// 'dir sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin// lhag chad cho gar gyur na yang// bsgrubs te skyon du mi 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na// sems dpa' gdod ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// gdod ma tha ma med phyir yang// dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do// 'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni// dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags ci 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'dod pa chen po kun gyi mchog/ yid bde bas ni 'dzum pa che// rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des// dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin// de nas de yi zla mdog ni// dam pa yig 'bru grub nyid phyir// chos rnams thams cad dag phyir dang// gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog/ de nas sna tshogs 'od 'bar ni// ci phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che// 'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang// sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od// de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na/ thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni// khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag mngon bskyed// khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces// dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin// de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyi+el mo krung yin zhe na/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnan pas// g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su// de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can// rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso// de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/ kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na// dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas// thams cad dbang phyug che ru 'phags// grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs// dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya// rdo rje

sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin// de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/ me long khrag 'thung zhes bya rnams// mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog/ so sor rtog la nyi ma ste// bya ba la ni rta mchog dang// chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya de bzhin yang// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni// de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen// chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis// rgya cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/ 'phrog byed ma dang 'dzin byed ma// gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma// nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags// gang gis skra ni bstan gyur na// de la dpral ba bstan par bya// mig la ston pa gang yin pa// de la lte ba bstan par bya// gang gis lte ba bstan pa na// de la mchu ni rab tu bstan// gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na// de la so ni rab tu bstan// gang gis lce ni bstan 'gyur na// de la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur// gang gis b+ha ga bstan gyur na// de la ling ga bstan par bya// gang gis rje ngar bstan na ni// de la brla ni bstan par bya// gang gis brla ni bstan gyur na// de la rkang mthil bstan par bya// gang gis skang mthil bstan na ni// de la sen mo bstan par bya// gang gis mkhyen khung bstan gyur na// de la smin ma bstan par bya// gong gis se gol gtogs byed na// de la mig ni btsum par bya// gang gi kha yang bstan na ni// de la zhags pa bstan par bya// gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na// de la mdung thung bstan par bya// gang gis sen mo bstan na ni// de la nu ma rab tu bstan// gang gis khu tshur bstan na ni// de la mtshams ni bstan par bya// gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na// de la bshang gci bstan par bya// gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na// de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o// gang gis ha skad byed gyur na// de la lag pa bstan par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na/ ri dwags mig gi 'bras 'dra ba// dpral bar tri shUl te mdung thung/ phyin log mig dang khro gnyer can/ nu ma dag ni mi sdug pa/ sna ni rnam par nyams pa dang/ gtsug gis bskor ba zhes bya te/ ri mo gsum gyis yongs su bskor/ de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni/ tri shUl tshul dang me long dang// ral gri tshul dang rgyal

mtshan dang// rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan// 'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'gro ma// 'di 'dra'i mtshan ma bstan par bya// glo bur mi dga' bya ba dang// don med par yang 'jug pa'o// rkang pas ral gri 'dri ba dang// tri shU la dang 'dra ba'i tshul// skad kyang bya rog 'dra ba yi// de ni rtag par gyur pa'o// mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa// dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya// zhes bcom 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug nas de nas bya ba ni// dril bu rjes su dkrol ba'o// de la ji ltar mchod pa chen po thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi// gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni// rjes su mchod pa dang gzhan yang// dbyangs dang sil snyan gar gyi yin// de la ji ltar rang gi rig pa'i lha thams cad bsgrub pa chen po'i rgyu yin zhe na// rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya kun// g.yo dang mi g.yo 'gyur ba ste// rang gi yi dam lha sbyor nas// thams cad de ni 'grub par bya// de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin zhe na// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin 'gyur nas// bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya// rtog pa thams cad rjes grub pa'i// mchog gi dang po 'grub pa'o// de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i// nub nas dang po yang yin te// shar nas dang po bzung nas su// lci bar i yig ldan par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// thig le u yig sbyor bar bya// lho las dbu ma bzung ba la// tsheg drag yang dag ldan par bya// the tshom med par de las 'dis// rjes su sbyor bar ldan par 'grub// lho las dang po bzung nas su// gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya// nan tan gyis ni i yig sbyor// skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro// de nyid thig le dang ldan pas// byang las dbu ma yang yin te// de nyid lan gnyis brjod par bya// rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang// thig le u yig ldan par ni// drug par yongs su grags pa yin// dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa// nub las dang po yang yin te// de ni a med shes bya ste// skad cig mas ni bdud rtsi 'grub// o yig thig le dang ldan par// yi ge u yig mnyam ldan pa'i// dbang ldan phyi rol pa yang bya// me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas// yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa// shar gyi dang po ldan par bya// tsheg drag u yig ldan pa yi// dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya// thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa// khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o// ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub bya 'grub// de

nas phyin ci log 'dod par// ci 'dod 'dod pa'i bya ba yis// kun bzang kun byed de bzhin te// langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am// 'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba'am// bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la// gang dang de ru ci de bzhin// gang gang dbang po'i lam nyid du// gang gang de de'i rang bzhin du// rang gi mnyam gzhag med sbyor bas// rang gis rig pa'i lha 'dren no// de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni// thams cad kho na 'grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong na rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog/ de ni nyes pa rnam grol te// dngos grub thams cad dbang phyug 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam por sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'i dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag phye ba yis// gsal bar rjes su gtsang ba dam pa rtag par sbyin pa yis// dam pa bde ba'i dngos pos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjes su bsgrub// dam pa'i dga' ba shin tu sbyor ba skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga'// rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin dag pa rtag tu rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos// dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa'o// dga' ba rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin kho na so so rjes su grub pa bde ba las dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs so//// bdag gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog/ bde ba chen po'i mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po// kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug nyid ni sbyin pa'o// mtha' yas thub med thogs pa med pa'i phyir// tshul chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi// mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel bar sbyin// gdod ma tha ma med pa gang dag gis// rdzogs phyed med pa nus pa ma yin no// sems can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang// mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang ma dag pa// rtag tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba yang// de rnams phan pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don 'di yin no// gang gis khyim gzung ba gang gis 'grub pa dang// bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed pa'am// mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur ba ste// dngos grub mchog gis rgyas pa'i las dag mi 'grub pa'o// gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang// gzugs sogs thams cad 'di la ji ltar mos pa bzhin// yi ge hU~M yang ji ltar rab tu 'dod par bris byas na// des ni rang 'dod dngos grub

cho ga bzhin du 'thob// sems can don du las dag byed pa ma yin pas// rgyal ba dag gis rnam par dag pa 'di la ni// bgegs med de bzhin du ni bdud kyang med pa ste// rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis rlobs// gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa la// bdud nyid du ni mi 'gro mi brtan nyid kyang min// brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de// myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir bstan par 'gyur byed do// gang gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni// mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde chen dang// chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang// yig chen yang ni rtag par bdag gis bgrub par byed// de nas mchog skyed rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas su// 'dzum pa chen pos thams cad khyab par rnam par byed// kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phran mchog chen gzugs dag gis// kun nas de la legs pa'i sgra ni dbul bar byed// bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su che mchog gzugs kyis su// pha mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas kun gyis legs so legs// mchog gi rdo rje las byung khyod ni legs so legs// dam pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs// dam pa'i las can mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so legs// rtogs pa'i byin rlabs mdzod cig mnyam par byin brlabs kyis// don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen po yi// grub pas phyi na mi 'dul ba yi dus su ni// de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder 'gyur phyir// de ltar ngag chen zhus nas su// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis// gsungs pa la ni mngon par bstod// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las// rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgyad cu bdun pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti nyid kyis bsgyur/ yon bdag bod kyi mkhan po gzhon nu grags pas zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa//// slar yang da lam slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i 'grel pa la bstun nas kyang bcos pa'o//// zla gsang thig le// dpapal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs thams cad mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i dbang brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen

po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ mtha' med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gsang ba/ zla gsang thig le'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs rin po che rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po'i bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings su rdul phran dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang/ skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gsang ba chen po'i g.yog dang/ 'byung ba chen po lnga dang/ 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis kun tu khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnams par dag pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang// me long lta bu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor byi dbang phyug chen po dang// so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ rlung gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ me'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ chu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ sa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gzugs kyi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ sgra'i dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ dri'i dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ ro'i dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ reg gi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ sku'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gsung gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ thugs kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen

po dang/ kun tu bzang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gsung gi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbag phyug chen po dang/ zhi ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gdul dka' ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ me tog gi mtshon cha'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ rab tu dga' ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ dbang gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ nyi ma'i khro bo'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ rdo rje rdo rje sgra chen bzhad pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gzhon nu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang// rgyu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ go cha'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ yang dag par za bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang// 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ pad+ma dmar po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ dam tshig gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyi mi khyab pa rnams dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa tshad med pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba ye shes rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang/ rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang/ gdung bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang/ myos par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma

chen mo dang/ gsod par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang/ ye shes dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang// rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang/ pad+ma dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang/ las kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mos nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang/ 'jum par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma chen mo dang/ rmongs par byed ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma chen mo dang/ rgyas 'debs par byed ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang/ 'dren par byed ces bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ gsod byed ces bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ 'bigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ gcod byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ sdigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ tshig byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ 'jigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ khrag la dga' ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ gcod byed ces bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ 'phyan ma zhes bya ba rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ ngag 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang// zas su sha rlon pa za ba zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ srin mo zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ gnod sbyin mo zhes bya ba nam mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gnod byed mo zhes bya ba nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ sbrul dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ ri dwags dang/ phag dang/ spre'u dang/ khyi dang/ byi la dang/ ra dang/ bya rog dang/ khwa da dang/ bya rgod dang/ sre mo dang/ mi'i keng rus dang/ 'bu chen po'i ro dang/ yi dwags dang/ sha za dang/ glang po che dang/ bong bu dang/ rta dang/ ma he dang/ ba glang dang/ 'ug pa dang/ rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa chen mo dang/ de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas pa mchog mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ chos kyi rdo rje mkha' la 'gro chen mo'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po rnams/ sgra ca co 'byin cing/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi mchod pa byed pa na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig

rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol pa chen po'i rab tu rnam par rol pa dang/ spro ba chen po'i gar dang/ glu dang/ sil snyan dang/ gzugs dang sgra dang dri \u0f84dang ro dang/ reg pa'i bde ba chen po bde ba khyad par 'phags par gyur pa dang/ rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i dga' bde la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul chen pos 'phags par gyur pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnon pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brod pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gar byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis za bar byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu 'jigs par byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dpa' bar byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zlog par byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis myong bar byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gyur bar byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrog par byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtsom par byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dus kun tu 'debs par byed pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs chen po shin tu dge ba'i bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa bde ba'i ros bskal pa brgya stong mang po bye phrag stong tshad med pa nam mkha'i dbying kyi rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jug pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi gzigs mi dgongs dgongs pa yang nye bar mi 'jog/ thams cad thabs dang shes rab stong par yang mi mdzad/ shin tu dga' ba phyin ci log nye bar 'jog par yang mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa mi 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar ma gyur pa dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi gdug pa gdug par yang mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po la sogs pa dang/ drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang/ gtum po chen po dang/ lha dang lha ma yin dang/ log 'dren dang/ yi dwags dang/ sha za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang/ tsha ba'i gdon dang/ nad dang/ sbrul dang/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar mi mdzad/ rnam par 'dul bar yang mi mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/ spyan gnyis mi 'dzums pas gzigs shing/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i dbyangs kyi bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal khyod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni bde ba grub pa ste// rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' rgya che sras su bcas pa rnams// yun ring stong pa nyid bsgom pas ni shin tu gdungs pa la// dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde ba chen po nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// kye/ 'dod chags de ni dri med spyod pa kun tu bzang po spyod pa ste// dag pa rdo rje 'dod par dam tshig mchog ni phyed mdzad nas// dka' ba rnam pa drug po spyod pas shin tu gdungs pa yis// rab tu dges dbang 'dod pa med la nyid kyis 'jog par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las byung ba yi ye shes chus// rin chen 'bar ba byang chub sems ni rnam byung nas// rgyal ba thams cad kun gyi dbu ni bsgoms pa la// dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pas// pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzad mthong bas// sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can brlag 'gyur ba// sbyor ba gzhan med ma thogs bshad par gsol// rdo rje sems khyod dag mchog bde bar byed pa'i mdzod// rdo rje pad+ma dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de// rgyal ba kun gyi gzungs kyi sku ni rab mthong ba// thams cad bde ba'i bsgrub pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po'i kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs des bskul ba thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing/ zhal 'dzum pa 'dor ba dang/ bskum pa dang/ 'gying ba dang/ spyan 'dzes pas smin ris bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang/ pad+ma'i phyag gis sor mo g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang/ 'dor zhing bskum pa dang/ 'jog cing ldog pa'i rnam par gnon pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ rlung la kun tu khyab nas me'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun tu khyab par mdzad nas/ chu'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ chu'i khams kun tu khyab na/ sa'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun tu khyab nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la

kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ ri dang sems dang/ sna tshogs dang/ phra ba dang/ sdom pa dang/ bud med dang/ gzhon nu dang/ rgan po dang/ skyes pa dang/ skyes pa ma yin pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ skar ma dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu bdag dang/ brgya byin dang/ 'byung po dang/ 'byung po las gyur pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar cher gyur nas yang 'dus nas/ phyag gar dang bcas pas thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la gtsug gis 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba yi// zla gsang thig le dga' byed pa// gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung// bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi ma skyes pas// skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ dri med nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng byas te// nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// chos kyi longs spyod yang dag 'byung// pad+ma dmar po mchog gi mdog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang chen po// thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi mchog/ la dang ar ni yang dag ldan// yang dag mdzes pa'i 'gying ba'i ros// sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che// zla gsang thig le mchog nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to// yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul te/ bsngags sor bzhag/ oM AHhU~M ma hA su kha a la la ho// ma hA su ma taSh+taM su ra ta su ra ta/ a ta b+ha ya g+ha su ra tod ta ma bod+hi su ka su ka ma nu sid+d+hi he// su ra ta a te ba so kya ma ya/ o~M hU~M a ho/ b+ha ga bAn ma hA su kha/ ud+d+ha ud+d+ha ra/ sa rbod ta ma so// k+Sha ya ma hU~M/ a la la hU~M/ ma hA su kha sha T+wAM/ ba ra ma hA su ka ma len du byi byo to ga ta ma/ dza le su khen/ a la la ho// su ra ta so'u khya kun// oM hU~M aM/ mi skye ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la mnab tu gsol/ a la la ho// sems dpa' bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang ba'i phyir// chags pa med pa'i bde mchog kun tu myong mdzad

bzhengs nas mnabs// mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol cing dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol// byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ ho// sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang nyon mongs sngo skams gzir ba yis// rmongs med bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzod// 'gro kun tshangs par spyod pa'i sgo mor byang chub lam ston cing// bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ a la la ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig le skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig le 'di las shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla gsang thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas te/ steng dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang sems can rnams la gsal bar byas nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te slar de nyid du log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu mnyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po snying po'i gsang ba mchog zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba na/ gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu stug por gyur par bsgrubs te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par phyung bar gyur to// de nas la la ni spyan pad+ma 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur cing bzlog ste/ smin ris g.yo bas// sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// rdo rje rab dgyes gdon mi za// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing// sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis// bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur// smin ma bsgyur cing zhabs bsgyur ba// spyan bsgyur shin tu gnan pa yis// sor mo tha ma rnams bsgyur bas// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gar mdzad de// rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// skad cig skad cig bskul ba yi// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par gyur// brjid pa'i zhabs dang rin chen

dbu// dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgyur bas// bde byed chen po myang bar mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing// bde chen bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// shin tu dgyes gsal bde dam pa// pad+ma dmar la phye mdzad de// 'dod chags bral dgyes rnam bsgyur bas// pad+ma dra bas gar mdzad cing// pad+ma rnal 'byor ma dkyil gyis// brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs te// bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing// bcom ldan pad+ma gnas par gyur// phyag gi rtse mo sor mo'i mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing// phyag sbyar khong stod pad+ma yis// glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i sprin gyis long long pos// sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing// sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyis bzheng pa bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/ 'od zer chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di dag thams cad la snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le la stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba thig le'i dbus su 'od zer des dgyes pa bskyed cing/ drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su// cho ga sbyor bas spro byas te// thig dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor don// sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar bya zhing// ji ltar yang dag brtag par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na// zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang// brtag par nus pa ma yin no// dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pa// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs kyi// lha yi sbyor bas rgyas btab pa// cho ga shes par bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang

yang dag ldan// thig bzhi yongs su bris pa ste// ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas// kun tu yongs su zlum pa yi// zla ba de yi dbus bcas pa// bde ba chen po mi phyed pa// gtso bo de steng bri bar bya// der ni tsheg drag bcas pa ste// yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yi// yi ge mchog tu bde ba ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byung// shes rab can gyis de'i mdun du// mi phyed yid phyung bri bya ste// drag por tshig dang 'dren par bcas// bzhi yi gtsug tu byas pa'o// de yi lho yi phyogs su ni// mi smra ba yi yi ge'i mchog// phyag rgya ye shes mchog thams cad// sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bri// ha dang rar ldan tsheg drag bcas// bzhi pa yis ni dbur byas pa// sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge ni// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// khro bo yi ge ye shes che// yi ge phyag rgya rmad byung ba// brjod du bcas pa dgod pa'i yid// byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya// sems can thams cad mchog dag dang// dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phyir// nga yis de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can mchog gi rten byed na// de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la gar mdzad cing/ rab tu spros pa spyan gdangs nas// zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'dzug par mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis// brjid pa rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan// mdzes pa'i smin tshugs rnam bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la// dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul mdzad cing// shin tu dgyes che'i dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par gyur// shin tu dgyes chen rdo rje'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bde chen po// dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan gyis bshad do// sngags sor bzhag lan d+ha'u pha'i su ra a ma hA su hu ag gu/ a la la ho// ma hA su hu pa ya lu ta thA ga tu di pu/ rnam pa kun tu skye ba med pa bde bas rol cing chub par mdzad pa yi// bdag cag gzungs kyi ngam dang bcas pa rnam dpyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid// bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yang bral te// che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog ldan bde spyod bde la rol par mdzod// a la la ho// 'di ni glu+u ru blangs pa yis// shin tu srid las mya ngan 'das//

dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa'i spyan ut+pa la kha phye ba bzhin du smin ma dang sku rnam par 'gyur ba glog dang chu rlabs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid ni// bdag nyid sbyor bas btags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi// dkyil 'khor zla ba gang 'dra ba// 'od zer dkar po'i phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin// rdo rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// mdzes pa'i zla ba kham pa la// mthing ga'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa// me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin// shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog bsgrub pa// rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor rgyas mchog 'gyur byed pa// pad+ma'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra// 'dab ma brgyad pa gyes pa yis// ge sar ze bas mdzes byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa// rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// rab tu 'bar ba'i me dang bcas// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya// skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo rje'i gang dag gis gar mdzad nas/ glu dang/ sil snyan dang/ gling bu dang/ pi wang dang/ rdza rnga dang/ dun+tu b+hi dang/ ba na ba dang/ ba li ka dang/ zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu brdung ba dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs pas rnam par rol pas/ lha'i ro dang/ ro'i zas dang/ bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ theg pa dang/ stan dang/ gos dang/ ldag pa dang gzhib pa dang 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin la bstabs nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad de/ g.yon du 'dud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid skul bar byed pa'i dbyangs 'dis bskul bar mdzad do// sngags sor bzhag ho pa ta su kha wa/ ha khra pu ka mad twa ya su'u kya ma ya/ sa ma ya ta ma ta ma ho// su ra ta so'u kya sa ste/ sham tsa ra di traM su ga ta sha na ta ma ya ma pra b+h+yi ku+u rarba ku rarba/ su ra twa tib ba/ badzra dza le/ phra bi badzri ma badzri ma ba/ su rtod su kha rat+na dza lo// phra ba ni ra ta ni ra ta/ su ka

sa ta na badzra dza le/ phra bi mad+ha ma rta su ra ta b+h+yi sha b+h+yi sha dza li/ ho ha hU~M d+hi ho ho dzA ya ma hA su ka ti tsa ma ya/ ra ma ra ma ho// su ra ta ka ru su ka ba hu b+h+yi te tse mu tra dza ya te tsa d+ha ra/ ha ha ha ho// ba ra ha sa su kha ho// hU~M ho ho su ra ta d+ha ra ga su kha/ ra ti ra ti ra ti ta pa ra ma shrI d+ha ti ho ho pa ra ma he du/ ma hA su ka ho// su ka ma nu mo'u na pa ra mo shwar ho b+ha ga bAn ma hA su ka hU~M ho ho// ba hu bi bi ta bi shwa dz+wa la rad ti b+h+yi/ sha ma ho su ra ta su khaM ga tsi tra pa ra ma/ ma hA su ka ho// su kha ma nukrin na ho// su ra to ta ta ma pan ti su ka hU~M/ badzra lA li hU~M ma hA su ka grin na ho// ho shin tu bde ba'i byams pas kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje'i spyan mnga' ba// byang chub chen po'i snying por 'gro ba sgrol bas skyo yid mi mnga' ste// mthun pa'i lam bstan nyon mongs dug las bsgral ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang bzhin bder gshegs kun la stob// e ma ho bde ba kun tu rgya yis btab pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing mnabs// sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos nyid ji bzhin bde la reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston te// snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro la thabs kyi sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dpal gyi snying po gzungs su bstan te rigs lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes mdzad cing// dgyes pa drongs la mnabs shing rab tu dgyes pas rol mo mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde mnobs bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gag med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan// snying rje chen po'i rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po ston pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin// dgyes pa mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo bskyed pa dang// rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog stsol bar mdzod// ha ha ha ho bde la gnas shing bde mnobs hU~M// dgyes pa mchog dang ldan pa'i mi skye bde mchog de nyid char pa rab tu dbab tu gsol// rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// dpal gyi rgyal po'i tshul bzhin ji ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas ni mnab tu gsol// ngo mtshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin bde thob pa// pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la'ang mi rten par// mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan// mtha' dang bral ba'i bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi// rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la snying rje'i chus khrus mdzod// ho shin tu dgyes mchog mi chags pa// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu

bzang po chen po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye bar gsan nas/ yang chu skyes kyi 'dab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun tu gzigs shing/ 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dgyes par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phran gyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin dang/ rin chen 'dzin dang/ chos 'dzin dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin chen po thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang/ thugs las byung ba dang/ mtshon dang/ dga' ba dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo'i g.yog gi tshogs tshad med pa 'dren par byed pa dang/ 'gugs par byed pa dang/ 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang/ grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang/ gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug chen po dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'degs shing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad pa dang/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pas 'gying ba dang/ spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa rnams dang/ kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang// de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang// sngags dang phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// de yi dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bsgom las 'das// rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa// 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnam dpyod pa// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod

chags mnyam// chu yi pad+ma dmar ba 'dra// rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pas// gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba// sems ni chu dang skul byed pa// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang/ pho nya dang pho nya mo dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang// nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa' mchog/ kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor che ba// rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med// 'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur bas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba'i gar mdzad pa// rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du// rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+ma'i sor mo'i 'dab ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang/ gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid bag tu bcas pas mtha' 'grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar ba'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs pas bzhad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang/ gcig la gcig bskul ba dang/ bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'degs shing g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/ o~M hUM a la la la ho/ sngags sor bzhag/ ag ku'u ra a ma hA su hu/ ag gu'u/ a la la ho// ma hA su hu a ga'u ra a ma hA su hu tud du// kun tu snang zhing mi chags par// mi chags pa yi bde mchog gis// bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyi rnam// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas// a la la ho// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// bzhengs shing gzhan la stobs la grub par mdzod// chags pas mi gos dngos po yi// bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol// de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyis dbyangs chen po'i bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te// shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnon par gar mdzad/

shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyi glu len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil nas/ oM ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug ma phyung ngo// steng du zla gam ldan pa yi// gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu// mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa// ye shes gsal ba'i rnal 'byor ma'o// A li kA li 'dren bya ba// dbus su ri mo brtag byas te// de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu// khro bo gnyis po mchog bsam bya// 'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal pa// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o// 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang// bsod nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur// A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri// ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan// de steng zla gam thig le dag/ mgo mjug gnyis su gzhan yang trAM// 'di ni don dam gsal ba ste// rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin// dran pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed// A' li gnyis dang ldan byas te// tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad// 'di ni rab dga' kun tu chags// chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po skal ba chen po yi// tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi A li 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la'am yang na gzhan// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub byas na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog/ yi ge'i phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i// 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// e ma'o bde ba ye shes che// de yi ye shes tshe 'di la// 'dod byed bde ba sten byed cing// 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po yi sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// zla gsang thig le'i gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzogs so//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yid dga' ba bskyed nas gar dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen

po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par gyur to// bde byed chen po bshad pa shod// bde ba chen po bshad pa shod// gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dgyes pa chen po bshad pa shod// khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung// khyod las zhe sdang chen po sde// khyod las sdig byed sdug bsngal dang// khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung// khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang// khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang// khyod las 'dod las rnams grol dang// khyod las byang chub bla med 'byung// khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang// khyod las gzi brjid me yi khams// khyod las de bzhin chu dang sa// khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun// khyod las sangs rgyas dpa' chen po// yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang// khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang// ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung// khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang// khyod las dri med pad+ma dang// khyod las rin
