chen tshad med che// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung// khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams// khyod las rig pa'i snying po 'byung// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums pas smin ma brkyang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ gzhan yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos nyid kyi snying ga'i rdo rje gsor zhing/ nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje rjes su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i blta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas 'od zer phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dang po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa// thig ler bcas pa bsam byas te// bde chen tshul bzhin gzhag byas la// gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas// yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru// tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag// 'di ni gsang ba chen po ste// rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i

phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin// ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'dis// skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa po// ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba chen po skul byed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs par byed/ yi ge'i ye shes grub pa yis// ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// 'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che// mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra par// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po rig pa che// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o// shes rab ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te// rig ma 'bum phrag brgyas bskor cing// sems dpa' chen po de dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// thal mo brkyang ste rol pa yis// tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan// dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa yi ni dgos pa rnams// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// 'og dang steng gi nam mkha' la// bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug nas su// stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de// byang chub par ni gdon mi za// bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas// gzhom zhing de bzhin myang ba yi// rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams// rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad bsgral// bde ba chen po gtong ba yis// skad cig nyid du gso bar bya// grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che// dpa' bo chen pos dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par// rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po// gnod byed stobs kyis mngon par ni// rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis// gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya// mtshon cha lnga yis rnam gnon pas// gzhan gyi bud med rtsen par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i// sems can chen pos grol byas te// byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// dam tshig rjes su ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// skad cig mtho ris 'gro bar byed// skad cig bde ldan 'gro bar byed// rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du// sems can skad cig 'di ru'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su 'gyur// sems can rnams dang grags chen po// thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang// pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te// de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin// de dag 'di la rab tu gnas// dbang por gyur pa brtan chen po// yon tan tshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin// de nyid dngos po thams cad la// thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde// sems dpa' thog ma tha med

yin// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che// ye shes thig le ldan pa ste// rdo rje yid 'byung lhags pa yi/ lha mo yi yang/ ha la ra btags dbu bskor bya// 'di ni yid las skyes pa ste// shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yi// yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che// gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yi// gsang ba'i snying gi pad+ma la// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni de ma thag nyid du// shin tu dgyes pa'i mnyes par 'gyur// gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la// de yi bde bas mnyes byas te// dbang po yi ni sbyor ba yis// de dang rol pas myur du 'grub// de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las// shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te// rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang// lha mi kun gyis mchod par 'gyur// de dang lhan cig rol pa na// lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul gnas pa'i// bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o// nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi// shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa// sems can gar ni byed pa dang// sems dpa' che la mnyes par byed// de ni sa dang nam mkha' la// bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed// sna chogs lha mo bde che ba'i// sna tshogs bde bas nyer spyod do// phyag rgya'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing// sems can myur du rtogs par byed// ral grir gyur pa gzi chen po// nam mkha' kun tu phan tshun 'gro// lha mo 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang// lha min klu yi bu mo dang// gzhan yang 'phrul ldan mi'i bu mo// de yi bud med kun bsgrub bya// phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas// de nyid kun tu 'gro byed de// ji tsam 'dod par dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' nga yis tshe yang che gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub// thams cad chos ni bde chen po// dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams// de dag thams cad de yin no// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs gnas pas// gzhan gyi bud med rtsen par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste// skad cig skad cig bsten pa yis// bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni// de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te// bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te// snang ba med cing yi ge med// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid dang rjes su mthun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// lha mo rdo rje kI li ni// dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa// bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni// dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste// de yis

bud med snying ga ru// bdag nyid kyis ni byin brlabs te// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas rnal 'byor chen po de// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu// mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro// bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la// phyag rgyas de yis rgyas btab ste// rdo rje pad+ma phye ba yis// sgrub pa pos ni myur du bsgrub// pad+ma rnam par phye byas te// phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te// sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na// de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro// bdag nyid gan rkyal gnas byas te// nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya bzhag/ nyid kyis byin brlabs phyag rgya la// sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag tu// dgyes dang mdza' ba gnyis bzhugs par// mi g.yeng phyag rgya bzhag byas te// bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par bsgom// 'di yis dngos grub thob 'gyur te// 'di dag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis// gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// nub gcig bdud rtsi dbyung byas te// gzungs ma'i phyag rgya la brten nas// rmad byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad// mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'// dang por gnyis ka 'dus byas na// sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba// de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro// phyed dam yang na nam phyed na// rig ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing// myur bas khros pa'i sgra sgrogs pas// gyad kyi 'gyed pas brtsam par bya// bkye ba'i mjug tu de ma thag// 'o ma mchog ni btung byas nas// de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub// zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar byed// bya ba de bzhin bzlog pa dang// ci bder bsten pa byas pa las// byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag/ 'phrog ma yi ni dngos grub bo// 'di yis rin chen gtsug nyid du// mi g.yeng mtshan mo byas gyur na// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'phrog byed de// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis thob// 'di yis snying gi zla gsang la// thig le nyid du brtag byas na// de ni de ma thag tu yang// zla gsang thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur// 'di yis reg pa tsam gyis kyang// dngos grub gang dag 'thob byed de// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po// rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu// 'di ni sgrub pa'i dus su yang// rnam par rtog pa yong mi bya// rtag tu

mi rtog 'gyur ba yis// nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// sdug bsngal ba yi sems can la// sbyin pa bzhi ni rtag tu sbyin// de la bde ba sbyin byas te// mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya// shin tu dgyes pa'i sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje kI li kI li shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'o// thog ma oM ste mdza' chen mo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel// 'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la// 'dod chags bde byed snyoms par 'thob// rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la// 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya// 'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// pad+ma kha che rgyas pa'i spyan// sngags mkhan de ni skad cig 'gyur// gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gis// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya// sprod pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab ste// skad cig skad cig spyad par bya// dus dag tu ni reg pa dang// gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya// bskyod dang mnye ba de bzhin du// mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya// bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang// skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya// gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang// 'jib dang de bzhin btung ba dang// the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// mi g.yo tshe 'dir dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang// bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos// 'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma thag/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rjer gyur te// lag na pad+ma 'bar khyer bzhin// blo ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas// brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig tu// bde ldan zhing du 'gro 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po der phyin nas// bde ldan gyi mchog gtso bo yi// pad+ma'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// de ni bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur ba// dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// pad+ma las skyes gzungs bzung ste// byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na// pad+ma bde ba'i bdag por 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du// sngags mkhan 'gyur bar gdon mi za// sdug cing lang tshos brgyan pa yi// nyi ma'i 'od zer gsar byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i blta ba yis// pad+ma sems dpa'i tshe 'grub bo// ji tsam nam mkha' nye bar ni// dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de// rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi// lha mo yis ni mchod par byed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rtag tu

nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyi phye ma'i sbyor ba yis// sbrul ni gsod par 'gyur ba bzhin// zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur te// 'di yi mthu yi ngo bo yis// dgos pa thams cad dngos grub po// gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa// 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dran pa tsam gyis de dngos 'grub// shin tu dgyes pa pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes so//// dang por o~M dang yang dag ldan// tha mar bsgyings pa'i hU~M nyid de// dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag/ yi ge 'di ni rmad byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di ni dngos grub che// dpal gyi bsgyengs pa 'thob bar 'gyur// bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni brgyal byed de// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas// de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed// bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te// de yis khams gsum longs spyod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// pad+ma rdo rje rab ldan bya// phreng phyed phyed pa'i yang/ phreng byed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs byas te// bsnyen na myur du dngos grub bo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bsgyur bas// chu skyes spyan ni sbyar byas te// phyag rgyas btab ste rol byas na// bla ma'i dngos grub 'thob par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis// rdo rje'i bdag nyid mchod byed de// de dag kun gyis bskor byas nas// dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yis// 'jigs shing skrag pas 'byin byed pa// rang nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i gzugs// nyid kyi dngos grub stobs par byed// gzhan ni yang dag pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyan// de yang de la 'jigs skrag nas// rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed// bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang// che ba'i pha ni ngo bzhi dang// rdo rje 'dzin dang gtogs 'dod rnams// rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed// gshin rje sha ka rgyal po yang// rdo rje 'dzin de dngos grub la// 'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa rnams/ srog gi phyir yang stobs par byed// gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams// khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag/ myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang// bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed// sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che// dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed// de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug btud de// rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed// gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs// sha za yi dgas bu mo rnams// sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te// brtag pa mchog gis brtag par

bya// thams cad las byed dge ba yi// 'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub// lha dang klu yi bu mo dang// lha min lha yi mngal skyes pa// phyag rgya 'di yis byin brlabs na// grub pa myur du dngos grub bo// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung// gang de bud med bzung byas pa// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba brtag par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang// de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du// skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o//// nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du// de bzhin thig le'i rgyal po ste// rab dgyes rdo rje lha che bde// mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyar ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin// phyag rgya'i yi ge 'di yis ni// mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas na// de ni de ma thag tu yang// bla med 'phrul gyi spyan du 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas shin tu dra ba mthong// smin ma rnam pa sgyur pa yis// lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing// 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang// dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin kun dang// pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang// de bzhin gzungs ma'i tshogs rnams dang// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang// phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog// grul bum mi'am yi dgas sam// sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo// 'di ni snying gar bzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgya yang na nyi ma dang// pad ma dra ba sna tshogs blo// lha dang lha min mi dag dang// gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang// bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi// gzhan gyis 'phrog par yong mi nus// lha dang lha min gyis mchod cing// dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed// lha dang lha min sten byed cing// skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen pa'i yul// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang// de ni rtsen zhing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa// thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas// dgyes pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur// pad+ma'i nang na pad+mar 'gyur// sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas// dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa'ang gzugs mchog 'gyur// mig med pa yang mig ldan

'gyur// rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rnor 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag med pa// mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// de yi lus la yon tan ni// yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur// ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs// 'phur zhing 'og tu 'bab par byed// de ni ri yang phug nas 'gro// sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas// de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan 'gying ba gar byed pa// bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can de ni 'jug par byed// mi g.yeng blta ba'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// 'degs pa dang ni lta ba yis// gar dang rnam par bskor ba dang// 'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de// ri dang sems can thams cad la// smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang// ci dga' ba ni mngag par byed// gdug pa'i blta bas srog chags rnams// rdeg pa dang ni sgrol bar byed// gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang// khro bo'i lta bas sgrol bar byed// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po'o//// dang por o~M gyis rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i sku// bde ba skyed byed bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi// gang gis 'di ni bsgoms ma thag/ rdo rje gsum kyis byin rlob 'gyur// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung// 'di yis nyid kyi snying ga ru// bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na// sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub// bsgrubs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud med kun dang rtsen byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// sems can dman pa'ang dngos grub bo// shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang// sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te// skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyis// chu skyes zhabs la bsnyen par byed// lha dang lha min bu mo de'i// rig mas mthong na dga' byed de// phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan pa yi// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// mi'am ci dang skyes bu yi// dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas stod byed de// 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni// bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing// kun gyis bstod mchod bsti stang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i mtha' klas lha rnams dang// nyi ma bcu yi 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun du// 'od kyis thams

cad mnyes byed cing// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de// lha dang lha min grul bum dang// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag pas 'ong bar byed// bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bka' blangs gdul dka' rnams// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi// dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi// zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid// rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang// chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung// 'tsho ba'i ngang du bdag cag 'bangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar zham ring du// ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas gdab na// spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/ shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen mo bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin to//// dang por oM steng thig le ste// gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas// gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// gsung gi rdo rje shin du dgyes// bde gsang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mchog tu ro ni myong byed pa// dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i// gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed// yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di// byang chub chen por 'grub byed de// yon tan yon tan sdug mtho ba'i// tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na// dpal kun bdag po de ma thag/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob// phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan// rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas na// dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi// de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te// ci ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na// de yi srog ni tha ma yin// de yi bsrung ba byas na dpal// tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas// sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni// mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs la// sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang// chos dbyings mi mnyam rab klas pa// dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang// shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po de khrid do// rang gi ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe// dam

tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba// ji snyed nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad de spyod de// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing// ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed// de ni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal// 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur/ rdo rje gsum de rmad 'byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed de// bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas// nam mkha'i rim pas 'gro 'ong byed// lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang// bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dge// gnas dang zas dang btung ba sogs// nam mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed// bud med rin chen mchog mkha' las// bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// de yis khams gsum 'thob par byed// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med de// bud med mchog tu bde ba las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyad pas 'grub// dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur// gzungs ma kun gyis bde chen po// rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// gsungs thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+ma'irigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o//// o~M bcas mi phyed tha mar te// rab tu sems ni bde ba ste// rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed che// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab bsgrubs pa// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas na// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung// bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang// rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang// lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa// skad cig tu ni 'phob par 'gyur// lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing// de ni rab dgyes bdag po khrid// pho brang dga' byed rab dgyes che// rab tu chen po bde 'thob tu// seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do// bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed de// rang gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni//

pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang// sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor// sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni// sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa// ris 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa// res 'ga' khab nas 'byung ba dang// res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// res 'ga' skye dang res 'ga' 'pho// res 'ga' spyod chen rol pa dang// res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo skor mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad// res 'ga' dus su shin tu mdzes// res 'ga' bud med skyes pa dang// res 'ga' lha dang skyes dgu'i bdag/ res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa// ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la// bdag gis ngo bor ston par byed// mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis// 'dren pa mi phyed nye byas te// phan tshun reg pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyis de 'bigs te// gzungs ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams// bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas mi sprod bde dam pa// 'bad pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur// brjid pas byang chub snying po ru// rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan pas so// thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin de// yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid las skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad grub par byed pa'o//// dang por o~M ni sbyor ba ste// tha mar gnyis po rdza rnga'i sgra// rab dgyes rdo rje byin rlabs pa'i// lha mo mngar byed dbus su gzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma// rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis// bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'dam skyes bcug byas na// de nas de myur dngos grub po// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan// tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi// sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing// sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi// 'phrul gyi bud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen mo mngar byed kun tu myang ba me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel

ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdon mi za ba'i gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o//// tshangs pa'i gsung gi nga ror bcas// tha mar dril bu'i nga ro gnyis// dbus su ming gi phreng ba ste// yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi dngos grub thob byed de// 'dod pa yi ni thams cad rnams// yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams// bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang rung// de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na// rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang// lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha mo'i tshogs dang rtsen byed cing// lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jigs par byed dang rku byed pa// sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa// sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni// brjid la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'gro// brjid che pad+ma chen mo la// thams cad kun tu brjid pa yis// bde byed chen po myong byed de// rab tu dgyes pas sgeg pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas// rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te// 'di ni snying la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa thob// phyag rgya chu skyes btab byas te// de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o//// dang po nyid du o~M bya ste// thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar brgyan// tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' mar gzhag byas te// rdo rje rab dgyes brgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying gar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang// gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang// sbrul dang mi'am ci gnas pa// thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur// 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste// sna tshogs rab 'byung dpal gyis yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing// spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed de// sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed// mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab dga' bas// A li kA li pad+ma bde mchog la// myong zhing mchog byas bskal bar gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga'

bar 'gyur// 'dis ni bde ba'i ngo bo de// 'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o//// dang po o~M dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dgyes pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin brlabs pa// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge// kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis// sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi// bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur// de nas de yi chos dbyings gnas// dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo// pad+ma'i mdun du thog ma'i lha// byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste// kha yi nang du gzhag par bya// chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni// mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// A li kA li rab sbyor bas// bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya// bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas// dang po o~M ni gnas pa ste// tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin// 'di dag mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtan po yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mar gtugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya// myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te// bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub// sems can kun gyis 'dod bskyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ pad+mo'i tshul du sgeg pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas// rdo rje chen po de dngos grub// ci dga' 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod// bsgrubs na brtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya// de ni dngos po kun yin te// 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu brtag pa yi// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos// dpal

ldan thog ma tha ma med// chos rnams kun gyi rjes mthun pa'i// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang// 'di la khyad par cung zad med// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i mchog gi sku'o//// dang po o~M bcas lha mo yi// tha mar tsheg drag mi phyed gnyis// de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du// he zhes bya bas rnam brgyan te// shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje che// bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan par// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro// de ni de phyir sangs rgyas mthong// chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bde ba che// dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin// byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang// bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba chen po mgu bar byed// bde ba'i thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/ rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o//// o~M ni dang por gtsug tor bya// te de skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba// bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi// phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang// dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster// sdig pa kun las grol byed cing// bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro// mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing// sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ges brgyan te 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed// rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing// rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yob byed pa'i// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel pa 'thob// blo ldan nam mkha'i ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed// pi wang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis// glu blangs dngos

grub rgya che thob par byed// ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i// de dang mthun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed// kha T+wa ba dag ra dza'i dbyangs// glu ru blangs pas pad+ma gnas// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// 'di yis byin rlabs dag pa dang// 'di yis byin rlabs bde ba'i rnams// sbyor ba 'di yis sbyor ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o//// de bzhin o~M ni dang por te// dbus su he dgyes bde ba che// rdo rje gar byed bde ba gnyis// 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab dgyes nyid// rnal 'byor yis ni rgyas btab na// bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro// 'og min gyi ni gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs cig 'grogs// bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang// chos kyi rgyal po bde chen thob// ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las// sgyur bar byed pa bshad pa dang// ji snyed de snyed phyag rgya'i rnams// gnyis min 'dus pas 'di dngos grub// kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po// kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che// kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams// pad+ma gsal ba gar gyis ni// rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di// sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pas// myur du gar ni med byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gar zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum pa'o//// bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// spyi bor thig le ldan pas te// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// nam mkhar zla skar 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad byung ba'i// 'di yis thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste// gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi// tsha ba'i gser gyis gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying gar bsam par bya// nam mkha'i nyi ma 'bum 'dra bar// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba// rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi// sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur nas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo// 'dod pa chen po sten par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo

rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o//// de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'brel ba// tha mar khri bcas sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcad pa yang thos par 'gyur// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad ni// sgra yi thos pa dngos grub po// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ster// bud med pad+me ut+pal dang// ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mar sbyar bas na// dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo// rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don gyis dpal thams cad grub par byed ma'o//// oM ni spyi gtsug thig ler babs// rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can// rdo rje dri bder 'brel ba yi// tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje brgyan pa yi// de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen// de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya// rdo rje'i dri dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o//// oM mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te// shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du// rdo rje ro ni sbyor che ba// tha mar ho ste thig le gnyis// 'di yis rab tu dgyes par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rol ba yis// mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de

dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzungs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang pho nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing// thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// skul pa yis ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gtso la mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o sbas pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don// kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs// kye ma'o bde ba dag pa che// kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs// kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin// kye ma'o ji ltar mthur rig ma'i// kye ma'o sna tshogs dgos pa che// kye ma'o dag pa gsum sbyar ba// kye ma'o rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma'o pad+ma rnams phye bas// kye ma'o dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o// kye ma'o mchog dang mnyam pa'o// skye ma'o gar ni dag pa che// kye ma'o glu rab dri ma med// kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par 'brel// kye ma'o brda' 'ang brdab dang mun pa sel// kye ma'o dag byed me tog phreng// kye ma'o spos snod dge ba ste// kye ma'o mar me mun pa sel// kye ma'o dri ni shin tu bsil// kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor// kye ma'o sgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog/ kye ma'o rin chen bde mchog skyed// kye ma'o sna tshogs pad mchog ldan// kye ma'o sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang// kye ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye ma'o ngo mtshar lha yi rnams// shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'gying ba yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te// sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de// phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud// sked pa'i dbyibs ni rnam par yangs// snams kyi ngos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung

zad tshems kyis gnon// tshems kyi phreng ba kun+da zla// mig drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing// rab tu dga' che dgyes pas bstod/ sngags sor bzhag/ ra la ra ma na ho// ma hA su hu ma dzu+u ma hA su ra An sen ho// pa I adz+hu a la la ho// sa ra mu ma hA su hu/[ ÎÄµµÖÐµÄÍ¼Ïñ]na ha mu ha da ha/ na Na ma i kha dza pa ang dzu ho// b+ha ga bAn ma hA su khe du sh+ya ho// o~M badzra sa twa su ra staM/ sarba ra sa ra sa gra/ ma hA su ra su/ kha shu me/ sid+d+h+yanid+d+h+yan/ ra ma ra ma/ sarba ra ma sarba yo gi nIn/ rA gA ya he// b+ha ga wAn ma ka ma hU~M/ a la la ho// b+ha ga wAn ka ma ru ra ta s+t+waM/ ka ma hi ma man+dzu/ b+h+yi a pi/ a ba ra ma hu ma/ a la la ho// ba ta g+hu la sha sa ha ra sa a la su ha/ e ru bi a si/ a ma hu pa hu ma sa ra ma hu ma/ ba ra ka ya bi bo ha n+ya ma lu+u sa ru/ ma hu ra ra ma a ho// ma hA su hu angadzu/ pe sa he ku li sit+ta mu/ su ra ha sangadz+dzu/ ki dza hi pa tsa lu su rA ga mu gadz+dzu/ bod+hi pa ma ga mu la/ bi pa i adz+dzu a la la ho// sa ma a ot+ta mu ka dz+dzu/ a la la ho// su+u ra a o da ta mu sadz+dzu/ bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing// gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan te// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtsen pas dga' bas spyad pa stsol// a la la ho// dam tshig rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing// 'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar bya ba'i chos de bde gshegs don du mdzad// ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung// bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad de// byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskul la bsnyen par mdzod// ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs// bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod mdzem mdzes kyang bcas pas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang dang ldan pas kyang ni de la rag lus so// a la la la ho// yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus// byams ma'i gzungs ma bdag nyis che dang rab tu brtson mdzod la// thugs rje chen po rang bzhinadag pa'i chu des bdag cag dbang bskur cig/ mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob 'dod phyir// dam tshig chen po gsum po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni// zla gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// shin tu srid pas

skyo ba yis// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin// glu blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tu dgyes te de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+mo dang las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs su bcas pa rnams dang/ phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs las skyes pa rnams la shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang dbyangs dang/ brdung ba dang zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dam tshigs chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de dag kun dgyes nas// shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du// pus mo'i lha nga btsugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs// dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la/ bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsaul// gang gi sems can bde nyid kyi// bde bas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzad do// phyag gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis// mdun du thal mo bkan bar bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam// de dag ming gi brda yis ni// sor mo thams cad brtag par bya// sbom po phan tshun bsnol byas te// shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag/ rdo rje mchod rten phyir byas te// lhag ma 'od bzhin spro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge/ gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob bo// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan// btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin// shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na// 'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la// 'di yis byin rlabs gar byas te// rdo rje pad+mor gzhug byas nas// sems ni bzhugs pas bsgrub byas la// de nas sems de blang byas te// blo ldan de yis btud byas na// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi'am// de bzhin gshegs pa

'phrul brtag 'thob// sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis// kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus// shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o//// thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa// sbom po skyil krung gzhag byas te// sna tshogs phreng ba 'bar byed pa// rnal 'byor gyis ni lhag ma spro// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal/ phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang// rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur te// rdo rje dkyil gyis mtshan btab pas// sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs// rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang// rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur// ji ltar dngos grub 'dug pa dang// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams// skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang// rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang// gso bar byed dang za ba dang// phan tshun du ni skyed par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//// rdo rje'i thal mo de nyid las// khro mo rgyab ni bskum byas te// sor mo lhag ma snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// de ma thag tu 'phrog par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa thob// 'di nyid kyis ni dbang skur dang// 'di nyid kyis ni bde dam pa// 'di nyid kyi ni rgyal po che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis// rab dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub bo// mi la 'di yis byin brlabs te// nyi ma phyed na spyad byas na// 'di ni de ma thag tu yang// dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin/ nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'dra bar// zhag bdun gyis 'gyur gzhan gyis min// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul ba dang// dge ba thams cad dbang du byed// grol 'dod rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'o//// pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid// dge ba'i khro

mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te// tshig dang tshig tu rnam bral ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam pa de 'gyur te// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// pad+mo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma rnam mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po nyes spangs te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar byas pa// bsgrub par mi byed cung zad med// 'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis// bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i myos par byed pa'i dpal pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//// 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu// bsgyur nas gzhag par byas pa ni// ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/ sgrub po thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di yis byin rlabs nas// sngo bsangs mkhur tshos dkar mo dang// de dang lhan cig gar byas pas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sngo bsangs zhing ma phreng ma dag/ byin gyis brlabs nas dus gnas gsum du// mtshan gyis mthar ni bsnyen byas nas// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rigs ngan can dang sme ma dang// gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs te// bsnyen dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//// phyag rgya de dag bstan pa rnams// gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi gnas// dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcings pas bcing par byed// de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed de// mda' yi tshul gyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni rab dgyes gtso bo yis// pha rol phyin mchog sdug sdud pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byad pa// dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// mi shes byed pa 'jigs par byed// las kyi don ni bka' bzhin du// dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs pa yis// bde chen rgyal po 'dra bar

'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing// 'dod dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// snying gar gzung ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yis las kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed// rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang// thams cad 'di yis slong bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du las la sbyor bar byed// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yis// gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje pad+mar bcug pa yis// mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba yis// dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas// bde chen po yi bde 'thob bo// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar pa 'grub byed de// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed// rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing// nam mkha' gzungs ma'i thabs nyid kyis// phan tshun gcu pa'i gnan pa yis// bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo// de ni de ma thag tu yang// lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang// nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// spyi bo yis ni phyag byas nas// rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang// nyid kyis dpal can stobs pa yis// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing// sangs rgyas dgos pa rab sgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzungs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang// spyod pas gar gyis byas pas so// gzhan dag kyang de dngos grub che// pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams phye bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni pad+ma sgrub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal// shin tu dgyes pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba thob par byed pa'o//// thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis// bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya// phyag rgya 'di ni chu srin zhes// rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste// 'dod bral chags par bsgrub pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi// pho

brang chen por 'gro bar byed// der phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par ni skor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor// sdig spang rnams ni bkug nas kyang// spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar bsnyen par byed// yang dag byang chub gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed// de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi// rang gi dam tshig gsungs pa yi// sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed// bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang// 'di yis thams cad 'grub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin rlabs te// snying gar nye bar bsam byas na// las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang// sil snyan brdung ba rnam byed dang// pi wang gling bu rdza rnga yi// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'gying zhing 'gying bas gar byas te// bcing ba chen pos bcings byas nas// sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis po dku nyid du// g.yon du 'gying bas brtan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byas te// 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par byed// 'gying ba tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// 'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha min rig ma yis// 'bum phrag brgya yis mchod par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur// klu mo lha dang lha min dang// de bzhin mi'am bdag por 'gyur// nam mkhar 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// thams cad las ni byed par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsang chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar spras pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o//// phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste// lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas// myur bar steng du dor ba yis// mgyogs su 'gro ba dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa// sbyor ba gar gyis mchod byas na// thams cad las byed dngos grub bo// gang dag dngos grub med pa dang// gang dag bde ba med pa rnams// de dag phyag rgya 'dis btab na// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis thams cad las rnams ni// rmad byung dam pa 'grub par

byed// btsun mo chen po de bzhin gshegs// 'di yis de ni 'grub par byed// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos gyi dbyings// btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//// de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor// steng du cung zad bsgyur bar bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa// 'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// bdud rnams shin tu ring par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis// skrag nas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i// 'di yis mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas// mchog gi thabs ni stobs par byed// phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yis thams cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa// dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed de// bde ba dam pa 'thob byed cing// tshe 'di dang ni pha rol tu// phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro'o// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// dri ma thams cad spong ba dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o//// thal mo de nyid sbom po bsgreng// lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// thog ma med nas dri mas bsgos kyang bskor ba yi/ 'di yis gti mug 'phrog byed de// mnyam par bzhag nas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang// pad+ma dra ba dga' ba che// sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po// bde byed chen po 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyis gar bya zhing// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor gzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad grub byed do// thams cad don rnams grub pa dge/ bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// mchod pa'i sprin nyid rgyas pa che// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang// sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub bo// phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te// skad cig gcig gis sbyar byas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog dang// 'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro// phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po

bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang/ pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'di glu blangs te dgyes par byed do/ sngags sor bzhag/ a ti nar ta hi sur/ a ma ha su hu bar ta a ni ma hA dzA lA i/ ku la ba pa tu dza lu b+hi a i/ a ka ma la pi pa si/ a id tsa ho// pha ri ud dzA na/ i dzi ti dzi i ni man Ta lud tha na i Na Ta hi Nad Ta hi/ Nad Ta nu pu ru g+ha na ad dza tha/ i b+ha ma a te na/ man da la pha ri e sa he/ pha ra ma a e hi na i sarba dz+dza i dzo i ni ma a 'un dza ba na si ba pa ma ni ma u d+he hi de/ de a dza ho man d+ha la dzo'i ni su rung a mu a ras/ a nu sog khu'i pa ru ra ma ra ma ra na a i ra a ra a pa rig kha hi ra mar ma mye sa tu sa tu/ rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis// skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa// shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir byung ste// rang bzhin dag pa'i gzungs ma'i dkyil nas bskyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid bde bas rol mdzad cing// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing// gsang ba'i thig le'i dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyu+u la dbang mdzad pas// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing// bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnam dag pa// nyon mong mi gos sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor

bzhin// e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos nyid med pas chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ra sA yan// ji ltar bde la brten cing kun tu gnang bar mdzad// kye ma bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod// byams pa'i spyan can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad nas// gti mug thibs po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston// de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po mchog tu dbang skur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// skad cig skad cig bskul byas na// rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis// mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje zla gsang thig le chen po la/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang/ mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing bskul ba bya ba dang/ gsang ba thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo//// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnams pa bzhi yis brgyan// dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang// nyi ma zla bas rnams par brgyan// rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras// do shal gdu bu rnams kyi brgyan// sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bras pa// sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas// dbus kyi dga' byed stan la ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan de dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes// stan de la ni gzhag par bya// tshad med pad+ma dmar 'dra ba'i// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/// yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug gis rnam par mdzes// tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yis// dbu la chun pos mdzes par bya// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag// sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam rgyas// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che// snying gar gsor la shin tu brtson// de la sogs pa'i yon tan lngan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob

ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung// mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan pa// tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhes su smra// des ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal byas te// mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya// mdun du lha mo smyo byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pas ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag/ g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing/ 'di ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs gzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos mdzad ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs// sna tshogs dar gyi na bza' gsol// grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams// bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa// sgo srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang// rdza rnga rnga chen mu ku dang// mu ra dza dang da rang pa// gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ma gzhag/ yi dgas rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs

byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis sdigs byed cing// sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang// rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang spro bar byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'jigs byed bong bu lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chags chen mo dang chags bral dang// 'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo// rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te// ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang bsrung ba dang// gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag/ shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong ste mig 'bru zhing// 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong// ji ltar rjes su mthun byas te// yi dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te// lag pa gri dang mkhar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o// nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa// bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong// gsus po che la lto 'phyangs ma// nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu// rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang// khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i gdong// rgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams// shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas bklubs// lto 'phyangs mo la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi// ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur bas gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sgo srung gi ni phyogs kun du// sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya ba// byang gi phyogs su 'bod sgrog ste// bum pa'i rna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o// lhor ni gshen rje'i rgyal po gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkha' 'gro bas kun tu bskor// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te// gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru sna lnga yis brgyan byas pa'i// bum pa bcu drug gzhag byas te// bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang// ji ltar rim bzhin gzhag byas te// dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung// lcags

sam sa las byas pa la// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang// btung ba snum por ldan pa yi// dbang po kun las byung ba rnams// sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pa// kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog/ tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te// btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yis// rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas// bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang// tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig skad cig mchod par bya// sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin// lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la// he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi gtor ma byin brlabs te// spyan drang gtsang sbra byas pa dbul// gzugs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la// mnyes par byas nas slar gshegs so// rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil 'khor du// slob ma'i mchog ni gzhug par bya// mtshungs par spyad pa rab mdzes ma// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// lag pa g.yon gyis gzung byas te// rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yi grwa nyid du// blo ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya// 'di las mi bya cung zad med// thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag tu dogs pa med byas te// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang// skye bo gang dag dam la gnod// brtul zhugs spyod pas de drangs te// khrag chen po ni btung bar bya// gang dag slob dpon smon byed dang// gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// blo ldan snying las btung bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang// slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro bo bsdus pa yis// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam chu blud byas te// rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog/ dung chen por ni gzhag par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blud do// kye ma dmyal ba yi ni chu 'di ste// khyod kyi snying la kun du gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung// o~M badzra u da ka hU~M Tha// dam tshig 'di ni brgyar bzlas pa'i// byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// bdag ni dam tshigs skal dga' zhes// slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug/ sgo grar gnas nas dri bya ba// kye khyod dga' ba ci la dad// 'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba// bdag ni skal ldan bde mchog la// rab dgyes 'phrul la bdag dga' ste// mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor me tog bor byas te// me tog gang la lhung

ba yi// lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo// dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis// de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya// bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang// mnyam par bzhag ste lnga po yis// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste// de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs par ni gzungs ma rnams// bdag nyid skal ldan zhes su smra// gang dag 'go bar gyur pa yi// lha de nyid ni bsten par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs ma 'di'i// khyod kyis rtag tu bsgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob dpon des// nang gi sbas pa sdus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+ma las drangs pa// sbom po dang ni dbang gis blang// rdo rje dkan du gzhag byas la// rtag pa dge ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing// kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba yi thabs mchog go/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid ches/ rang gi khar ni rdo rje gzhag/ sems dpa' chen po drangs byas na// sems kyis byang chub bde ba 'thob// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// dbang bskur ba yi bde ba'o// slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cad bsgrag mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// yang nas yang du brtag par bya// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzungs ma rnams kyis dga' ba'i bdag// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyor 'gyur te// ri rang dang yang dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang// slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya// gzungs ma de ni bdag nyid la// bla ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// dbang bskur shin tu spas pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo ldan the tshom med pa'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no// de tshun cad ni slob ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang chud zad// yi ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams// gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te// slob dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya// gzungs ma dag ni thams cad la// ci dga' bar ni yonayang dbul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung// dam tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa yis// de dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par dbul bya ste// seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyi ma// sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin// glang po

rin chen gser dag dang// sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// rin chen pad+ma'i chung ma dang// shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa// mu tig phreng bas shin tu mdzes// bu mo rin chen dra ba yis// brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang// chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi bzhon pa rnam sna tshogs// glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya// bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis// ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu// pad+ma'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang// rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gur// nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te// mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas btab dbul bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yis// myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis// rang rig khyad par shes byas te// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing// rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs// bde byed chen po'i dkyil mo brgya// rigs kyi khyad par kyis ni lnga// lha rnams kyang ni ro re yang// sems kyi khyed par mchog mtha' yas/ sngags sor bzhag/ de ba hi na hu ma ha su hu ad dzu dze la ba b+ha'i so ka khu ma hA su hu ka dzu sa sa ra yi ka ma lu ba ra na ma dzu bse hi gu li sa ba tu dzu dzes ni hi badz+dzu/ 'das pa'i dus ni ma byung ba// mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan// 'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yi// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' yas 'gro// 'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjes su zhugs

shing sprod// kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing// bde bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po// rab tu bzhad cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa/ kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// skyil mo krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo//// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te// bdag nyid brla ni mi snang bzhin// rtsa ba'i skyil mo bcing bar bya// sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni// gar gyis sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad// skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du 'thob// mi phyed pi ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas// byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad// pad+mo mi phyed 'dren pa dang// thig ler bcas pa'i sbyor ba bya// mi phyed o~M dang yang dag ldan// tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yis rtsen par byas pa na// nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong// rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de// gzungs kyi pad+mo las byung ba// bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro// de nas rab dga' bde thob pa// sems dpa' de ni dngos grub bo// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par// 'dod pa thams cad de longs spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan// gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad// mkha' 'gros nye bar gtses pa dang// sdig can 'khor ba las grol te// sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu// gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra// sna tshogs dra ba 'bar byed pas// sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing// de yis sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bstan par bya// rtsa ba'i skyil mo krung zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o//// bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu// de yis rkang pas bcings byas te// sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas// bsgoms sam yang na bskyong kyang rung// sngags

pa 'di yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi// zhag bdun bsgom pa bsgom byas pa// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// sbyor ba shin tu bsten byas na// gdon mi za bar rgyal po 'thob// yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung ngo// gzungs ma bzung ste bcing ba ni// rin po che ltar sbyar byas te// rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya// rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung// 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul zhing phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed// gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// khro bo thams cad 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs ma// mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yis rgyal po dngos grub po// yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// ci ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru// mchog tu rmad byung bsgrub 'dod na// rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rin po che yi skyil mo'o// de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa// pad+ma 'dra ba sbyar byas te// bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung// blo ldan pad+ma bde bsgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang// mdor na sangs rgyas rnam dag dang// rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang// dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bde ldan pho brang chen po yi// bde byed 'di yis thob par byed// sems can khams rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed// pad+ma'i skyil mo'o// de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te// sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya// sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yi// sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson// zlos pa byed cing rnams bsgoms na// dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur// mi g.yeng sngon gyi bdug pa yi// las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed// sna tshogs dkyil du gnas pa yis// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o// de nas mkha' 'gro'i skyil mo rgyas// thams cad khrag ni 'phrog byas te// gzungs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis// nyid kyis gnya' bar rkang pa bteg/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yi// bsnyen pas khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par bzhag nas gzungs ma yi// rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du// sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas na// zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de// btung ba bza' ba bca' ba dang// gos kyi rgyan gyis bklubs pa yis// de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang// thams cad las byed gdon mi za// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod

dbang po yi// dpal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed// lag pa bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni// khams gsum rim par rgal bar byed// mig ni btsums bar byed 'gyur ba// 'gro ba gsum po rnam par 'jig/ ru sbal bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste// mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na// gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang// dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod phrog/ sbal ba bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o// ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de// khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar byed// rtogs 'dod kyis ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya// gar dbang gis ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu yis ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed// skyil mo phyed ni mnyam gzhag nas// gnyis pa mnyas pa yang yis ni mnan byas na// khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing// 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo// dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas// skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma// khams gsum thams cad dngos grub bo// rig 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te// khams gsum skad cig gnan par bya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal pa yi// mdor bsdus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis//
