'jig rten gsum na rnam rgyal te// skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis// dpung pa gnyis ni bskum byas te// thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis// mche ba sbom po rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni// gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon pa'i brkyang bskum sbyar ba yis// myur du gnon pas bteg bya zhing// mthe'u chung bde ba'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo lce la reg byas te// sa bon tsheg drag hri ldan pa'i// thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi'am rig ma drang bar bya// lce yi thog mar spro byas te// 'dren pa'i tshul kyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam bzhag ste// kha yi phyogs su mche ba yi// sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te// khros pas mche ba'i sbyor ba yis// sor mo thod pa bzhin byas nas// khrag mang po ni btung bar bya// yi ge dang po o dang ldan// spyi bor thig le ldan byas te// 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags// u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya// 'di ni khro bo'i snying po ste// mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las

gzhan yang// tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas// rang gi lus ni bskum byas te// bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yis// dgra rnams thams cad gsad par bya// nga ro dang po yang dag ldan/ bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya// sangs rgyas chen po bsgom byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro// de yis lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// de yis sems can thams cad kyi// tsha ba gdon dang dug la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i gtse ba dang// 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// sdug bsngal dogs pa 'phrog par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams// snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus la zhe sar bcas pa yis// shin tu lhag par phyogs par bya// nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste// ci ste shes rab 'chal pas byed// myur du na rag ltung bar 'gyur// nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang// gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis// slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa// gti mug chen por de 'chi'o// bla ma las ni dngos grub thob// bla mas mtho ris bla mas bde// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje rnal 'byor pha dang/ rnal 'byor ma dang/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur te// kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che// gang bde phyir ni rig ma yi// pad+ma las ni gnas pa

mdzad// kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde// sems can kun la shes rab kyis// mun pa thibs po sel bar mdzad// kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing// snom par mdzad dang myang ba dang// mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa'i mchog/ e ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal la sprod pa dang// sna tshogs skal ba bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang// mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad do/ sngags sor bzhag/ phra ba tu ma hA su hu pra i ki a pu Na ba a lu ra tha ka ru ma an b+hig tha lu ra mu ka ti bi a ba pa nu ra ma nu dze ma ma nu phra sad ta na tu re e aM b+hA nu/ sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi// sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde ston te// rjes su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab cing// chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad// e ma'o 'di lta'i gzungs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma// byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug/ 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnam chos nyid rnam par dag/ dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod// da nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad+ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar mnyam par bzhugs te/ dbugs mi rngub dbugs mi 'byin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par mi mdzad/ gshegs par mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par yang mi mdzad bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na/ der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to// de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la yang thim par gyur pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang/ 'jug par byed pa dang/ bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la 'jug par byed pa yang med/ khros pa dang gtum po chen po dang/ rngam pa dang/ rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang/ gtum 'khrugs chen po dang/ gzhan gyi srog phrog pa dang/ gzhan gyi sems phrog pa dang/ bud med kyi 'chums pa dang/ rdzun dang phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang/ gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba dang/ thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu 'jug pa'i yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba la yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do/ sngags sor bzhag/ ho phra i pra bi a u hri bu ba na so ga khung/ a la la ho// ka ma la ka ru mun tsa hi badzra sa tu/ ma hA su hu dzi na sa ma ba tu a la la ho// phra mun tsa ta tha ga tu/ da ha de ha ba tu ba yi sad sa sa ba bu hi/ sa ra ka na d+ha b+ha ru/ a sa ma ga mu tri b+hu ba nu pa ru a la la ho// su ra a ti b+hu mun tsa sa mun tsa ma ho// tsa ya dzA na ri ba ho ho// ho rang bzhin dag pa dag pa pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba// thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de// bskal pa'i mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjid pa dang// byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus// a la la la ho// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bder gshegs kun gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngal nad kun sel ba'i thugs rje'i 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod// a la la ho// sngon gyi rgyal

ba rnams kyis ma bsgrags pa yi gsang ba yi// 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste// rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs nam mkha' la// dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'phags pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis// mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs rjes dgongs nas su// lha rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas na// pad+mo dra ba rdo rje dang// bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol// bde ba chen po bde gnas pa// gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams gsum 'di stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses/ gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dang/ nad dang/ 'tshe ba dang/ gdon chen po dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ mthong ba'i yang gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad+ma las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar byas te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo//// thog mar o~M ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste// 'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do// phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro bas snang bar byas te/ slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas so// yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas slar 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam 'gying bas 'dud pa/ g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum pa

dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa/ che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa// dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa// kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje sgyu mar rab tu gnas// mkhas pa gang gis snying ga nyid// mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na// rdo rje pad+ma bde chen yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le las/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo//// o yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas// mthar ni dral te tsheg drag bcas// 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dag/ 'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te// slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang// brda yi tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i spyan// chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying gar rin chen 'dzin// brgyad gnyis phyag gi ngo bo yis// dri ma gsum spang brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rigs pa'i// nad kyis grongs pa 'jig par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gdon chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang// nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du// nyid kyi snying gar 'di byas te// nor bu rin chen bsgom byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang// dngos grub nor mang sbyin mdzad de// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dngathugs kyi ye shes mchog tu

gsang ba zla gsang thig le las 'di phyung ngo//// dang por oM dang ldan byas te// mi phyed ra btags 'dren par bcas// tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor// sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam bzhag ste// snying gar 'di ni sbyar byas nas// bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing// pad+ma sbyar bas bsgom par bya// mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob// pad+ma che las byung nas kyang// thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+ma'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur// kun tu snang bas khyab byas na// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// de nas 'dod chags phabs nas kyang// pad+ma'i dbus su bzhugs par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing// 'dzum bcas pad+ma phye ba yis// thugs kyi dbus su yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma gtams// mtshon cha rnams pa sna tshogs 'dzin/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis bklubs pa yis// zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba// brjid pa'i gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs// 'di yis pad+ma'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gar dbang 'thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis// gang du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po las 'di phyung ngo//// sna tshogs chen po o chen po// steng du thig ler yang dag ldan// 'di ni dbus te lta 'og khro// sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun gnang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas// de nyid slar 'khor rab zhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas// skad cig sems dpa' sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong// phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs// kha 'byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong// zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas byang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang

dag gnas// sngags mkhan zhag bdun du ni bsgom byas na// sna tshogs 'gyur te sna tshogs de la bab// sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs chen po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes par mdzad do// gtso bos byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo dag/ rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags rig phyag rgya yan lag bcas// lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin// bdag gi de nyid sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+ma yang dag ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs ba'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me long ye shes yang dag 'byung// bya ba nan tan sems can don// rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod// de nyid rim pas kyang rig pa'i sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i yig 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M b+h+ru~M/ stong pa chen po'i snying po'o// o~M badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ o~M badzra kA ya oM// o~M badzra bAka AH/ o~M badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa trA~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya hoH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro b.ramadzad do// dge'o dge'o rgyal ba kun// dge'o dge'o rgyal ba mchog/ dge'o dge'o legs pa'i las// dge'o dge'o sngon 'gro ba// dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che// nyid kyi snying gar drangs byas te// rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod// gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje chen po// de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa Ad+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa so sor kun tu gzigs pas ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kr-i t+ya a nuSh+tA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de// o~M dge'o dge'o stong pa che// o~M dge'o dge'o thugs chen po// o~M dge'o dge'o sku chen po// o~M dge'o dge'o gsung chen po// o~M dge'o dge'o rin po che'o// o~M dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du bar mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bgyi ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par// gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa'i// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa yi// bu mo mig yangs gzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin rlabs

'brus// mnyam par bzhag ste byin brlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo gzhag/ gnyis pa mdun du gzhag byas pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag gnas// rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no// bzod pa chen mo byang du ste// gsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za// dam tshigs gnas ni skyong byed ma'i// gru bzhi dag ni thams cad du// snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sgo srung rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod byas te// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par bklubs// spro ba che bas gar bya zhing// lha mo 'gying ba'i 'dud pa yis// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te lag pas bzung nas kyang// sgo yi grwar yang gzhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni smra ru gzhug/ rdo rje chen mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rab dgyes gnas las byung ba yi// bde byed chen mos mnyes par bgyi// ji lta bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob// me tog phreng ba dor byas te// lha mo chen mo bzhengs su gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo// lha mo gang la ltung ba yi// de yi lag nas bskor ba bya// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag gi rab dgyes smra bya zhing// de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaT// mtha' ni hoHzhes sbyar bar bya// 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje phyung ba yi// mkhas pas de ni blang byas te// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang por dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang// ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya// spyi bos zhabs la gtugs byas te// bla ma la ni dbang blang bya// shin tu sbas pa 'phags pa'i dbang// bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor ba chen po yi// snyoms par zhugs te de'i bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te// spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya// lag pa yis ni ma reg par// kha la rab tu sbyin par bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci bde bar ni btung bar bya// gzungs ma de dag thams cad

la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya// de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyis// bla ma la ni yon dbul bya// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang// de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang// rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang// glang po rta dang shing rta dag/ bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang ba dang// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya// snying po yang dag shes gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di// ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na// slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du zla phyed tshun chad du// bstan pasarnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te// phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams// dmyal bar bskal par grangs med smin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrag mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// dam tshig bsrung la brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub// lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste// 'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo// slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob gyur te// des ni sngags kyi don mi smin// lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde// dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang// de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams// dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang// sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song zlog pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyin par bya// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs pa med pa 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dal// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon// dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang// rdo rje las byung chub sgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/ dam tshig yi ge gzhag pa yis// myur du dam tshig bsgrub byas na/ dga' byed dam tshig dngos bgrub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni

mthu ru 'gyur// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te// dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di// rdo rje khro bo chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo dam tshig ded dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo// oM badzra ma hA tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+tAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ lha dang/ klu dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad 'khrug pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du lhags nas brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/ tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro bo

chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo// o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ gr-i h+na gr-i h+na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M/ b+h+r-i b+h+r-i/ b+h+ra h+mA b+h+ra h+mA ya/ b+h+r-i kuT+Ta sar+b+ba mA rA na sar+b+ba duSh+tA~M ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta mo Ta/ hU~M b+h+ra~M/ hU~M tra~M/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+h+r-i hU~M hra~M hU~M tra~M tra Ta/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyed kyang mthu chen po'i lha chen po ste gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgad pa'i gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+ma'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar ldog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo// o~M pad+ma ma hA dz+wA la ma hA kro d+ha ba da ba mu kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba duSh+tAM/ khA hi khA hI/ sar+b+ba duSh+tAM/ pra duSh+tA nAM/ da ma da ma/ badzra daM Sh+t+rok+ka Ta ma tA ma Ta ma Ta/ k+Sho Ta k+Sho Ta/ badzra kha ra/ tsa pa la dur ga beg/ tra sa tra sa/ ma hA badzra ba Da ba mu kha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha hU~M phaT/ hrI ha ha hi hi/ tsa tu rmu kha/ be sha brA Na sha na/ hU~M hrIM hU~M hU~M d+hAMHha/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar yed yed zhing khas bub tu 'gyel te/ brdab 'chos so// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo// de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang/ gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang/ tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jigs byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ me lce stong gi gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams

cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po'i 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo/ o~M badzra b+hai ra ba/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba duSh+tA~M/ sa~M b+ha k+Sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang ches 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par 'gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa yang khas bub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang/ dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/ mthu che ba yin la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang/ srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te mche ba chen po 'byin pa/ zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i me rlung gis bdas pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang/ khrag dang/ sha dang/ klad pa dang/ rkang dang/ tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pas snam logs rgyab la g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang/ glang po che dang/ bong bu dang/ rnga mo dang/ ma he dang/ phag dang/ ce spyang dang/ ra dang/ khyi dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rog dang/ bzhad dang/ byi la dang/ gzig dang/ stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par

gnyer ba'i 'jig pa lta bu'i spyan dang/ zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsugs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang bcas te/ shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho'i dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang bcas pas 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad+ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil par gyur te gnas so// byang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang 'khyil par gyur te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po yang khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing khro bo chen po'i rnam par brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs dngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste/ rje gcig rje gcig nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bod+ha bod+ha/ ma hA b+hai ra pa da ra pa pa hA ri ha ra ha ra/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ shI g+h+ra~M ma hA badzra/ tsaN+Da sarba du Sh+tAM/ ta ka ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba/ phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so// oM ma hA badzra he ru ka badzra aT+TAT+Ta hA sa hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hU~M ha i ti/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par khas bub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas slar yang

bslang ste 'jig rten gsum po yongs su bskor du bcug nas 'jigs byed gdug pa nga la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba mi len cing// slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab tsam gyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing/ bgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to// o~M ma hA' b+he ra ba be Sh+tiM Sh+tiM/ T+ra T+ra T+ra ta T+ra ta/ ha ha i ti/ 'on kyang ba spu'i rtse mo cung zad tsam yang ma 'gul to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chems chems mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam par bcom mo// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te dma' phab nas/ khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs len du yang bcug/ dam tshig la yang gnas par byas de yang dag par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po'i bzhad pa bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen pos mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad do// oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ha na ha na/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M/ ma ta ma ta kiny+tsi rA ya si sUr+ya sa ha sra ha sti/ re ke ba su rA dza la la rtsi pra dz+wA li ta/ ma hA mUrti A h+ya A h+ya a bya wa ma bya wa ma/ kri Na pa tsakra b+hai ra ba hr-i+-i da ya~M hU~M b+h+r-i/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhad pas bzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun duston to// de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyan te/ khas bub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje gcig bdag cag la skyob shig ces smra zhing/ skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo/ de nas biSh+Nus kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugs so// kwa ye kwa ye gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song shig/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po de rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do// o~M badzra ba sUr+ya b+h+raM ku Ti kro d+ha ma hA gra ha ha ra pa ta ra pa/ s+ya su d+he/ ra mAM sa me da na// oM b+h+ra b+h+ra b+h+r-i?? b+h+ru~M b+h+ra/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab

tu brlag par gyur te gnas so// de'i chung ma rug mi ni dang/ ma hA shrI dang/ lak+Sh+mI yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po khro bo chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do// o~M badzra ba Da ba mu kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tsa turmu khA pi ba pi ba/ a s+ya ru d+hi ra ma/ A h+ya A h+ya/ hri da ya~M trA na/ da ma he/ badzra ba Da ba mu kha/ hi hi Sha ma hA shwa shwe shwe ra hI hI/ de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas rgyu bar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor khas bub tu 'gyel nas/ rje gcig skyobs shig/ rjes gcig skyobs shig ces smras so// de nas tshangs pa de tshangs pa'i srin po'i bdag nyid kyi nam mkha' bkang nas rgyal bar byed de/ kwa ye kwa ye gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song/ khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma btul re zhes smras so// de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang/ klad pa dang/ tshil bu dang/ rus pa rnams myangs nas phyogs bcur gtor to// de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang/ swa ra swa sti dang/ shan+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i blta bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do// o~M gu lu gu lu badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ A kar+Sha ya/ A kar+Sha ya sha kra hr-i da ya~M/ ma hA badzra da~M Sh+t+rA ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur to/ de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen pos 'gyings te/ mi bzad par khros pas gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran yin zhes de la smras so// de nas rdo rje gnod spyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung snying yang dral te/ de'i sha dang/ khrag dang/ klad pa dang tshil bu dang/ rus pa dang/ bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugs so// de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing dngangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ skyabs su nye bar gyur to// de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor

chen po na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du bar mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do// o~M ma hA su ra ta badzra ma hA kro d+ha saM ha ro pa saM ha ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha/ ut+ti ma kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da le/ s+thA pa ya s+thA pa ya/ sarba kro d+ha ma duSh+ta pra duSh+ta bi ba ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya sha kra prah+ma biSh+Nu ra ma he shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga wAn/ su ra Ta/ sau khya kro d+ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta sat+t+ya na sa ma yany+tsa he/ su ra ta sa ma ya i hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen pos khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH hU~M Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH/ hU~M Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH/ A kar+Sha ya/ A kar+Sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ ba sha~M ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha/ sa ma ya~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH/ hU~M Tak+ki hU~M/ de nas khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil par gyur te/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo// o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bo'i phyag bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo// o~M badzra a mr-i ta/ ma hA kro d+he shwa ri/ u ta shrI dzaH/ u ta shrI dzaH/ badzra a mr-i ti hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo de dag kun tu khros te smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu/ zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rig pa 'di phyung ngo// o~M a mr-i ta sany+dzi pa ni ma hA mr-i ta mu She/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarbA na badzra pad+ma sang+Yo ge// ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta pi Tha bi Tha/ mUrte A/ de nas dbang phyug chen mo la sogs pa gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su dong nas/

phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te// gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams// 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste// rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel// khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong// che ba che khyod skye bo skyong// thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs// nga ro'i steng ni cha yang med// gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi yi// rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yi// 'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis gtong bar mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing// bla na med pa byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing// 'khor ba rba klong grol mdzad de// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyis mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam pas zhir gyur pa// rdul dang bral bas mdzums pa spangs// nam mkha' bsgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te// sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa// gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la// byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar// bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi// ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang// dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du// ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang// dri med skal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas yang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor

ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khro mo dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra kro d+hI shwa ri sarba duSh+tA ni mu drA Ni ma hA pra la yA na yash+ma sha na b+hI Sha Ne/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha daMSh+t+rA ka rA lo gra ta ba ta ne/ sarba sha trU~M/ pra sha ma ni/ hU~M hU~M ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba/ 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang/ thod pa'i 'khar ba dang/ thod pa dang/ mdung dang/ s+t+wa re dang/ zhags pa dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/ be con dang/ mu su ra dang/ 'khor lo dang/ ka na ya dang/ to ma ya dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ shag ti dang/ gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o// o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma ha kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA sh+ma shA na b+hI Sha ni nI la dz+wA la sa ha sra pra dz+wa li ta mUrti d+ha re ka pA la mA lA b+hU Shi ta ma gu te/ na ra rU ti ra ra tra/ pa ri pu ri ta ka pA la/ a ste kha T+wA~M ga/ badzra tri shU la g+han+d+ha ma hA kro d+he na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he run+ta mun+ta pri ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M hU~M trA~M ma hA sUr+ya badzra kro d+hi shwa ri bi da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ grA sa grA sa/ sarba duSh+tA~M/ pra duSh+tA~M/ hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M tra~M tra~M/ tra tra tra/ khro mo chen mo 'dis lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste// gzi brjid chen por rab gtong zhing// shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste// dpung rgyan thod pas brtseg par bya// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing// yi dwags chen po'i stan la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M hrIHbadzra pad+ma ma hA ban+d+ta mu khe/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho// d+ha ra bi ko pe hU~M he hU~M hU~M ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hrIH/ hi sha hi sha

ma hA badzra ba da ba mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/ hU~M hU~M/ hi hi hU~M hrIHhU~M/ dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong// mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing// g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes kyi khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA bi shwe shwa ri hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha~M ha~M ha~M/ ma hA kro d+he gra mu khe/ ma hA bi shwe ba da ri Ni/ sarba duSh+ta/ pra sha ma ni hU~M hU~M phaT// 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag byas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong// rab tu drag la ro myong zhing// gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa// za byed mi bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yongs su bskor// gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung// de ni de lta'i stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par gar byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang// phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang sbas pa dang/ de kho na nyid dang// gsang ba rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M sarba

badzra d+ha ra sa twa a nu rA gi Ni ma hA kro d+he hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra A kar+Sha Ni ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M hU~M/ dzA dzA hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA gi Ni ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M he he hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ro gra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M swa swa hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA te dza a b+hi She ke hU~M ta~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku te ka ro ke tra ta Ta ta hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu kro d+hI shwa ri/ ma hA bi dza yo t+ta ye hU~M hU~M tra~M tra~M phaT phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha AT+Ta A si hU~M hU~M triM triM tro Ta ya tro Ta ya hr-i da ya hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha b+ha k+Shi Ni hU~M hU~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hU~M hrIH/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA tIk+Sh+Na kro d+hI shwa ri ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hU~M hU~M badzra tIk+Sh+Na ha ste ts+tshe da ya hUM hUM ma Ta ma Ta/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra tsakra d+ha ri Ni mA ho gra du bi ni hUM hUM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ ma hA badzra tsakre Na/ tsUr+Naya tsUr+Na ya hUM hUM phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA shwa ga pra b+ha ni hUM hUM ma ta ma ta phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA bishwa mu khi hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M phaT phaT// oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra yak+Shi Ni hU~M hU~M kha kha khA hi khA hi A bi b+ha A bi b+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra b+hA ni d+ha ni ma hA ke d+he/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mahA badzra pA sh+ya pra be sha ni hU~M hU~M/ bi ta ya bi ta ya hU~M phaT/ sarba badzra d+ha ra ha la da ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mA li ni hU~M hU~M g+hU~M g+hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he gan+d+ha pa hi hU~M ga gri// o~M sarba badzra d+ha rI ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA lo ka d+hA ri Ni/ dI pa ya~M dI pa ya~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri mA hA lA s+ya hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he mA le d+hA ri Ni hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA gI ti ni hU~M he he/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha nI rta ke hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha A kar+Sha ya dz+dza dz+dza hU~M hU~M dzaH/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M ba~M/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he ma hA badzra ba shi ni hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he sh+ya sh+ye hU~M hoH/ o~M hU~M trA~M hrIHAH/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu rangs dga' bar gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so// bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dang ldan// mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas// gzungs la rol ba'i bde ba bzhes su gsol// ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing// snying po byang chub 'grod pa rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten par// bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod// ra mu ma hA su hU dzo hi ni dz+wA la su hU~M pU mU/ ma hA su hU dzo i ni/ dz+wa la su hU ba b+h+rU~M dzU ma hA su hU/ i ni dz+wa la su hU u dzi/ u ma hA su hU dzo/ dza i ni dz+wa su hU a la la la ho/ ma hA su hU ra ma ra ma ma hA su hU/

a la la la ho/ ma hA su tre Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra d+ha ra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha gi ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA he ma pa ti hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA' ki nI ku mA ra pri ye hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI dr-i sh+ye mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra muSh+tI ta na/ b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra kro d+ha ya d+ha ra la li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA kro d+ha tsakre ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i tod pa ta ki hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA sau mA kro d+he hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA' ki nI ma hA badzra tan+ti hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA' ki nI ma hA ma ra Ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i te ka pA la hA se hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA sau mya kro d+ha shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i te pu da na d+ha ri hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI badzra ping+ga li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI pi ba pi ka ru d+hi raM/ ma hA badzra ba li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra sha ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra pA she hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA a nA ya a nA ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra be b+hi ni gu gu ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra dz+wa la ya b+hasmiM ku ru hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra pi ga ta hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra da~M Sh+te hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA puSh+ti mAM sA sha ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra badzra d+hA ra ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI Ar+Sha Ni ma hA piM ga rA li mu ku hU~M dz+dza \u0f7fdz+dza \u0f7fhU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA ki nI A be sha ne hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra DA' ki nI ma hA ban+d+ha hU~M hU~M ba~M ba~M hU~M/ o~M badzra DA ki nI ma hA to Sha Ni sa ma ye hU~M hU~M A A/ o~M badzra ma hA rak+Sha sa mA~M sa ru d+hi ra me da pri ya/ ma hA kum+b+ha kar+Na hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M k+ShaH/ o~M badzra ma hA rAk+Sha sa A kaD+Dah+ya be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badzra kA la shi ni ban+b+he hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ o~M badzra rAk+Sha sa ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ bi Sha ya bi bi Sha na/ sarbA na hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ma hA rAk+Sha sa/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ sarbA na ma hA bi kr-i tA na na/ ha ya grI ba hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas// yid dga' bar gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur to// kye ma ho rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu ba dang

dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M DA ki nI A kar+Sha ya gra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya to Sha ya A sarbA na badzra DA ki nI hr-i da ya~M hU~M dz+dzaH/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ Tak+ki hU~M dz+dzaH/ o~M he ru ka ma hA badzra/ kaD+Dah+ya/ A kaD+Dah+ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra pad+ma ma hA pa Da ba mu kha/ A kaD+h+ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya to Sha to Sha ya/ ha ha hi/ khro bo'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang/ mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las byas te/ gtor mas mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang/ Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang/ rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las thams cad la sbyor ro// rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing/ zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu bsgreng/ lhag ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer ltar gtang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no// phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin// bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang// thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed// gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma// srin mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa yis// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub mi 'gyur te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob/ rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su byas te/ rgyab gnyis rgyab sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste/ phan tshun bsnol khros pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste snying gar bstan nas/ brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis thams cad las kyi rnams// ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te// dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen no// ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phur bar byed// rig 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang// cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong// thal mo mnyam par sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus sbyar/ lhag ma 'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no// sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rta gdong gi'o// gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba// 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro// sa 'og dngos

grub 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge// nga ni bstan te rgyal ba rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang// phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar// de nas nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo de dag sogs 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis// bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing// dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du// mgu ba chen pos brtags par byed// phyag na thod pa gri dag dang// rdo rje kha T+wA~M rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// dbus smug rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyar ba yis// bde ba dam pa longs spyod myong// rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing// rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs/ sngags sor gzhag/ ra ma ra ma ho na ta na ba ra a ma hA su hu badzro i ni// ka ma la su hu a la la ho/ su ra o ta mu hU~M a hu sid dza'u wa ra dzo i ni dza la ma ho a yi ha ar ho/ a ru he byi su b+ha d+ha a na ha a su+u ru a su hu+u de ni ba ra Ta i ni dza la su hu sis/ sa sa nad ra pa nad tA nu nad tad/ e ma re hi ma hA su hu mad dzu mug khu/ sa lag khang hU~M kud du sa dun i su hu tsad dzi'u/ mug khu su hu/ na be dug khel ba b+ha'i mug khu su hu sa sa ri hU~M/ sang ka'u mad dzu ra nu/ ne ba ra a pa rad ha'u ru dz+dzu tA nu mun dza ma hA su hu a li pa ra pa a'u ma hu ba ra ba asmi a'u mo pa ri/ zla ba dri med stong rab rdzogs pa'i spyan// thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi// byang chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod// a la la la ho// mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing// byang chub mchog lam snying po nyid 'di ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil gnon te// rmongs shing bying ba'i rnams la thugs rjes sgrol// a la la la ho// che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gis gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bstan pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang// rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i dngos ma mthong// kye ma'o ma skyes chos te snying po las byung ba// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs// sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing// dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// 'dul ba'i dbang gi grub pa'i cha lugs mi zad ma// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gros gzi brjid 'bar ba 'dis// sdug bsngal gsum pos

'thoms shing rmongs pa la// bde ba'i spyod pas gnas nas spyod mdzad de// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod// a la la la ho// ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med bzhin// sdug pa'i bcings pas ma zin rnam grol te// rol pas chub pa'i sa la gnas shing rnam mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing snang ba'i rnams// mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol// 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnam khro yang// byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzod// e ma'o bde bas bde sbyin phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol pa mdzod// thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs// rgyu dang rkyen la ma brten rang bzhin grub// ma chags dri med yongs gsal zla ba bzhin// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas rtsen// 'di yis gtso la bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo// yid gdung mnyen pa'i nga ro yis// dpyid kyi rgyal po glu blangs te// mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis ni// bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas gzung byas te// gsang skyes pad+ma phye ba las// rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis// bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te// mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub 'thob// o~M dang o~M dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che// rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod// rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la// 'di yis rtsen pa rnam byas na// bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yi// rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i che ba'i che ba rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so//// mgo la thal mo byed sbyin te// chu skyes la ni yongs su

rdzogs// rdo rje bcing ba yang dag ldan// pad+ma'i skyil mo bcing bar bya// 'di yis rtsen par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen pos gar byed cing// rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang// kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang// sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos 'grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing byas te// sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya// gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing// mkhur tshos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du gzung// 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye// g.ya' 'byed pad+ma rnam bzhi bya// pad+ma phyi phyir rab mnye zhing// ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar// sen mos mchan khung sum mdo dang// rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs// dal bus rdo rje gzhug bya zhing// khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyod par bya// g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya// kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod de// bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul// yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na// blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba'i ye shes so// de dag thams cad mgu nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs// nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang// de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams// bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po// sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol// bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// gdon mi za dka' rtag bgyid pas// gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang// gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o// nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag bsgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// bus pa'i sha las rab bsgrub pa'i// 'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang// mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda rnams dran gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das

shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang// mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te// gti mug ldongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis// rang gi nu ma rab bsdams nas// mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa dkur brten na// de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa mgo ru gzhag pa yi// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag len no// g.yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis// g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan bya// g.yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na// 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro mo bsgreng ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na// lus che de ni khros gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya// g.yon du 'gying ba bsgyings pa yi// lag pa snying gar brkyang bya ste/ dbong mo gyen du rnam bstan na// de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/ chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na/ de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang// rdo rje pad+ma rtsen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te// gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bsten na// de tshe nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung// de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bsten na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// 'dren pa med pa'i yi ge kun// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag/ rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba// 'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma yi'o// o~M ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda// sbyor ba sngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sbyor pa'i dkyil du brtag par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor pas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste// sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya// khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste// lhag ma 'od bzhin gtang bar bya// snying gar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas// thams cad las ni rab sbyar te// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed// thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te// mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de// snying gar de bzhin sbom po sbyar// 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing// sems can thams cad phan mdzad ma// de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid las ni rdo rje dang// mchog nyid bsgreng ba'i tshul byas te// rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis// drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na// mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo// gnod byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyur na// lha dang mi yi bu mo dag/ lha min la sogs smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te// lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin// des ni myos byed thob pa yin// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang// bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na// yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos// ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis// de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te// yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub// sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med// snying gar 'di nyid kyis byas te// mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos// rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur// mchog gi bcing ba 'di kun dang// 'di yis las rnams thams cad dang// yid la bsam pa byed pa 'thob// phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing// mgu bas dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar// lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtang// dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub 'thob// rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub/ de ni de ma thag tu yang// lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir// gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis// spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang// de nas de ni nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas// phan tshun du

ni dbang bskur bas// khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yeng 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te// snying gar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas// 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bsgrub// de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te// rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni mnyam gzhag pas// 'jig rten du ni rgyal par 'gyur// de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyar// mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag ste// rtse mo kha phyed rnam bsgyur bas// sbom po ze bar rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste// bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyar// mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis// 'di yis zla ba gcig byas na// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer// dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying gar bskor bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro// spom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas// de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang// dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying gar rab tu gzhug/ yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis// khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thob par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi ma mchu dpus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'thob tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis// 'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste// sha zas bza' ba las kun byed// thal mo nyid ni bcings byas nas// rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor sbyor// sbom po'i zur ni sbrel nas kyang// chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang// thams cad las ni sbyar byas te// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug/ khro mo gnyis kyang

bskum par bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad cig tu ni gnon byed de// de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po'i bdag po dang// thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyis las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing// hi hi zhes pas glu ru len// ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he he zhes pas 'bod par byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas gad par byed// hA hA zhes par skyod par byed// phaT phaT zhes pas gsod par byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas phur bus 'debs// dzA dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa sa zhes pas dam par byed// dge ba dbang phyug nga ro mchog/ hUM b+h+ruM zhes pas gsod par byed// hU~M b+hUM hU~M b+h+rU~M/ hU~M hU~M zhes pas 'bar bar byed// truM truM zhes pas gzi brjid byed// triM triM zhes pas 'dren par byed// hra~M hra~M zhes pas mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin// tra~M tra~M zhes pas rmongs par byed// d+h+riM d+h+riM zhes pas 'dzums par byed// hriM hriM zhes pas 'dren par byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas 'phyan par byed// hro~M hro~M zhes pas rmongs par byed// hra hra zhes pas gnon par byed// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// ha~M ha~M zhes pas srung bar byed// hU~M hU~M zhes pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// tra~M tra~M zhes pas bdug par byed// g+hu~M g+hu~M zhes pas phreng bar byed// ga~M ga~M zhes pas dri ru byed// ra~M ra~M zhes pas brgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams ngo mtshar cher gyur/ rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba 'debs so// gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che// sgeg mo rol pa bde ba mchog/ sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs// brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor ba// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis// sngags rgyal

khyod kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che// thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung// sna tshogs chen po rnam mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che// bla med chos kun dbang po ste// rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog/ blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te// rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba po// gtor dang byed pa khyab pa che// bskyod pa sdig pa 'phrog par byed// sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed// dus ngan 'don byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed// sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la sbyin// tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod par byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad do// skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste// bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan// 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyis ni rgyal po 'du// 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba can// rang las myu gur 'dra ba yis// 'og gi phyogs su gzhag pa ni// hra~M byas myur du dang bar bya// dang po drang ba gnyis drangs pas// tsheg drag des ni lcags kyu byas// lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag/ khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed// 'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yis// phan tshun du ni bsgrubs byas nas// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed// bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya// sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du// de steng sa bon gzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo/ de nyid sngags dang snying po dang// phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang// 'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur// de nyid nang du sbyar byas na// snying po snying gar sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar// 'di yis myur du dngos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen por// 'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur ba nye// rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po// dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di bsgrags so// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba// de nyid don du bsgrub pa

ste// snying po phyag rgya dam tshig ni// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de// bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs// dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang// gsang ba sbas pa de nyid de// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim// dpa' bo chen pos rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje pad+ma rnam mdzad pas// rig ma dang ni lhan cig rtsen// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang// dam la zhe sdang bza'
