ba dang// slob dpon smod la bsgral pa dang// gzungs ma'i bdag por bsgrub pa dang// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed bya dang// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang// sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang// bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang// bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang// rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang// pad+ma'i gnas ni dgang bya dang// bsgrub dang nye bar bsgrub pa dang// shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba// sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// bsgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba// sbyor dang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor// de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' che// phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris pa/ rang gi thugs la bzhag ste/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyed// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de// kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung// snying po ye shes zhes pa ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che// dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis bsgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs// bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid// de dag de nyid ci bzhin par// nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags// dam tshig ma yin mi shes la// sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya// phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni// gsang ba gsang ba rab tu bsgrub// rdo rje pad+ma rnam mdzad pas// rol pa phyin pa sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig rtsen bya ba// sprod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang// de bzhin mchu ni so yis gzung// rdo rje brtan pa gzhug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste// nu+u ma mchan khung mkhur tshos gnyis// 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab// rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis// mnye ba'i

sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang// dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang// zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang// bla ma smod rnams bsgral bar bya// sha dang khrag dang klad pa rnams// drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya// 'di ni gsad pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang// bla ma smod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang khros chen dang// 'jigs byed nye bar 'tshe ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing// 'o dod 'bod par sbrul gyi bdag/ bstir med chen po brlag par 'gro// lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa// rig ma kun la bskyod byas te// byang chub chen po bde ba yis// tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te// dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas nas gnas pa yis// de nyid las ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste// de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya// rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya// bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni// lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang// de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// bsgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i don// sgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rgya// mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/ nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas// shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa// so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste// ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya// sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i// rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa// lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// bdag ni sems dpa'o zhes bsams na// 'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba// rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis gsungs// bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste// rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba

yis// 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis// drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang// rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te// shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa bskyed// mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de bzhin zag par bya// 'di ni yang dag sbyor ba sbas// sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo// 'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang// byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob// gsang ba chen po rmad 'byung ba// de dag de nyid sbas pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang// bdag po chen po mchod byed na// de yis ston pa kun mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur// srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de la lha kun mchod byed cing// skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed// ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa// sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas// rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur// rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ldan pas// dngos grub chen po des 'thob po// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan btab la// cung zad mi 'grub yong med de// phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che// bdag nyid so sor rjes su 'grub// rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo// ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba// sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzir ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad// ram ram sa ma ho ma hA sa twa// rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// zla gsang thig ler yang dag ldan// bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal ldan dri med rab dgyes kyi// rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du// sbyor chen nyid kyis rol pa mdzod// theg pa chen po bde che yi// pad+mo rdo rje rin chen gyis// rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes longs spyod nyid bsten mdzod// bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te// gnod med de ni gser dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po// rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod// sprod pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang// gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i mchog/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis// ded dpon rab tu brtag pa mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i chos thams

cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu 'khyud pa dang/ sprod pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ rab tu bskul ba dang/ mnye ba dang/ thigs pa dang/ tshor bar bya ba dang/ bskyod pa dang kun tu bskyod pa dang/ bcing ba'i rdo rje dang/ pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/ bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ gzungs ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang/ rab tu dgyes pa dang/ rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'-i mnyam pa nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas te gnas so// de nas rnal 'byor ma chen mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mgu ba che// bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// mgu ba chen po'i bde dang ldan// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// 'jigs shing skrag pas sdug par byed// khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma// rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis// bde byed che la mchod par byed// skal ba chen po srin mo dang// bde byed bde bas rab rmongs pa// mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i// rgya chen mchog gis mchod par byed// drag mo chen mo ma lta bu// rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba// 'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis// gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed// lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang// klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang// 'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis// yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed// de nas dbang po lha chen po// bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha// kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che// mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis// lha yi lha ni sngon du 'gro// dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rang gi bde bas mngon mchod cing// 'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed// tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che// glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang// bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang// sil snyan phreng ba ro chen dang// gling bu rgyud mangs rdza rnga dang// pi wang pal ki ga ha la le// stag dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang// zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs byed dang// bag kyang bdag dang khros dang spyan rgyas pas// skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing// byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang// 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang// sid ces pa dang hU~M hU~M dang// ha ha zhes pas

mnyes byed cing// rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi// rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos// rnam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang rgyal dang nyan thos dang/ rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang/ shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa dang/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes du skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang/ lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ sems can dang rigs thams cad dang/ gnas thams cad dang/ spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'byung ba las gyur pa dang/ sa'i 'og dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ shes bya dang/ bdag dang/ bdag gi ba dang/ sna tshogs dang/ sna tshogs ma yin pa dang/ bus pa dang/ rgan po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ skyes pa ma yin pa dang/ srog dang/ rab tu zad pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ shes pa dang/ mi shes pa dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ khyab pa dang/ khyab byed dang/ zla ba dang/ dbang chen dang/ nyi ma dang/ me dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu bdag dang/ lus srul po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gtogs 'dod dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha mo dang/ skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ skal ba dang mi lngan pa dang/ dngos po dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ mtshan dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ rin po che dang/ ral gri dang/ tho ba dang/ dbyig pa dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ sbyor ba dang/ rab tu sbyor ba dang/ stong pa dang/ stong pa chen po dang/ mchog tu stong pa dang/ shin tu stong pa dang/ stong pa rab tu stong pa dang/ byang chub dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang/ yi ge dang/ yi ge med pa dang/ dra ba dang/ lcug ma dang/ cha dang/ cha med pa dang/ thig le dang/ ro dang/ ro chen po dang/ yid la byed pa med pa dang/ rtag pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ mi zad pa dang/ thar pa dang/ thar byed dang/ grol ba dang/ rigs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ nam mkha' dang/

skabs dang/ skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu sdug por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang/ rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ su ra ta s+t+waM ma si ho// gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che// gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sngang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dod chags pad+mar 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag/ gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za// byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'grur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bsnyen pa yis ni myur du 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor bas// rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab ru zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang// khrag dang snang mdzad chen po yis// dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sdang byas pas// de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste// rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing/ pad+ma'i pad+mas pad+ma phye ba'i phyir tshul du rab rtogs phyir// de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sbyin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed// nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin// ro la sogs pas mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za// sna tshogs pad+ma rab 'jug phyir// de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che// 'dod chags bral ba dga' med

phyir// bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che// 'dod pa ma gtogs bde byed med// bde che 'dod pa nga yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med// byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te// sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad 'byung 'gyur// byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir med do// thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo// bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad// d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog/ tsi zhes pa ni zag par bshad// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa med pas bde byed med// bde ba med pas mgu ba med// mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub na bde byed rtag pa yi// phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// bde ba kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma ste// hrIHzhes pa ni pad+ma 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yin// yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de// de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo// rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad// de dang mnyam du spyod pa yis// mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur na'o// dam tshig sbas pa tshogs kyi rnams// dri chu byang chub dmar po mchog/ sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis// lus la kun tu khyab gnas te// de yi phyir ni dam tshig che// dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste// dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis// sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na// zos pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin ma kun// pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi// 'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar mdzad cing// rtag pa la ni yang gsol pa// rigs de rnams pa du ru bstan// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi// sna tshogs chen po de dag kun// bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na

nyid rab tu phyung ngo// nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis// spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog/ 'jig dbang gdon mi za 'grub rnams// rigs ni rnams pa brgyad bstan te// mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'// bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung ba rnams// bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pas mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo// sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas/ nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya// bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyi kha dog dbyibs chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab// sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bar// chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyas brjod// ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung// rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla ba rdo rje rnam par bsgom// rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu bsgom// 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin// 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyun du bsgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang// gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob// blun po gang gis 'da' byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur nas// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang// ji tsam nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba// shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te// 'jam pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing// g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa// gar dbang rnam gnon gnon par gar mdzad cing// mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis// pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// sbas pa de nyid mi

mnyam sad par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs// bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyar min yang dag sbyor// zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis// sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzod// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// tshe gar ldan pas gang gsang yang dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid 'di ni de la bstan// 'di la khrus med nyes pa med// dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub pa 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa skyes gyur na// ji tsam 'dod pa nam mkhar 'phur// snying gar rdo rje khu tshur bcings// rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na// rdo rje sems dpar skad cig 'gyur// rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang// grub pa yis kyang mchod byed cing// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya che mchog/ 'gying ba'i langs pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing// las kyi khyad par las sogs gnon// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas// sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing// lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang// phyir brkyang dbyibs su ldan pa dang// khro bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul dka' gnon pa 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po rnams rgyal 'gyur// me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hU~M mdzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don bsgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnams rgyal 'gyur// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas// su ra ta s+t+wa~M zhes smra zhing// ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na// rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur// rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yis// sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grog pa yis// sems can rnams kyi don kun byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa/ thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te// phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod pa shod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang// ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje chen pos bsgrub pa yis// dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan bde byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che// phyag rgya bcings

pa bde ba che// de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad// dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar dbyibs bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag/ sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzod// rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste// mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin// nam mkha'i snying po mthing ga che// tshe dpag med pa pad+ma dmar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog/ 'od zer phreng ba rmad byung ba'i// gdon mi za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed pa bsam par bya// rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du// myur du nam mkha' 'gro byed cing// rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// rol pa dang ni mchod par bde// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgom byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje la sogs gdan zhugs par// rang gi 'khor lo mchog gis brgyan// rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam// pad+ma'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni// brtse dang ldan pa'i bsgom byas te// snying po sbas don gar byas pas// sbas pa che la bde byed na// 'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye bar// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o//// de nas phyag rgya bcing bshad de// rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na// gang gi myur du bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro// thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su bya// de bzhin shes rab g.yon pa ste// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya// sor mo thams cad bar bar du// mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin// rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du bsgrub// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro// 'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yis// gsum du sbyor bas mchod par bya// de nyid las ni sor mo kun// kun du bskums te bcing bar bya// rdo rje'i bcing ba bsdus pas ni// bcings bar ldan par rnam bsgyur te// de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas/ khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed// de bzhin bcings pa rnam bzhag ste// sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni bcing ba bcing ba che// nam mkhar 'gro ba nye bar sgrub// de nyid bcing ba bcing byas te// khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du// rtse mo sprad de dgug bya ba// bcing ba 'di yis pad+ma bsgrub// bcing

ba de nyid rab tu sbom// bde bar bcug nas bsdam byas te// las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// don yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro// bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te// sbom dang khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis// de yi dbus su bcug bya ba// de 'di bcing ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// rab tu dgyes pa nyid thob po// dngos grub thams cad bde ba che/// de yis 'di tshe 'thob gyur te// phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o//// bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya// drug gi sbyor bas sbyar byas na// de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur// bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon gyi snying gar bcings par bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsgrub// gdon mi za bar tshe 'di la// rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// g.yon pa de nyid snying gar gzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pas// sa la bde ba rol pa yis// 'di yis mi zad thob par 'gyur// de bzhin snying gar g.yon pa gzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs// nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying gar gzhag/ g.yas kyang gzhag ste ting nge 'dzin gnas// 'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying gar sbyar// lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yi// de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de nyid bcing pa gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya// g.yas ni snying gar gzung byas te// brjid pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// tshe 'di nyid la the tshom med// de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te// sbyor dang ldan pas brtan par bya// sbom po'i rtse mo pad+ma'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis// mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis// bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing// skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// des 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob// rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi// btsun mo dngos

grub nyid du 'gyur// g.yas ni mtshan mas bgrang byas te// lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste// rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi// dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde mthong byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying gar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa de mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor par yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing// rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa// rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis// skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin sbom po'i rtse mor sbyar// snying rje chen po der gzhag pa// skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// de nyid don kun ston byed ma// 'di ni yang dag bcings pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnam sngangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i thal mo brtan bya ste// khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis// mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje brtan pa che// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pad+ma'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spro ba che bas gar mdzad cing// rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// 'dud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yi ge thabs gnas nas// de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims na// gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis myur du byin brlabs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub ste// bde byed gnyis kyis sprau che ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di byung ngo// bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste// thig le lhar ni yang dag ldan// tha mar ha ra thig ler gnas// rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes// snying gar phyag rgya 'di byas nas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byed cing// spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro// de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog/ ha ra thig ler yang dag ldan// cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa// 'di ni snying gar bzhag byas na// bde bar nam mkha' 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo// 'dren pa de nyid thog mar gzhag/ ltos ltos zhes pa hU~M

dang ldan// skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// dbus su bskul bas 'grub pa 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying gar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis 'di tshe 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing// rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o//// de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro// mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid du// rdo rje hU~M mdzad nyi ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che// me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la// de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad// khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngags ni rang gi snying gar bsgom// khro mo'i bu mo'i mdun du bskor// khro mo chen mo de 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams// hU~M byas myur du brgyab par 'gyur// de dag gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig/ skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing// rdo rje gtso la dran par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/ 'gro ba thams cad dbang bya ste// las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te// las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang bsgrub par nus// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// de nas sangs rgyas che de dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/ gzungs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi// dga' bas 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te// rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel// skal ba chen mo rtsen par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang yang du gzigs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// o~M badzra o~M ku sha du ru du ru/ e h+ye hi bi// sarbA na par+Sha ta tsakra sany+tsa ya/

badzra a~M ku sha hU~M phaT/ 'di yis phyag rgya rdo rje yi// bcing ba gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya// rdo rje khro bo rab sbyar ba// rdo rje kyo \u0f84ba zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams// phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams// mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin bzhag/ dbus su sbam mo gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcing pa bsdam byas te// rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo sprad// bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing// bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya// de nyid bcing ba dam byas te// dbang dang chud ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams// rdo rje sbom po nus byas te// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed// mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te// dpang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' bar bskyed nas// rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi// rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zung// de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te// thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas// chos kyi ngo bor tshig smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs// rab bde longs spyod gar byas te// rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing// bde byed chen pos bdag nyid rjes// legs so zhes pa sbyin byed de// legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so sna tshogs che// legs so legs so dgyes pa che/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so//// gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la// ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems bde thob par smon// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam+b+ha wa dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// phyis kha che'i paN+Di ta te dza de ba'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang

gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta ra ha s+yo gu h+ya sa mA dza nA ma ma hA kalpa rA dza/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang/ byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang/ de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnams par snang mdzad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag med dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa dang de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad shin tu

yongs su gang bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'adod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa de dag nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugasakyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to// de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par ro// la la ni mA ma kI'i rnam par ro// la la ni gos dkar mo'i rnam par ro// la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma'i rnam par yang dag par gnas par gyur to// la la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni sgra'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni dri'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni ro'i ngo bo'i rnam pas/ la la ni reg bya'i ngo bo'i rnam pas yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyi kun du rgyas// sangs rgyas sprin ni kun tu bkram// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje bdag po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs pa de ma thag tu/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje

sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyis sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po skyes bu gzugs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin kyis brlabs so// byin gyis brlabs pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i thugs ka nas mngon par byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni rab byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang// rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// rdo rje snying po 'dus pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so// 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can la yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang/ yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// badzra d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis nag po/ dkar po dmar po'i rnam pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gti mug gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dzi na dzika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis dkar po/ nag po dmar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rin chen tog gi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ser po/ nag po/ dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i g.yas phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// A ro lika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes

bu de nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis dmar po/ nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod mchog gi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ljang gu/ nag po dkar po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gtog pa 'di rnams kyis// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su mnyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa/ rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rA ga ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs slu ba rdo

rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba rjes su btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// badzra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ byang gi grwar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// ya mAn+ta kri ta/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// pad mAn+ta kri ta/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ big+h+nan+ta kr-ita/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsnyengs par byed pa'i rnam pas byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyes par byed pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyis sems lus kyi rnam pa dang/ lus sems kyi rnam pa dang/ sems tshig tu brjod pa'i rnam pa skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho kun du bzang po yi// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// skye ba med pa tshul gyis su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med par bsgom pa'i dngos// bsgom pa bsgom pa ma yin nyid// de ltar dngos po dngos med de// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa

mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// chos bdag med las kun tu byung// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas 'od zer 'bar ba sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med// nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis// 'di ltar dngos por rab tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas gsungs so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che// yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med pa yi chos las byung// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa// rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med// byang chub sems khyod

phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don// byang chub sems ni rab skor ba// byang chub spyod pa rdo rje che// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M// nam mkha'i khams gyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam// 'od zer lnga ni kun du khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis spras// mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgom nas su// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya// bsdus pa gnyis med sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog rab dang// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang// don grub phyag rgya chen po rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung// shel dang zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin ni kun tu 'khrigs// rtse mo dgu pa'i rdo rje che// de yi phyag tu rnam par bsgom// ma ra ka ta'i 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// kun du 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen bsnams par bsgom// pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'od 'bar 'chang// rab 'bar phyag na pad ma bsnams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer lnga yi 'od 'dra ba// sna tshogs don yod rdo rje can// zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du ni bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi

ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu bsgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yong mi spro// sangs rgyas 'bar ba mtshungs pa'i 'od// rab mchog sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang// pad ma ral gri mtshon cha 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyibs kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni// pad ma sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni// rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rang mchog 'di rnams nyid// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las rdo rje bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan nyid min pa thams cad spangs// kun du bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba// ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong mdzad// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dag ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso// 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul// dkyil 'khor nyams dga' rab tu bshad// de nas de phyir thugs dkyil 'khor// mchog thugs

rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab bshad bya// lus dang ngag sems bsgoms pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// thig skud sar pa legs bkal ba// tshad ma bzang po mdzes pa yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhi dang// sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni// de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni// in dra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// shar du 'khor lo chen po ni// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// lho ru rin chen chen po ni// 'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs// nub tu pad+ma chen po ni// pad+ma rA gi'i kha dog 'dra// byang du ral gri chen po ni// 'od zer 'bar ba rab 'khrigs bri// dbus su sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od// spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru bri// mA ma kI yi rigs 'byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho ru'o// pad ma kha bye sdong bur bcas// nub tu kun du bri bar bya// byang du ut+pal mdzes pa ni// mthing ka sprin dang 'dra ba bri// tho ba kun nas 'od mdzes 'bar// shar gyi sgo ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba// dbyug pa lho ru kun du bri// pad ma 'bar ba 'od byed pa// nub tu kun du bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje can// byang du rdo rje bri bar bya// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// btsun mo mdzes shing mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lo rnyed nas// dri dang me tog phreng brgyan te// de dbus su ni 'dod pa bya// yon tan ske rags mA ma kI// shes rab can gyis de phyin brlabs// sangs rgyas zhi ba tshul spros pas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan// bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to// rnam par mi rtogs don las byung// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs// theg pa'i mchog ni bla na med// rab mchog dngos grub sgrub par byed// gdol pa

smyig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams// theg chen bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med la sogs pa// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang// de rnams kun kyang theg pa che// mchog gi sgrub pa 'dir 'grub 'gyur// snying nas slob dpon smod pa dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yong mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi sems can gang// brdzun du smra la dga' ba dang// gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang// rtag tu 'dod pa spyod dga' gang// bshang gci zas su za ba ste// de rnams sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo la// sgrub po gang gis 'dod byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos su ni// dngos grub rgya chen des 'thob po// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la// rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gsan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma smra cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// chos nyid ngag 'di sangs rgyas ni// snying po'i chos kyi don byung ba// 'di dag byang chub spyod pa'i gnas// de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing skrag la brgyal par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur// dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas chos kyi dbyangs 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o chos e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rjergyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas// rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// dus gsum dag gi lam du 'byung// nam mkha' chen po'i dbyings gyur pa// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha'i sku las yang dag byung// nam mkha'i lam la gnas pa po// nam mkha'i thugs te chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las kun tu spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ oM sarba tathA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gsung byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta wAka badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje gsum pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang// gnas dang gnas ni rnam par bsgom pa ste// de dag nyid mchog rab kyi sngags kyi ni// mtshan nyid mtshan ma bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen tog gis ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod grub pas rdo rje don yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam

pa lnga rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang chen 'di gsungs so// sngags dmigs pa yi lus kyis ni// ngag dang yid la bskul byas pas// bsgrub bya rab mchog dngos grub dang// yid ni yang dag dga' mdzes pa// sems kyi dmigs pa bdag med pa// ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom// rnam gsum sbyor ba nam mkha' dang// mnyam nyid gnas ni grub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis// byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di// rnam par dpyad nas bsdu ba yis// byang chub sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin// sngags kyi brtags pa bsgom par bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis// sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// phramo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// yungs kar rgyu dang mi rgyu+u ba// ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes brtags pa bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas dgod do// hU~M nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// spyan gyi tshul gyi sbyor ba la// rdo rje pad ma rnam par bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du yongs su bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro// 'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro// ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tshad nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di shis te// bsgom pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du// bsgom pa der ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas

rnams ni// de ru mdor ni spro bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yi// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// de nyid don kun ston pa pos// spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug bsgom// gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen ni// legs mchod nas kyang bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// zas su bshang gci zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa// yang dag bla med 'grub par 'gyur// sha yang bza' bar bya ba'i phyir// sha chen po ni rab tu brtag/ gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/ de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha/ zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya// zas gzhan bza' bar ma byas na// byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten du// go 'phang las ni byed par 'gyur// stobs ldan gtso bo gzi brjid can// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong// mthong ba tsam gyis bskul med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang byed 'gyur// 'di ni thams cad sangs rgyas kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di// lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod pa bstan par ni// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// nges par sangs rgyas myur thob 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod pa bsten bya zhing// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// dka' thub sdom pa mi zad pa// bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// slongs mo za zhing mi bzlas te// slong la dga' bar yang mi bya// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// bder gnas thob na byang chub 'thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang// dmyal bar nges par bsreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub

sems dpa' ni// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pas// chos mchog mi 'gyur mchog brnyes rnams// 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so// chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis// 'dod yon lnga rnams rtag tu brten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod pa'i bdag nyid can mchod bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas don yod rdo rje 'dzin// reg bya rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o// gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha rnams nyid du rtag tu+u bsgom// yang na de la rigs kyi ni// dbye ba rnam par bsgoms pas bsgom// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor// chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa// lus dang ngag dang sems ni bsgom// rdo rje rjes su dran sgom pa// rigs ni rjes dran sbyor ba las// khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa// dam tshig rjes dran sbyor ba las// bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon rnyed nas// byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas gsum kyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hU~M dang oM dag dang// AHdang phaT kyang rab bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi// rdo rje pad mo bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro// de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// rdo rje chos ni rab bsgom bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas

pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// ba spu rnams kyi rtse mo nas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu bsgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro// de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// khro bo'i dbang po rab tu bsgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar ba sgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya// de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang zhig/ phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis// bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang zhig/ nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra bar// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ kun du bzang po'i thugs gang zhig/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// bdag gi sems kyang de 'dra bar// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig/ de la sngags kyi gzugs dang sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje'i sku gang yin// gsung gi sku ni rnam bsgom pa// bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sku// rtag tu sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dam tshig khu chu cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bya zhing// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// skye ba med cing zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba med// de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rang bzhin 'od gsal

de nas ni// nam mkha' mtshan med mi 'gyur des// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs kyi mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na// bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed nas// rigs kyi sbyor ba'i rab dbye bas// rang gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dag dang// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub// gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// bzlas pas de ni 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dam pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje rgyal po theg pa che// nam mkha'i spyod pas rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam 'jug mdzad// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag// mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ rdo rje theg pa khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed gnas// sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung yang pa'i mig can ni// gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan rnyed nas// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon gzung// byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am// rgyal ba nyid skyes zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas// bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa yang// rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya// nu ma'i dbus bar spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar// lte ba ro smad gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas

par// mkhas pas snying gar bsgom par bya// gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas su gyur par rnam par bsam// rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ut+pal dag dang// pad ma rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// me tog kar ni ka ra dang// mal+li kA dang yU thi ka// me tog ka ra bI ra yang// bsams nas mchod pa rab ru brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya zhing// rnam par mkhas pas brtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad ma rdo rje dang// ral gri ut+pal mkhas pas bsgom// dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam la// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam// rin chen na bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs la sogs brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la// dngos grub 'dod pa sbyin pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la// rig pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// rang lus de bzhin gshegs rang bzhin// bshang ba gci bas bla ma mchod// bzhin bzang yid du 'ong ba yi// na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig yangs khu ba blangs nas ni// brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pas bza'// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang// sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ kun don

dbang phyug dam pa yis// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi gsang// nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// mi bskyod rdo rje rab bsgoms nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang// 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rje phyer brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi rgya mamatsho las zhe sdang gi rigs kyi
