ma thag tu rdo rje che// sku gsum dri med las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M badzra rA dza hU~M/ rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni// 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par bsgom// sems kyi rdo rje'i tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che// rdo rje dri med gsum las byung// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga yang dag byas nas ni// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mtha' klas par// phur bus 'debs 'dir gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan mdzad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma 'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ e ma'o snying po kun btus pa// e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba// e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms// phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// phur bus gdab la yang dag bshad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// phur gdab de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs las mchog sbyin pa// sngags kyi de nyid bsdus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las sku dang gsung dang thugs rmad du byung ba sngags kyis 'gugs pa rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// de ru cho ga bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lhag par byas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa yis// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag/ bzhin yang mdzes la rab tu bzang// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom// dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par bsgom// sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang/ mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// rnam

par snang mdzad sku chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// btso blag mkhan ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub// de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// byas nas las ni brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de ni de ma thag nyid du// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// chos rnams kun 'dzin rgyal po mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing// bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// de ni rdo rje chos bdag nyid// sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang// dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya// gsang ba thob par byed pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni// bsgom pa mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dri dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gal te rdo rje can grub 'dod// bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun du skrag par byed pa'i khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM hrIHSh+tIHbi kr-i tA na na sarba sha trU~M nA sha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ dug ni khrag dang kun du sbyar// lan tshwa ske tshe yungs mar te// tsher ma'i me las khros pas bsreg/ bu mo'i ming gi tshig dang bcas// nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na// 'di ni rnam pa kun du shis// shes rab can gyis gru gsum du// stong phrag brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg/ bu mo dag gi don gyi

phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya// bskal pa gsum dang grangs med ni// des ni rtag tu gnon par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang ni chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhan yang rung// gal te rmongs pa 'das na ni// de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la// dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// phan na nges par ltung bar gyur// hU~M yig rab tu 'bar dad bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te// gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas// skyes pa'am bud med gzugs bris la// lag par sta re bsams nas su// mgrin pa bcad par rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa// 'di yis snad par 'gyur ba'am// shi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar che// me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje rnam bsgoms na// chu rnams gnon pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na// rlung la sogs pa byung na ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// gdug pa'i dgra ni rjes dran bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang// mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jigs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag gang// sngags 'dis skrag par byas na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaT// ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru// btsun mo rtag tu gzhag par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa// pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas// sngags 'di rab tu bsgom par bya// hU~M/ 'od zer lnga 'od rab 'bar ba// rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba bsgom// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur// de ni de ma thag nyid du// rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// de ni de ma thag nyid

du// 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur// bshad pa'am yang na bza' ba'am// sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du sngags bas na// zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// kham phor sbyar mar gzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo// khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang// sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin// blangs nas kha sbyar sbyor ba yis// zos na de yis mi mthong ngo// bshang dang lhan cig ldan pa yis// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// sha chen dang ni sbyor ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// ba glang sha dang sbyor ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// bshang ba las byung srog chags las// brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo// ga pur tsan+dan sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// gi wang a ga ru sbyar ba'i// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro// ga pur gur gum sbyor ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje can rnams gang yang rung// phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs na// de 'drar 'gyur te dpal dang ldan// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi// steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur// stong gsum bgrod pa dpal dang ldan// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang// lha yi longs spyod rigs brtu?l zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyod// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag/ sems 'khrul yid la dbang ba dag/ ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che// e ma'o gsang

gnas mi 'gyur ba// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed par byed pa mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos// rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye bas// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje spyan dang gzugs sogs kyis// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad// khro bo'i nang la de mchog ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po chos mchog rnams// dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par bsgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// thams cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed nyid brtag par bya// thams cad sbyor ba'i sngags rnams la// spyi bo ru ni bskul ba shis// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsam gtan 'khor lo 'di yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrub po rnams la phan par gsungs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug/ sku dang gsung thugs yang dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal te// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang// nag tshal rab tu dben par yang// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba// sngags dang bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags dang bsam gtan gyis bskul bas// gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du// las rnamasasna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// gnas gsum du ni rab brtag go// dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni// byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub// bskul dang rengs pa lha chen po// 'phags pa'i sa ni bzhi po dag/ rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'am// khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bzung nas dbab par rab tu brtag// cho ga thams cad byas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni// khams gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur// de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig ni 'di rnams so// hU~M hAHAHdz+haiH/ nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyang// cho ga yis ni 'bab par 'gyur// hU~M yig rdo rje sems dpa'i

bdag/ hAHyig sku yi rdo rje can// AHyig chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// 'di ni sngags tshig bstan pa'o// yi ge dz+haiHyis bskul bar bshad// 'gul pa dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'di ni bskul ba thams cad kyi// gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad// khru gang tsam mam khru do'am// ji srid khru brgyad lnga tsam du// rdo rje rgyal po rab bskul na// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang// brtul zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya// sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba// gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o// dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// skra bshig gcer bur byung ba yis// khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed// dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// stong brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas kyang// 'chi bar 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la// ba lang sha dang rta yi sha// khyi yi sha'am sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen gyis ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad// 'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi// 'jigs pa shin tu mi bzad dran// chos mchog can gyi bshang gci yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ces gsungs so// chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// dug las byung ba'i tsher ma ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dgang zhing skul ba'i tshig dang bcas// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ces gsungs so// ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang// dug dang d+ha du+u ra dag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad gsad pa la// 'di dag rab mchog sbyar bar bshad// sol khus gsher ba'i gos dag ni// gyon te sems ni khros nas su// rkang pas ling+ga mnan nas ni// srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za// rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis// gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang// myur ba dag tu 'khyer bar 'gyur// ske tshe dang ni yang dag ldan// ske tshe bshang gci sbyar ba yis// ling+ga yongs su gang bar ni// blugs la rkang pas mnan na ni// tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o// namaHsa mnA kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ o~M hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha

da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+phoT ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya// 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che// rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams// bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu brtag/ de la 'di ni drag po chen po khro bo'i dam tshig go/ mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rab bsgoms la// gdug pa de yis bsad par ni// bsams nas de ma thag tu 'chi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni// gdug pa'i sems dpas bsad na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra bo rnams// skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni// sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa// gtum zhing khro bo mi bzad pas// skrag par gyur par bsams des ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// 'ug pa khwa dang bya rgod dang// mchu rings pa dang wa rnams te// de yis zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ sprul nag rab tu khros pa ni// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa// dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni// dpral bar bsams na 'di khyad 'phags// sbrul des zos par bsams pas ni// bsgrub bya dag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la// yams bsam nye bar 'tshe ba rnams// 'jigs pa nges par dbab pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no// tho ba rab tu drag po yis// brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// dgra yi srog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje s+t+wa re la sogs pas// gsheg cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi// bsrung ba la sogs sngags rnams dang// lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod byed mchog gi mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje phung pos ji tsam du// sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// gsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni// 'di ltas mnyes 'gyur gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgya rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' ji bzhin// bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' thub

chen po// thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan// de la 'di ni las phran tshogs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o// sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro// lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng ba can// rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bris// de la 'di ni klu khro bo skul ba'i snying po'o// kha~M/ mi zad par ni gyur pa'i dug/ kha yi nang du de bsam zhing// dug ni ha la ha la 'dra// sreg pa me yi kha dog dang// bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni dug thams cad dgug pa'i snying po'o// hrIH/ rnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun// de yis khyer bar bsgoms nas ni// bab par gyur par rnam par bsam// de ni de ma thag nyid du// dug gi rgya mtsho mi bzad 'gyur// reg ma thag tu 'gro ba kun// 'jigs pa 'di la the tshom med// sdig pa sbal pa la sogs dang// sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag la'ang// sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya// de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o// o~M// lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs// gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bsam na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren// bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje'i snying po'o// hU~M// snying po 'di ni rdo rje che// kha dog dkar por rnam par bsgom// 'od kyi sprin ni cher 'bar ba// zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil// gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de ma thag tu sdud pas ldang// lan gnyis lan gsum rab bsgoms nas// skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang// skad cig gis ni dug med byed// zhes de skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o// AH/ 'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang// gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// bsams pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad// ri bong can bzhin dri med pa// de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa// 'od zer lnga ni rab rdzogs pa'o// sdud pa na ni dam tshig gnag// bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dra// bsam gtan gnas 'di gsang ba ste// gsang chen ye shes dri ma med// de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams so// dzi na dzig/ A ro lika/ badzra d+h+r-ika/ nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa// dad pas yon tan thob par

'gyur// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dam tshig spre'u'i rnam pa'am// yang na khyir ni byung ba'ang rung// rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las// byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo'am ni rdo rje'ang rung// rdo rje'i go 'phangs gnas bsgom la// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams// des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nad las thar bar bsgom par bya// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan rnams// de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis// las skos su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur// yang na rang gi sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes kyo ba 'od chen po// 'dod pa thar pa rdo rje ches// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ni// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing// rang bzhin dag pa'i de nyid la// 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs// bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don brtson pa'i// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong// de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te// byang chub ye shes mchog thob pa// sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa yi// skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong// sems can chen po khams gsum pas// mchod pa byed par de yis mthong// rang gzugs ye shes che 'od mnyam// sangs rgyas byang chub sems pa yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang// grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa che// rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong 'gyur bar// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang// khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na// des ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// zhing na bzhugs par nges par

mthong// thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang// chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol// chos kyi 'khor lor bsgyur ba'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur// kun dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong// rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// mchod pa byed par nges mthong ngo// zhes kyang gsungs so// rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i// rmi lam dri ma med mthong des// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur// gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs// gal te rdo rje blos mthong na// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o// rang gi sems ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams thams cad rab gnas pa// nam mkha' rdo rje'i sems gnas 'di// chos med chos nyid med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags// ngo bo nyid med chos rnams la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// e ma'o ngo mtshar yang dag byung// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin no// nam mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du yang mi sems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam dang/ rmi lam las byung bar rjes su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang nam mkha' ni brtag tu med pa/ bltar med pa thogs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad dang rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo

nyid do// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang/ nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste// dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams su gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na yang gnas pa ma yin te/ chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med pa'o// gang la skye ba med pa de ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so// de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rnam pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/ sems la mi gnas so// chos gang yang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung bar byed pa rdo rje'i gnas yin no// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam gyi gnas mthong bar bya'o snyams du mi sems so// mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba rmi lam las byung ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams dang/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rmi lam la bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la sems can gang dag gis gser ram/ rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/ gang gsol ba btab pa de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam nyid kyis 'byor par byed do/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs

nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la nam mkha'i khams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// zhes pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub kun nas btus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i kun nas btus pa'i dngos grub ni sngags thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos grub thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la ni gnas so// lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas// gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems ni lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag ni sems la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyer zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas pa lags/ gang nas byung ba lags/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems la gnas so// rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ sems gang la gnas/ bka' stsal pa nam mkha' la gnas so// gsol pa nam mkha' gang la gnas/ bka' stsal pa gang la yang mi gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba

'dus pa las sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i bkod pas mchod pa byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// rdo rje'i cho gas bri bar bya// sngags rnams kyi ni gsang ba mchog/ phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ grwa rnams kun du dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgom pa'i// mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sku yi rdo rje can// sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig go// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dra// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgoms pas thig gdab po// nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas// rdo rje'i gsung gi yon tan bskyed// rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos// rig pa'i dbang po dbab par bya// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// kun du zlum po bri bar bya// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// cho ga

brtson pas bri bar bya// tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje'i gnas ni nyams dga' nyid// de dag thams cad yongs su dgod// yongs su gsal bar cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// de ltas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// bshang gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas kun nas sprin gyi bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang chen 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i// gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas shes pa'i gsang chen rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gi yi ge'i gnas rnams te/ o~M AHhU~M/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang// tshon rtsi rnams kyang dgye ba dag/ sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste// byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas// sngags kyi lha rnams bcug nas su// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par brtag/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang// spyan ma yang na gzhug par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong// rdo rje'i sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos mas dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mchog tu rtag pa'i gsang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mA ma kI yang dbab par bya// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// mchog tu rmad byung gsang chen no// de ltar byas pas myur du rang// yid la dbang ba rnams byon nas// rab tu dgyes par gyur pa rnams// gsang ba dag gi mchog kyang stsol// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags grub pa yis bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung che// khro bo'i rgyal po yis sangs rgyas// thams cad bkug nas mchod par bya// rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi// dam tshig

mchod pa dus gsum pa// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang// rmad byung chen po'i gtor ma dbul// bshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang// sems las byung ba'i tsan+dan dang// khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar kun du bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o// thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di// rang nyid gang tshe spyod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// yang na rdo rje bdud rtsir grags// slob ma rdo rje 'od po cher// sangs rgyas kun gyis nges bstan pa'i// las kyi go 'phangs bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni// rdo rje'i thig skud la ni dgod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye brag gis// tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par dgye// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang chen byang chub dam pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang// rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom par bya// mchog gi sku gsung thugs dam tshig/ gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar rtag tu byas na ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad// rdo rje bum pa rnams dgod pa// sngags rgyud bdag pos shes byas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun 'bras 'dod pa yi// sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya// bshang gci 'bru mar sha la sogs// bsreg rdzas dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// brgya rtsa brgyad ni sbyin sreg bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis// slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung// AHyig lus dang ngag sems la// bsgom nas rdo rje 'dzin par byed// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang// grags chen rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu// byin gyis brlabs ni rab tu stsol// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ AHkha~M bI ra hU~M/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi snying po'i sngags kyi rgyal po'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang chen no// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom// rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin

pa yis// sil snyan dri yi sprin tshogs bsgom// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni// yungs kar brtul zhugs can gyis brdeg/ de la de yi tshe na ni// rang nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas bsgom// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// bzung bar mkhas pas bsgom par bya// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam// rtag tu slob ma blo brtan pa// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang chen te// slob dpon thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o// dbang bskur chen po rdo rje ni// khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa// rdo rje gsang ba gsum byung ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga gsang chen no// byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab dga'i sems kyis sbyin par bya// lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying gar bdag po gzhag par bya// rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la// de la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i// dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin pa yang khyod kyis blang// pha rol bud med bsten par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sems can thams cad rab bskul bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// zhes kyang gsungs so// sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yi// de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang// gsang ba sbyin pa brtsam par bya// khu ba'am yang na bshang ba'ang rung// mngon par bsngags nas cho ga bzhin// rdo rje'i blos ni bar gzhug bya// 'di ltas dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang// sngags kyi 'khor los bud med gzugs// sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sngags thams cad kyis mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha// sha chen dag kyang bza' bar bya// sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gi// sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge o~M// bsgoms na de ma thag tu

'bar// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa ste// dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang// sangs rgyas byang chub rang nyid kyang// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang// rdo rje 'gugs pa mchog dag ni// rdo rje sku yi bka' ji bzhin// dkyil 'khor bdag gis thams cad 'grub// bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams// cha ni mnyam par byas nas su// kham por sbyar mar bzhag nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gi mchog go// hrIHyig 'bar ba 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom// de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyis dbab par bya// de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje'i byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas so// oMHkhaMd+hI: phyag na rdo rje gzugs chen po// phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang// gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgom nas gsang ba'i gnas gzhag go// de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te// thams cad 'od chen sdug bsngal ni// chen po snying pos bskul bar bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba'o// AH/ mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che// lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul na// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// nyams dga' ba dang ri dbang dang// chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// zla phyed nang dang rdzogs pa yis// nges par sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi// rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// 'khor gyi tshogs rnams de dag ni// byang chub rdo rje can grub 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur zhing// sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje bzhad ma chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rdo rje gsang chen no// rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dgod pa che// mngag gzhug pa rnams rtag tu bskul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas rnam pa bzhi ste/ dam tshig bskul ba dang/ dam tshig gtong ba dang/

dam tshig bod pa dang/ dam tshig 'ching ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni// chos rnams thams cad rnams spangs pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis rdo rje ni// rmad byung gzugs can byed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung// gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo// 'dzin pa'i rdo rje stobs po che// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas bsam// mda' lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis// dbu rgyan rtse mor yang dag spro// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje khro bo dbab par bya// sngangs shing brgyal bar bsgom pa ni// byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du// gsang ba'i sku la bdag gis bsgom// sngags rnams kun gyi rab tu gsang// rdo rje'i don gyi blo yis gsungs// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam pa// sngags kyi rdo rje hU~M la sogs// rdo rje gsum la sogs pa bsgom// o~M ni mig gi dbus bsams nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni// sku gsung rdo rje can rnams mthong// bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che// sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na// rdo rje can gyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// bsam na don rnams thams cad 'byor// ba~M ni kha yi nang du bsgom// o~M yig lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas// yid bzhin nor bus rnam brgyan pa// zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel// ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshig gi mchog rdo rje gsung las phyung ngo// bIH/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis// bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// ser po rdo rje rnam par 'gying// zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya// dpa' bo rdo rje'i rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dbyangs kun nas nges par bsgrags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// tsu~M/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa

bsam// cho ga dag gis sangs rgyas sprin// rdo rje gsum mchog grags chen ni// lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab// skul byed rdo rje ma bsgom mo// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkar mor rab tu bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsams la sngags kyi gnas dgod do// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad rdo rje'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dza~M/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje bsgoms pas dbab par bya// dza~Mb+ha la ni nor bsgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa// thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga ni cho ga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de yi rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug pas dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// de yi dbu rgyan rnam par bsam// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang// 'brog gnas dbang po 'od chen mnyes// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdzas sgrub pa'i rtog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa nye bar spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// k+ShiM/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas// me tog spos kyis kun du 'khrigs// gnon sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsam// gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsams nas// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab// gzugs ni gcig tu bsam par bya// lus gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la ni khro bo bsgom// snying gar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid gnas pa bsgom pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje'i sngags thams cad dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phra mo'i dngos grub 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub// sangs rgyas gzugs

'dzin 'od bzang po// 'dzam bu chu yi gser 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang la sogs kun grub ni// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal mo grub pa che// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba sngags kyi dngos grub rnams so// sngags kyi dngos grub yid 'ong ba'i// mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// mthong ba nyid kyi dga' bar 'gyur// gtsug tor thams cad grub pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems bsgom pa ni// rang gzugs nyid kyis de bya ste// de ltas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so// thor tshug dbu rgyan 'chang ba'i gzug/ chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// sngags kyi sdom pas kun du bsdams// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs// bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba// rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing// rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom par bya// phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes// sngags kyi rgyud ni legs par bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs chen pos thun bzhir ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu rnams// bza' dang bca' ba thams cad spyad// 'di yis myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gis de dag kun// gdon mi za bar 'dir thob 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor brku zhing// gsang ba'am rmad du byung ba che// 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun du bsdams// 'dod chags rdo rje'i lcags kyu yum// yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kIr// gsung gi rdo rje mchog thugs kyis// 'di ni rnam pa kun du rigs// bsam gtan yid gsum rdo rje can// rang gi phyag rgya'am sems kyis bsam// deltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen yang// mnyes par 'gyur 'dir gdon mi za// sgrub pa po ni

blo brtan pas// nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms tshol// kha zas bzang po bstar ba dag/ de dag skrag nas ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum 'das na// rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha ma yin mo mi mo'ang rung// rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bstan// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i de nyid tshul chen te// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje can// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsungs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni// de yang sangs rgyas mnyam par 'gyur// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse bas// rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge che// rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bya ste// sha chen rtag tu bza' bya'o// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje de

bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste// gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches// bshang gci rtag tu bza' bya nyid// 'di ni gsang ba rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/ dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bya ste// khrag dang khu ba sbyar ba dag/ brtul zhugs brtan pas rtag tu bza'// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dam tshig de ni rmad byung che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtag pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin phyir yang dag bsrung// gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas// sems can gzud pa'i ngang tshul te// mchog tu rtag pa'i dam tshig go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam// byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig de ni rmad byung che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gti mug lam gyis las gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos drag po'i dam tshig 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// khams gsum par ni gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las byung kun// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sems can skyes pa ji snyed pa// sku gsum dbyer med la gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang// bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gi rdo rje 'di nyid kyi/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab

'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sha dang khrag ni za ba dang// rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod// dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje chen po mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos klu'i dbang po'i rgyal mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// 'o ma 'thung ba phra ma can// de dag 'dod dang dri la 'bad// dam tshig 'di rnams kyis bsgrub bya// gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lha ma yin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// khro zhing nga rgyal khur gyis non// spos dang me tog spyod la dgyes// dam tshig rdo rje sa 'og tu// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed de// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// thod rus bdug pa'i 'bru mad dang// zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig 'di// dag byed rdo rje don chen byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// bshang ba gci ba khrag bza' zhing// chang la sogs pa rtag tu btung// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor bas// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsad bya// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun la phan 'dod pas// dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje yang dag 'byung bar bya// sems can khams ni rnam kun du// rtag tu sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos ngag gi dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// ngag gi las lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor du// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sems rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin

kun// brtan pa rdo rje'i blo yis bsgom// rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// rang rgyal nyan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// phyag 'tshal na ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags rdo rje thams cad kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sems can khams rnams bsdus nas ni// bsam gtan rdo rje bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsum gyis phyag 'tshal mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje 'byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bsnyen pa dang/ bsgrub pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje bshang gcis nam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul// dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje thams cad mi snang ba'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// thun bzhi po ni gang zhig mchog/ rdo rje mo ni nyin re spyad// slar yang rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog/ rdo rje rdzogs byed dam tshig go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// dbu rgyan gyi ni bsam gtan bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig kun// khros pa rnams kyis mi thub bo// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// kha zas la ni sku'i rdo rje// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang// mdo 'don cho ga'i bya ba la// rdo rje chos su rtag tu bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje snying po rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung par gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po 'di sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo dmigs su med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la gang ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po de ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' rdo rje'i rtog las byung// log par bzung bas zin pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsung rdo rje'i tshig la log pa kun 'byung bas mi brtag tu gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid spyod pa gshegs pa dang byon pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di yin no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i byang chub chen po sems dpa' mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes pas 'di snyam du yongs su rtog par byed de/ ci rdo rje chen po'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par ma mkhyen nas gsang ba'i yi ge 'chad dam snyam pa yang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// re zhig byang chub chen po sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i yi ge rnyed pa nged kyis kyang sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid med pa/ mi 'gyur ba las byung ba/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje

mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas so// rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa sangs rgyas rdo rje'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yong ye sems can 'di dag ni sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid nye bar bzung nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings ni gnas med pa// rtog pa rdo rje yang dag byung// smra bya smra bya yang ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub gang nas yang dag par 'byung/ gang du gnas gang du med par 'gyur ba lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud la rdo rje rab tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang/ khams gsum ji snyed pa dag kyang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang/ khams gsum pa thams cad gang na gnas/ ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub dang/ khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i khams la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' gang na gnas// phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ gang na yang ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur nas dbyangs 'di dag brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje// e ma'o rdo rje'i bstan pa ni// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru sku ni rnam sgom pa// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog/ rdo rje gsum mchog dbang phyug gis// dngos grub dag ni thams cad kyi// rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa gsungs// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku yi rdo rje rab

bsgom nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom// zhal gsum sku gsum yang dag byung// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na// myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis// gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan du rnams par bsgom pa ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che// mnyes par byed pa rnam par bsam// rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa// khyu mchog des ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang zhig la la 'di sgom pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyis ni 'od chen po// sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang sgrub po thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang chen nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo// sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyang mi 'da'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje debazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// smad pa nyid du yong mi bya// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'// gsang ba'i rdo rje gsum byung yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams// thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad// gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa'i// dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// mgu bya thugs rdo rje mi smad// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung

ngo// mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje'i skye mched rnams nyid ni// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khams gsum bsags pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// chu'i khams mA ma kI zhes bya// dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba// me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dam tshig ni// de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang chen gsang ba 'dus par mngon par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nyid du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje dang slob dpon 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu ji snyed mdor bsdus te bstan pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams bzhugs pa dang 'tsho ba dang spyod pa de rnams thams cad kyang dus gsum du byon nas/ rdo rje slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnams kyis/ yang dag par mchod nas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing/ ngag rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di skad du yang 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na/ ji snyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de bas kyang/ slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur ba nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje ye shes yang dag par byung ba de rnams kyang byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon la mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rnams gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gsol pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// gang la yang mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur nas cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcon ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ni

dkyil 'khor chen po nyon cig/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo can kun brtsam par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying gar rab bsgoms nas// dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya// mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la// dbang bskur ba yi gnas gsum gyis// thams cad cho ga bzhin du dbab// sems can kun la phan bzhed pa'i// byang chub 'di yis 'thob 'gyur zhing// dngos grub rmad byung thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag pos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba sku+u dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// hU~M hrIHkha~M/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bsam// sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// drag po mi sdug kun tu khros// ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// phyag bzhi pa ni cho ga yis/ phyag na thod pa bsnams par bsgom// lnga yi 'od zer rab gsal ba'i// rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// khrag drang ba yi mchog yin no// rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang// phur bu drag po mchog dag gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sku dag kyang// rdo rje'i sbyor bas gzir bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos slar yang rdo rje kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// bza' ba'am btung ba gang cung zad// brtul zhugs can gyis gang za ba// bshang gci sha ye sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// nyer spyod lnga yi mchod mchog

gis// mchod pas de dag mchod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rang gi khu ba sogs bzung bas// cho ga bzhin du kun mchod bya// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// dam tshig 'dzin pa'i mi rnams la// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rjes spyad// sdom pa 'di ni rmad byung che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// lus dang ngag sems longs spyod rdzogs// gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes// bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par byed// min na thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos thams cad sgrub pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' sdom pa nyid gyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mtho gang tsam gyis dpags par ni// mgo bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// o~M yig dbus su gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par// 'gyur bar 'dir ni the tshom med// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing// dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya// rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi bya// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad bsal ba gnon pa 'dren pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o~M/ 'od zer dkar 'bar phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa yis// ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum 'od dam tshig gis// sa bon 'di ni gsang gsum byung// de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos lus dang ngag dang sems bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM hu

lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ gro ga sogs la 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas par// haM yig dbus su bzhag nas su// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// yang dag brgyan te rtag tu bzhag/ 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas slar yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje any+dza na'i gnas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am shing gcig drung// ma mo'i gnas sam zhig nas su// de ru rdo rje any+dza na// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// tshil chen po dang/ khrag dang bshang ba dang pad+ma'i skud pa dang/ arga'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i nam phyed na/ rdo rje any+dza mkhas pas dbab par bya'o// sngags de nyid lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du rtogs pa dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gis spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum rtogs pa dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum po 'di dag go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang

mnyam pa'i bskal pa 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyang 'das nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don ma bshad pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do// gang zhig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpas tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma ngu shig/ sdug bsngal gsum ma skyed cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi bskyed par bgyi/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge'i skal ba ma mchis te/ tha na ming thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyed rnams kyis mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rigs kyi bu gang gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge 'di dag yang dag par ma thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so// de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi btsun mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/

sems can khams ni gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don can 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol// mgon pos gal te de ring bdag ni gsan par mchis bzhed na// sems can yab chen mnyes mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi btsun mo mA ma kIs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po la rdo
